**Procedural Standards for Dispatch**

All memorials and petitions shall be written on evenly ruled, clean paper. Leave one hand’s breadth of space at the front and two at the back. Official correspondence shall use petition paper.

All memorials shall begin with "Your servant." Petitions shall state the name.

For the Celestial Pivot Bureau, use the bureau’s title and refer to it as "this bureau" in official correspondence.

For memorials to the imperial deities, use yellow labels for the sacred names, affixed at the appropriate time. All other documents shall use petitions.

Memorials to the Three Pure Ones and the Jade Emperor shall invoke the "edict of the Dao’s compassion." Memorials to other deities shall invoke the "august decree of celestial compassion." Memorials to the Earth Deity shall invoke the "sacred decree of imperial compassion."

All yellow labels shall be written in single columns: standard size is 2.4 inches wide by 3 inches high, or 3 inches wide by 3.6 inches high. Affix them to the front of the document, sealing the back seam with the servant’s name and seal.

For supplementary yellow labels, use small yellow slips, affixed diagonally beneath the Tai Sui.

All items requiring disclosure shall be marked with yellow labels. For a single deity, affix the label diagonally. For two or more, use a slightly wider label affixed centrally. For two or four deities, the right is honored; for three or five, the center is honored.

For all directional envelopes, whether memorials or petitions, do not affix yellow labels or use "Your servant," and only write the name at both ends. The same applies to documents, talismans, and decrees.

For memorials or petitions addressing multiple sacred names, the first name listed shall appear on the envelope.

All imperial deities shall be offered dragon chariots. The Earth Deity shall be offered a phoenix palanquin.

All official correspondence, documents, and letters of introduction shall be marked in red. Official correspondence shall be folded at the corner, sealed with the name, and the signature shall be written across the seal. Documents requiring disclosure shall be signed but not sealed.

For years: if the year is Jiazi, write "Tai Sui in Jiazi." The same applies from Yichou to Guihai.

For imperial titles, use "Your Majesty"; for the Earth Deity, use "Your Highness."

For deities, use "Before Your Majesty"; for immortals, use "Before the Sacred"; for spirits, use "Before the Divine."

**Memorial to the Jade Pure One**
All double annotations within the text shall distinguish between "specific dedication" and "universal dedication." Continue the text as appropriate; the rest follows this format.

[Name of the Ritual Master], Your Servant [Name]

Herewith, Your Servant records the following: Whereas a certain devotee, now residing in the village community of [Name] within [County], [Prefecture], under the jurisdiction of [Province] Administration Commission, has entered this hall with the utmost sincerity, seeking blessings and protection for the living, and whereas this petition cannot be denied, Your Servant has duly assembled a ritual altar of Daoist masters. In accordance with the sacred protocols of the Lower Prime Festival and the Yellow Register’s divine immortal statutes, a spirit altar has been established, and a covenant sworn.

At the hour of the Tiger, the precious fast is reverently observed, and the sacred banners are first unfurled. The intent of the fast is proclaimed on high, and the august titles of the Most High Perfected Scriptures are recited. On an auspicious day, the fast altar shall be opened, and the mysterious rites meticulously followed, while the secret traditions are proclaimed. Humbly beseeching the outpouring of grace, may salvation be universally bestowed upon the living and the deceased.

Having set forth these matters, a memorial is respectfully presented to the Heavenly Worthies and August Emperors, praying for the descent of their sagely decree. A petition shall be submitted to the True Offices of the Three Realms, and documents dispatched to all relevant jurisdictions, each entreated to take note of the grand fast thus established.

For the departed spirit [Name], enrolled in this assembly for the deliverance of the deceased, and for the kin of the fast’s sponsoring disciples—countless generations of ancestors, relatives across kalpas—may all suffering souls and lingering spirits of the Ten Directions and Nine Netherworlds be temporarily released from judgment, their evil roots severed. Through the power of the Dao, may the light of grace reach them in due time, allowing them to approach the altar’s steps, repent their sins, and receive the merit of this fast.

All talismans of the Primordial Beginning, sacred registers, true talismans, the single lineage of deliverance, and the arcane writs and secret scripts, as well as the rites of the fast’s inauguration and thanksgiving, shall be separately memorialized. It is desired that the Three Realms, Ten Directions, and all relevant jurisdictions be forewarned, that all may universally comply and reverently follow.

Wherefore, Your Servant humbly submits this memorial to the Jade Pure Highest Lord, the Primordial Heavenly Worthy of the Yuqing Realm; to the Supreme August Lord of the Highest Clarity, the Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy of the Shangqing Realm; and to the Supreme August Lord of the Great Clarity, the Heavenly Worthy of Dao and Virtue of the Taiqing Realm.

May the Dao’s compassion deign to issue a sacred decree, promulgating it throughout the Three Realms and Ten Directions, granting Your Servant’s petition. In fear of offending the celestial majesty, Your Servant prostrates in awe and dread, kowtowing repeatedly, acknowledging the gravity of this transgression. This memorial is respectfully submitted for Your Majesty’s consideration.

Respectfully submitted.

In the cyclical year [Year], [Month], [Day], [Name], Ritual Master of the Dharma Rank, submits this memorial.

**Memorial to the Earth Office**
The **Great City God of All Under Heaven** is hereby addressed.

The **Bureau of Numinous Treasure and Great Dharma** petitions the **Great City God of All Under Heaven**.

This Bureau now submits that, according to the petition from such-and-such village and prefecture, the intent of the fast is for blessings and protection of the living. As the Bureau cannot refuse this plea, it has reverently assembled a ritual altar of Daoist masters, establishing a numinous altar in accordance with the **Yellow Register** of the **Lower Yuan**, and the **Ranks of the Divine Immortals**, forming an alliance and taking oaths.

With reverence, the precious fast is undertaken, first raising the sacred banner. The intent of the fast is proclaimed, and the **True Scriptures of the Most High** are recited by title. An auspicious day is chosen to open the ritual altar.

Following the **Mysterious Regulations**, the secret rituals are proclaimed. Humbly, we beseech Your grace to universally deliver the living and the dead.

Apart from the matters herein, a memorial shall be swiftly submitted to the **Celestial Emperor**, imploring an imperial edict, and to the **Venerable Heavenly Emperors**, requesting their sacred decrees. These shall be transmitted to the **True Offices of the Three Realms** and all relevant jurisdictions.

Each is respectfully entreated to take note and honor the rites of the great fast. For the deceased so-and-so, the souls to be delivered in this assembly, and the family of the fast’s sponsor—countless ancestors across kalpas, all kin through past lives—along with the suffering souls and sinful spirits of the **Ten Directions and Nine Netherworlds**, may the examinations be temporarily suspended, and the roots of evil extinguished.

By the power of the Dao, may the light of grace arrive in time. May they approach the altar and throne, repent and cleanse their sins, and humbly receive the merit of the fast. Desiring that all relevant jurisdictions be forewarned of the rites to be performed, it is necessary to issue this special memorial.

Upon receipt of this memorial, the aforementioned matters are to be carefully considered. Swiftly issue commands, transmitting documents to the **Community Deities of Ji, Yun, Qing, Xu, Yang, Jing, Yu, Liang, and Yong Provinces**, as well as to the **City Gods of all prefectures, subprefectures, counties, and towns**, ensuring mutual notification and universal awareness of the great fast to be performed. Urgently investigate and gather all long-imprisoned souls in the dark yin realms, those without means of deliverance, wandering spirits, and those bound by grievances and enmity under your jurisdiction.

Each is to be examined in advance, assembled, and exhorted to abandon evil affinities and cultivate good thoughts. They shall await the day of the fast’s establishment, at which time a further memorial shall be issued to command their dispatch to the altar. There, they shall refine their forms and spirits, attend the court of the **Most High**, hear the scriptures and receive the Dharma, resolve burdens and dissolve enmity, partake of the fast’s offerings, and humbly receive its merit. May all universally attain deliverance and together achieve transcendence.

Above, this accords with the compassion of the **Great Dao**; below, it manifests the vastness of the fast’s merit. This memorial requests compliance and implementation.

Respectfully submitted.

**Section on Memorials to the Throne**

To the August Jade Purity, the Most High Lord of the Primordial Beginning, from your subordinate of the Three Clarities, [Name], of such-and-such native place:

Whereas, in accordance with the petition of the sponsor [Name] of such-and-such village and domicile, whose intent in establishing this fast is to seek blessings and protection for the living, and whereas your subordinate, finding the plea impossible to refuse, did on the [Day] of the [Month] issue a preliminary announcement, first raising the sacred banner to make known the intent of the fast—

Now, in accordance with the ranks of the transcendent spirits as set forth in the *Yellow Register Writs of the Lower Prime*, a numinous altar has been erected and the fast rites solemnly performed. Reverently following the prescribed order, the true scriptures are proclaimed and expounded. The memorials to the Celestial Officials for the deliverance of all souls are presented; the primordial talismanic decrees of the Most High, the *Golden Register* and *White Writs*, the *True Talismans for Salvation from Suffering*, the *Most High’s Edict of Absolution and Register for Ascension to Heaven*, the *Jade Purity’s True Talismans for Deliverance of Shades from Darkness and Breaking Open Hell*, the *Nine-Dragon Decrees of the Azure Palace*, and the *Jade Tablets of the Divine Tiger* are issued.

Thereby, the deceased [Name], the souls of all those assembled for deliverance, and the suffering shades of the Ten Directions and Nine Netherworlds—bound prisoners of the long night—are to receive the merit of this fast. On the [Day] of the [Month], the fast altar shall be opened, and the departed souls summoned to attend and receive deliverance. Beginning at dawn on the [Day], the proper fast and Daoist rites shall proceed for three days and nine audiences. On the night of the [Day], a pure and unimpeded *hushi* feast shall be universally offered, and the night fast and alchemical deliverance performed for the six destinies, the four modes of birth, and the lonely, lingering souls.

On the night of the [Day], the transformation through water and fire shall be enacted for the souls of the sponsored deceased. The *Nine Wondrous Precepts of the Perfected* shall be transmitted, and the primordial talismanic decrees proclaimed. The *Golden Register* and *White Writs*, the *Talismans of Eternal Life*, and the *Registers for Breaking the Bonds* shall be conferred to ensure promotion and transcendence.

Upon completion of the rites, a memorial shall be presented to report the merit accrued, and the altar shall be dismantled. On the night of the [Day], a grand offering shall be made to the lofty perfected of the Three Realms, a pure *jiao* rite for the three hundred and sixty divine ranks, in reverent gratitude for the vast grace received, with the presentation of dragon tablets and writs.

In addition to the foregoing, a full account of the proceedings shall be prepared and submitted to the August Celestial Worthies of the Myriad Heavens, beseeching the issuance of their sagely decree. The Three Realms’ true bureaus shall be notified, and documents dispatched to all relevant offices. The names of the sponsored deceased, along with their dates of birth and death, shall be separately recorded in a register and submitted to the *Upper Clarity Celestial Pivot Institute* under the Three Celestial Gates, there to await the saving decree and its subsequent promulgation.

Your subordinate further humbly considers that all the sponsored souls, bound as they are by the grime of past karmic transgressions and eternally confined to the dark paths, cannot be delivered without the grace of Heaven. Only through the primordial talismanic decrees, the sacred registers, and the true talismans can this lineage be opened and delivered. The secret writs and numinous scripts, along with the supervising officials of the fast altar and the divine attendants of the *Numinous Treasure*, who proclaim and transmit the summons, as well as the various officers and generals of the relevant bureaus—all those who ought to be invoked and descended—shall be duly summoned and dispatched in accordance with the prescribed forms. It is thus necessary to memorialize this matter.

Accordingly, your subordinate respectfully submits this register and memorial to the August Jade Purity, the Most High Lord of the Primordial Beginning. May the Dao’s compassion grant your subordinate’s plea and issue the talismanic decrees for your subordinate to receive and enact. May a special sagely decree be bestowed, universally proclaimed to the myriad heavens, the palaces of the sun, moon, and stars, the jade pivots and celestial balances, the Four Offices and Five Emperors, the Controllers of Destiny and Recorders of Deeds, the Lord of Records at the Southern Palace of Nanchang, all earth and water deities, the sacred mountains of the Five Peaks, the Three Officials and Nine Bureaus, the Twelve River Sources, the courts of the long night, the depths of the Nine Netherworlds, the boundless worlds, and all divine spirits. May each be commanded to respond accordingly, delivering the deceased [Name], the souls of all those assembled for deliverance, and the households of the fast’s disciples—ancestors of a hundred thousand generations, karmic kin across kalpas, the suffering souls and sinful shades of the Ten Directions and Nine Netherworlds. May all deep transgressions, heavy faults, and ancient enmities be renewed and pardoned. May they emerge from the dark night and come before the fast altar, bathing body and spirit, attending the Perfected, and hearing the Dharma. May they repent of their karmic transgressions, undergo alchemical refinement, and be reborn.

Moreover, may the lords of the Northern and Southern Palaces, the rulers of yang essence and yin spirits, the divine kings of the Ten Directions, the numinous officials and jade maidens, the offices of the memorials, the couriers of the *Mysterious Capital*’s dragons, the messengers who inspect decrees, the protective Dharma deities, the dragon and tiger riders, the Three Prime Generals, the guardians of the fast altar, the divine attendants of the *Numinous Treasure*, the alchemical officials of Nanchang, and the generals and officers who pursue and summon souls—may all be commanded to know their duties, respond to your subordinate’s summons, manifest their forms, and descend in their qi to visibly assist in the rites. May demonic obstacles not arise, and may the fast’s merit be accomplished. May the deceased transcend and transform, and may the living enjoy peace and prosperity. May the state and the household receive grace, and may the dark and the bright realms alike be blessed.

On the day the fast is established, may the Three Luminaries shine brightly, and may the Four Qi be harmonious. May grace and light be bestowed from above to witness and affirm the rites. Having presumptuously offended the Celestial Might, your subordinate is filled with awe and trepidation, bowing his head to the ground in reverence. With dread and humility, he submits this memorial for your august consideration.

Respectfully submitted.

**Memorial to the Cavernous Abyss**

[Your humble servant, the Dharma-ranked official of such-and-such position and surname, respectfully submits:]

Now, in accordance with the petitioner’s native place and purpose for entering the fast—to invoke blessings and protection for the living—I, though unworthy, could not suppress the words of supplication. Having previously announced on such-and-such day of such-and-such month, I first raised the precious banner to proclaim the intent of the fast above.

Today, following the standards of the *Yellow Register* scriptures and the ranks of the numinous immortals of the Lower Prime, I establish the numinous altar and solemnly perform the fast’s rites. Reverently adhering to the prescribed order, I proclaim the true statutes, present obeisance to the Celestial Officials, and perform the deliverance of all chapters. I issue the primordial talismanic decrees of the Celestial Worthy of Original Beginning, the *Golden Register* and *White Tablet*, the true talismans for salvation from suffering, the *Precious Register of the Supreme Lord for Ascension to Heaven*, the true talismans of the Jade Clarity for delivering souls from darkness and shattering the earth-prisons, the *Nine Dragon Talismanic Decrees of the Azure Palace*, the *Divine Tiger Jade Tablets*, and the *Supreme Lord’s Edict of Amnesty*—all to deliver the departed soul of so-and-so, the spirits of those in assembly for universal deliverance, and the suffering souls of the ten directions, nine nether realms, and imprisoned shades, that they may emerge from eternal night and receive the merit of this fast.

I respectfully select such-and-such day of such-and-such month to open the fast’s altar, summoning and gathering the departed souls to attend and receive deliverance. Beginning at dawn on such-and-such day, the main fast and ritual circumambulations commence, spanning three days and nine audiences. On such-and-such night, a universal offering of pure, unimpeded *hushi* is set forth, and the night fast refines and delivers the six paths, four modes of birth, and all lonely, lingering souls. On such-and-such night, the transformations of water and fire refine the souls of those universally delivered. The *Nine Perfected Wondrous Precepts* are transmitted, and the primordial talismanic decrees, *Golden Register* and *White Tablet* for longevity, *Life Talismans*, and *Registers of Liberation* are issued to guarantee their promotion and ascension.

Upon completion, a memorial is presented to report the merit, and the altar is dismantled after the rites conclude. On such-and-such night, a pure offering is respectfully prepared for the Three Realms’ lofty perfected ones, a libation of three hundred and sixty divisions, to repay the vast grace above and present the dragon tablets and memorial tablets.

Apart from the matters already stated, I humbly memorialize the August Thearch, beseeching the descent of edicts, and memorialize the Celestial Thearchs of the various heavens, entreating the issuance of their sagely decrees. These are to be transmitted to the true bureaus of the Three Realms and dispatched to their respective jurisdictions. The birth and death years and months of the delivered souls are separately recorded in a register and submitted to the *Upper Clarity Heavenly Pivot Institute* beneath the Three Heavenly Gates, awaiting the imperial decree for promulgation.

Yet I remain concerned that in the dark prisons of the northern wastes, the earthen ramparts of Fengdu, and the places where sinful souls are bound, they may not be immediately released to attend, thus hindering their deliverance. This matter must be memorialized.

[Your humble servant respectfully records this memorial and presents it before the Cavernous Abyss’s *Three Modes of Samādhi*, the Boundless Supreme Supreme Great Unity Heavenly Lord, and the Celestial Worthies of the Three Caverns. I reverently await the sagely decree, beseeching its descent to the Three Realms and ten directions, the nine ramparts of the Yellow Springs, the realms of wind, Brahmā, steel, and the four poles, the regions of northern desolation and distant seclusion, and all yin bureaus, nether offices, and dark prisons. May the enlightened souls be illuminated, and the departed souls be delivered. May all those sunk in darkness universally receive transcendence. May the merit of the fast be perfected, and both the living and the dead partake in its grace.]

[I, your humble servant, dread offending the celestial majesty. With utmost reverence and trepidation, I kowtow and prostrate myself, acknowledging my mortal transgressions. I respectfully submit this memorial for your consideration.]

The names of the deceased here offered, along with their dates of birth and death, shall be separately recorded in a register and submitted to the *Upper Clarity Heavenly Pivot Institute* under the Three Heavenly Gates, there to await the imperial edict and its subsequent proclamation.

We implore the release of the imprisoned and the illumination of the stagnant. Some, due to karmic debts from past or present lives, remain detained in the underworld. Regardless of the gravity of their transgressions, we beseech that all be released under Your command. May two divine generals be dispatched, along with cavalry and infantry bearing their arms, to accompany the Direct Talisman Tiger Spirit Envoys of the Three Realms. May the Spirit Officials and Generals be tasked with overseeing the gathering of these souls at the appointed time, guiding them to the sacred ritual altar to await summoning.

There, they shall bathe and pay homage to the Perfected, repenting their transgressions. We humbly pray for the deliverance of those long confined in the nether realms and the release of the imprisoned and stagnant. May all be gathered and liberated to partake in the salvific merit, escaping the sufferings of the wheel of rebirth.

The dispatched divine generals and soldiers shall also guard the ritual altar, restraining the orphaned souls to prevent them from harboring vengeful thoughts or harming the living. They shall also block impure influences to avoid defilement of the ritual’s merit, lest it offend the August Thearch, delay the descent of the exalted Perfected, or obstruct the divine gaze upon these proceedings.

We humbly beseech Your assent and swift implementation.

We presume upon Your sacred majesty. Jointly with the Earth Mansion memorial, this is respectfully sealed.

**Memorandum from the Capital City God’s Court of the Numinous Treasure Great Ritual Bureau**
*To the Lord of the Celestial Capital’s Great City God*

Whereas this Bureau has previously received the petition of [Name] of [Place], seeking blessings for the living and deliverance for the departed, and finding the plea irrepressible, has already, on the [Day] of the [Month], issued a preliminary announcement, raising the sacred banner to proclaim the intent of the fast to the heavens:

Now, in accordance with the *Yellow Register Liturgical Texts of the Lower Prime* and the *Ranks of the Numinous Immortals*, a sacred altar shall be established to conduct the fast with utmost reverence. Following the prescribed order, the true ordinances shall be proclaimed, and petitions presented to the Heavenly Officials for salvation. The *Mandates of the Primordial Beginning*, *Golden Registers*, *White Tallies*, *True Talismans of Salvation from Suffering*, *Supreme Registers for Pardon and Ascension to Heaven*, *True Talismans of the Jade Clarity for Deliverance of Shades and Shattering of Hell*, and *Nine Dragon Mandates of the Azure Palace*, along with *Divine Tiger Jade Tallies*, shall be issued.

Thus shall the departed [Name], the souls assembled for deliverance, and all beings of the Ten Directions and Nine Dark Realms—bound spirits and suffering prisoners—be released from eternal night and partake of the merit of the fast.

On the [Day] of the [Month], the fast altar shall be opened, and the departed souls summoned to attend and receive deliverance. Beginning at dawn on the [Day], the main fast and Daoist rites shall commence, spanning three days and nine audiences. On the night of the [Day], an unobstructed *Pure and Impartial Night Fast* shall be held to refine and deliver the six paths, four births, orphaned souls, and lingering shades. On the night of the [Day], through the alchemy of water and fire, the souls of the departed shall be refined, talismans transmitted, precepts conferred, and the *Mandates of the Primordial Beginning*, *Golden Registers*, *White Tallies*, *Talismans of Eternal Life*, and *Registers for Breaking Bonds* issued to ensure their ascent and rebirth. Upon completion, memorials shall be presented to report the merits, and the altar dissolved.

On the night of the [Day], a grand offering shall be made to the Three Realms’ Lofty Perfected, a pure jiao rite for the three hundred and sixty divine ranks, in gratitude for their boundless grace, with the presentation of dragon tablets and memorial tallies. The details of these proceedings shall be fully reported to the Supreme Emperor, beseeching the issuance of imperial decrees, and memorials shall be presented to the Heavenly Thearchs, entreating their sagely edicts. These shall be transmitted to the true bureaus of the Three Realms and all relevant jurisdictions.

The names of the departed souls, along with their dates of birth and death, shall be separately recorded and submitted to the *Heavenly Pivot Court of the Upper Clarity* under the Three Heavens’ Gate, there to await the imperial decree. Upon its issuance, this shall be duly proclaimed.

Wherefore, a special memorandum is hereby issued.

Upon receipt, the aforementioned matters shall be reviewed in detail. Expeditiously issue directives and transmit memoranda to all prefectural, sub-prefectural, and county city gods; temples of the official pantheon; all sites of incense and offerings; and the *She* Lords of the Nine Provinces of Ji, Yan, Qing, Xu, Yang, Jing, Yu, Liang, and Yong, informing them of the conduct of the great fast.

In strict adherence to the imperial decrees and mandates, open the gates and clear the paths. In accordance with the direct talismans, verify the names provided, and permit the departed [Name], the assembled souls for deliverance, and all beings of the six paths, four births, orphaned souls, and lingering shades to proceed to the fast altar, there to await the summons, attend the Perfected, hear the Dharma, and receive deliverance and rebirth. During the rites for the descent of the Imperial Perfected, invite them to the altar to partake of the jiao offerings. Upon completion, report their merits and bestow rewards, thereby repaying their divine service.

The statutes of the Illuminated Perfected are inviolable, and the prohibitions most severe. These commands must be obeyed; no violation shall be tolerated.

**Memorandum.**

Upon receipt, review the matters outlined in the prior memorandum. All requisite implements and ritual objects for the fast and jiao rites shall be entrusted to divine generals for constant protection, preventing theft by evil persons or damage by insects and beasts. Furthermore, in strict adherence to the imperial decrees and mandates, open the gates and clear the paths. In accordance with the direct talismans, verify the names provided, and permit the departed [Name], the assembled souls for deliverance, and all beings of the six paths, four births, orphaned souls, and lingering shades to come before the altar, clearly reporting their presence and awaiting the summons. Lead them to the Supreme Lord to confess their transgressions, partake of the fast’s merit, and ascend according to their karmic fruits.

No obstruction, concealment, or harboring of grudges leading to clandestine harm shall be tolerated. In cases of urgent summons, immediate compliance is required; no violation shall be permitted. Upon the completion of the fast, report their merits and bestow rewards. During the rites for the descent of the Imperial Perfected, they shall partake of the jiao offerings in repayment of divine service.

This memorandum is issued in accordance with the *Mysterious Ordinances* and *Jade Statutes*; act swiftly and in full compliance.

Furthermore, you are to strictly prohibit all incitement to litigation or disturbance. During the stillness of night, no clamor or commotion shall arise, nor shall any harbor enmity or violate the sanctity of the jiao altar, lest they forfeit their karmic merit. The statutes of the Perfected are luminously clear, and their prohibitions carry the gravest weight. You must comply without fail; let there be no willful disobedience.

**Official Dispatch to** [Name of Deity] [Name of King or Marquis]

The present Bureau, in accordance with the petition of [Name], a resident of [Place], humbly states: For the **solemn offering on behalf of the deceased kin [Name]**, and the **universal deliverance of all departed souls in assembly**, a request is made to conduct the **Supreme Yellow Register Grand Retreat** at [Location], to aid their transcendence.

As the plea cannot be denied, this Bureau, following the **Yellow Register Scriptures and the Codes of the Divine Immortals of the Lower Prime**, has established the sacred altar and initiated the ritual proceedings. Reverently adhering to the prescribed order, the **true codes shall be proclaimed**, memorials presented, and **talismanic decrees issued**. The **sin-laden souls shall be redeemed**, and the **imprisoned spirits liberated**. The retreat shall commence on the [Day] of this month, summoning the **souls to be delivered** to the altar for their salvation.

Beginning at dawn on [Day], the **main retreat and Daoist rites** shall proceed for **three days and nine audiences**. On the night of [Day], the **unobstructed night retreat** shall be universally offered to the **six destinies and four births**, the **lonely souls and stagnant spirits**. On the night of [Day], the **refinement and deliverance of the departed** shall be conducted, elevating them to the **Dao-realm**. Upon completion, the **merits shall be reported**, and the memorial tablet presented, after which the altar shall be dismantled. On the night of [Day], a **grand retreat and jiao offering** shall be performed at the **three hundred and sixty divine stations**, in profound gratitude for the boundless grace.

Relying upon your divine might, we beseech your **oversight of the altar proceedings**, **suppressing demonic obstructions**, and **dispelling defiled qi**. **Abstain from pungent and impure offerings**, that the retreat may be perfectly accomplished. This requires your **solemn dispatch**.

Upon receipt of this document, you are to **review the aforementioned matters**. In accordance with the scheduled dates of the ritual, **assemble your divine soldiers, cavalry, and officials**, and **personally attend** to **guard the sacred altar**, **expel lingering corpse qi**, and **prevent the intrusion of pungent impurities**. Should any seek to **cause demonic harm**, **intercept and obstruct them**. Those who defy this shall face **immediate and manifest retribution**, swiftly subdued. **Permit no encroachment**, and ensure the **protection of all ritual implements and ceremonial objects** required for the retreat and jiao. **Assign divine officials** to **continuously safeguard** them, **preventing theft or damage by evil persons, thieves, chickens, dogs, cats, or rats**.

Furthermore, we beseech you to **uphold the decrees and talismanic commands**, facilitating the **deliverance of the souls to be offered for**, as well as the **boundless stagnant spirits**, enabling them to **attend the altar, receive the retreat’s merits**, and **restrain vengeful spirits and karmic adversaries**, preventing them from **arising in enmity or seeking retribution**. When the **burning of scriptures, banners, and spirit-money** takes place, may the **power of the Three Treasures** be invoked to **transform and universally bestow blessings upon all spirits**. Ensure **comprehensive protection**, **safeguard the flames**, and **usher in auspicious fortune**. Upon the conclusion of the rites, **report the merits accomplished**, in gratitude for your divine favor.

**This document is to be duly executed as requested.**
**Respectfully submitted.**

**Memorial to the Mysterious Heavens for the Dispelling of Defilements**

The **Tai Shang San Wu** Register Disciple of the **Celestial Master’s** [Nth] Administration of [Nth] Qi, [Name], with myriad memorials humbly submits:

Your servant, prostrate and bowing repeatedly, respectfully declares:

In accordance with the **Mysterious Regulations**, and in response to the intent of this Grand Fast for the blessing of the living, your servant, unable to suppress the urgency of the petition, has already, on the [Nth] day of the [Nth] month, issued a **Pre-Announcement**, first raising the **Precious Banner** to make known the purpose of the Fast.

Now, following the **Register of the Lower Prime’s Yellow Register**, the **Rank of Numinous Immortals**, a **Spiritual Altar** is established to solemnly perform the Fast’s rites. Reverently adhering to the prescribed order, the **True Regulations** are proclaimed. Memorials are presented to the **Celestial Officials** for the deliverance of all beings. The **Primordial Mandate of the Yuan Shi**, the **Golden Register and White Tablets**, the **True Talismans of Salvation from Suffering**, the **Tai Shang’s Edict of Absolution for Ascension to Heaven**, the **Jade Purity Talismans for Deliverance of Shades and Shattering of Hell**, the **Nine Dragon Mandates of the Eastern Palace’s Azure Court**, and the **Divine Tiger Jade Tallies** are issued.

May the souls of the deceased [Name], those in assembly for deliverance, and all beings of the **Ten Directions and Nine Dark Realms**—the imprisoned, the suffering, and the wandering—be released from eternal night and receive the merit of this Fast.

On the [Nth] day of the [Nth] month, the **Fast Altar** shall be opened to summon and gather the departed souls for deliverance. Beginning at dawn on the [Nth] day, the **Orthodox Fast** and **Dao Offerings** shall proceed for **three days and nine audiences**. On the [Nth] night, a **universal offering of pure, unimpeded alms-food** shall be set forth, and the **nightly refinement and deliverance** shall extend to the **Six Paths and Four Kinds of Birth**, the **lonely and stagnant souls**. On the [Nth] night, through the **transformation of Water and Fire**, the souls of the delivered shall be refined. They shall receive the **Nine Wondrous Precepts of the True Ones**, the **Primordial Mandate of the Yuan Shi**, the **Golden Register and White Tablets**, the **Talismans of Eternal Life**, the **Registers of Breaking Bonds**, and be safeguarded for **ascension and transcendence**.

Upon completion, a memorial shall be presented to report the merit, and the altar shall be closed and dispersed. On the [Nth] night, a **Pure Offering** shall be reverently prepared for the **High Perfected of the Three Realms**, the **Three Hundred and Sixty Divine Positions**, to repay the vast grace. **Dragon Tablets** shall be cast, and **memorials** presented. Additionally, **offerings of trust-money, rice, plain silk, incense, oil, firewood, charcoal, salt, fermented beans, brushes, ink, and ritual implements** shall be provided.

Your servant humbly requests to present memorials to the **Celestial Officials** for the **deliverance and redemption** of all souls. May the **power of the Dao** be invoked to deliver the departed, as in the **Universal Assembly of Deliverance**. If there are those among the living who receive deliverance, may the merit extend to both the living and the dead.

Your servant deeply fears that the site of the altar’s construction, since the **Ashen Kalpa**, in all four directions and corners, may be tainted by **all manner of defilements and taboos**. The comings and goings of people, the hidden and manifest impurities, the **foul qi** and turbid vapors, may congeal and obstruct, shrouding the **Six Harmonies** in gloom and veiling the **Eight Extents**. This may prevent the **descent of the swift winds** and the **halt of the True Chariots**, hindering the **opening of deliverance** and the **salvation of the dark and light realms**. Without the **compassion of the Dao**, purity and solemnity cannot be achieved.

Your servant now presents this memorial, first to **ascend to the Celestial Pole**, and to extend near and far. May the sincerity of the plea be spread, and the **wisdom and grace** be guided and welcomed. May the **miasma and defilements** be swept away, and the **evil and demonic** purged.

Your servant, though foolish and unworthy, has not fully mastered the teachings. Yet, having long followed the **True Lineage** and early served the **Registers of Governance**, though his name has been **unduly included among the Libationers**, and his office **dares not neglect its duties**, he has pledged devotion and submission. The principle of refusal is untenable.

Respectfully, a **memorial is prostrated and presented**, to be heard by the **Three Heavens**.

May the **Tai Shang, the Boundless Great Dao**, the **Supreme Masters**, and the **Officials of the Upper Palace** deign to consider it with compassion.

Your servant respectfully invokes the **Five Emperors of the Five Directions** and the **Lords of Dispelling All Taboos**, each with **one hundred and twenty officials and generals**, along with the **Washers of Flesh**, to **dispel all taboos and defilements**. The **Jade Maiden Envoys**, with **one hundred and twenty officials and generals**, bearing the **Water of True Essence** and the **Five Harmonies Incense**, shall purify the **Spiritual Altar**. The **unimpeded alms-vessels**, the **offered Fast-food**, the **lamps, candles, incense, and flowers**, and the **wells, stoves, and all within and without** shall be rendered pure. The **thousands of taboos and myriad defilements** shall instantly dissipate.

Further, the **One Thousand Two Hundred Jade Maidens of Immortal Flowers** are invoked, along with the **Nine Phoenix Talismans for Breaking Defilements**, the **Great Generals of Gathering Defilements**, the **Great Generals of Destroying Defilements**, the **Great Generals of Transporting Defilements**, and the **Great Generals of Removing Defilements**, each with **one hundred and twenty officials and generals**. Together with the **Water-Mastering Dragon Envoys of the Five Directions**, each holding the **Water of True Essence**, they shall wash and purify the **Yellow Register Fast Altar**, the **entire household of the Fast’s sponsor [Name]**, the **young and old within and without**, the **officiants at the altar**, the **bearers of the Dharma’s flow**, and all who come and go. Any **taboos or defilements** shall be entirely dissolved, so that each person’s **spirit and mind** may be inwardly nurtured, their **strength of body** preserved, their **focus outwardly harmonized**, their **sincerity refined and communicated**, and the **merit of the Fast** realized, with all affairs free from demonic obstruction. All depends on the **vast grace** to universally bestow purity.

The **Ten Precepts of the Ling Bao**, the **Nine Wondrous Precepts of Dignity and Virtue**, the **Primordial Mandate of the Yuan Shi**, the **Golden Register and White Tablets**, the **Talismans of Eternal Life**, the **True Talismans of Salvation from Suffering**, the **Tai Shang’s Edict of Absolution for Ascension to Heaven**, the **Jade Purity Talismans for Deliverance of Shades and Shattering of Hell**, the **Nine Dragon Mandates of the Eastern Palace’s Azure Court**, the **Divine Tiger Jade Tallies**, the **Dragon Couriers of the Mysterious Capital**, the **Golden Dragon Couriers**, the **Envoys of the Nine Dragon Mandates**, the **Dragon and Tiger Riders of the Three Primes**, the **Divine Tiger Officers of Pursuit and Summoning**, the **Refinement and Deliverance Bureaus**, the **Divine Hosts of the Ling Bao**, and all their **attendant deities** are respectfully invoked to descend as one. They shall **proclaim and transmit the summons**, **guard the Fast Altar**, and **elevate the delivered**, opening the way for the **stagnant souls**. May the **repentance and petitions** be heard, and the **transmissions** unimpeded. May the **hosts of Perfected** look down in favor, and the **ranks of Sages** return to attend. May the **dark and light realms** receive grace, and all **sentient beings** be blessed. The **Celestial Officials, Riders, and Attendants of the Ling Bao**, and all the **divine hosts** invoked shall, upon the dispersal of the altar, be presented with memorials to report their merit, and each shall be petitioned for **promotion and reward** as a token of efficacy.

May the **Tai Shang**, in mercy, distinguish and heed the plea.

Your servant, in humility, relies upon the **Direct Envoys of the Two Officials**, the **Orthodox One Functionaries**, the **Left and Right Envoys**, the **Yin-Yang Spirit Officers**, the **Chariot Officers of the Regulations**, the **Red Talisman Officers**, the **Riders of the Rigorous Winds**, the **Couriers for Memorials**, the **Flying Dragon Riders**, and other officials, **two each**, to proceed.

Further, relying upon the **Divine Escort of the Jia-Shen Day**, the **Sixteen Attendants of the Textual Guardian**, and the **Two Celestial Light Talisman Officers**.

The **Divine Escort Attendants and Talisman Officers**, who alternate with the days and hours, shall follow this precedent as the standard.

Your servant, in reverence, acts on behalf of the **Grand Yellow Register Retreat’s Chief Patron**, universally offering prayers for transformation. The **Grand Yellow Register Retreat’s General Convener**, so-and-so, together with all assembled officials, clerks, and participants—hereafter referred to collectively—prostrate before the **Celestial Officials**, petitioning the **Mysterious Vault of Heaven**.

A **precious scroll for dissolving defilements and dispelling impurities** is hereby presented, to be delivered upward to the **Court of the Supreme Void and Boundless Venerable One**, the **Northern Culmen Palace**, and the **Administrative Bureau of the Celestial Offices**. The Bureau’s rotation follows the days; this serves as the precedent.

Awaiting the report of the petition’s receipt, your servant, so-and-so, with awe and trepidation, bows his head to the ground, kowtows repeatedly, and submits this memorial for consideration.

Respectfully sealed and humbly submitted to the Palace of the Supreme Void and Venerable One, to the Bureau of the Northern Celestial Palace.

*[Outer envelope]*
Respectfully sealed and humbly submitted to the Gate of the Three Heavens for transmission.

*[By order of the canonical statutes for memorials:]* A memorial must be written without delay of a single day; the Supreme Clarity’s name must be filled in without delay of an hour. Within the memorial, the sacred titles of the Supreme Clarity, as prescribed by the ritual codes, are to be written in fine script at the time of presentation, either three *cun* and six *fen* or five *cun* in length, and placed after the vermilion address. The ritual codes further stipulate that the officiating master should write within a space of two *cun* and four *fen*, but if this proves too cramped, it is permissible to write in fine script in a single line for clarity. This is also recorded in the ritual codes of Heavenly Master Zhang Wanfu. If the memorial can be written in standard script according to the codes, it would be especially excellent. As for the two characters “Your Majesty,” though they are said to be written in fine script, the phrase “Jade Majesty” is a single semantic unit and should not be separated. Writing only the two characters “Your Majesty” in fine script appears somewhat unbalanced. Moreover, neither the *Fivefold Refinement of the Living Corpse Sutra* nor the memorial formats of Zhang and Du prescribe fine script for these two characters. Reason suggests that writing them in a single line of fine script may be acceptable, preserving the intent of reverent solemnity.

**Memorial for the Pardon of Sins in Fengdu**

This memorial is respectfully presented by your subordinate **[name]**, holding the ritual rank of Memorial-Presenter, with awe and trepidation, prostrating and bowing twice to address:

Your subordinate, in accordance with the Mysterious Codes, now refers to the jointly submitted memorial to the Mysterious Vault of Heaven. Following the rites of casting the dragon talisman and presenting the bamboo slips, memorials have already been offered to the Heavenly Thearchs, and petitions have been filed with the true bureaus of the Three Realms, along with all relevant offices. External offerings and ritual implements have been prepared. Your subordinate humbly requests to present this memorial to the Heavenly Officials, beseeching the redemption and deliverance of all souls through the submitted petitions, that the departed may be released from the eternal night.

Your subordinate, having long served the true lineage and been entrusted with the registers of governance, bears the undeserved title of Libationer, yet dares not neglect the duties of transmission. Herewith, the names of the departed souls to be delivered are respectfully listed and submitted with this memorial, extending to the six paths and four births, the lonely souls and lingering spirits, that they may receive the grace of the decree, escape the dark ways, accept the merit of this retreat, and ascend to the Pure Realms.

Your subordinate further considers that the departed **[name]**, the souls listed for deliverance in this assembly, and the ancestors of the retreat’s sponsoring disciples—spanning ten thousand generations—along with imprisoned and suffering spirits, have accumulated transgressions and karmic debts over countless kalpas, bound in retribution and confined in the nether darkness. Without the intercession of this memorial for pardon, they cannot escape the depths of the shadowy realms. Relying entirely on the power of the Dao, may they be granted new life through your boundless compassion.

Your subordinate humbly requests that one True-Descending and Spirit-Summoning Talisman Officer and one True-Descending and Spirit-Summoning Youth be specially dispatched for the departed **[name]** and the souls listed for deliverance in this assembly. Reverently invoking the True Talisman of the Great Ultimate, your subordinate petitions the Eastern Ultimate Azure Palace, the Heaven of Everlasting Joy, the Great Compassionate One, the Perceiver of Cries and Responder to Prayers, the Most High Heavenly Worthy of Salvation through Suffering, to descend the majestic and divine radiance of wisdom, illuminating the ten directions of the cosmos. May the Northern Yin Fengdu, the Nine Dark Prisons, the Heavenly Jails, the Water Prisons, the Torture Chambers of the Nether Bureaus, and all other hells receive this radiance and be instantly illuminated, their iron cities crumbling, their willow bonds dissolving. May the departed **[name]**, the souls listed for deliverance, and the imprisoned suffering spirits be pardoned, beholding the light and escaping the darkness.

Relying upon the Heavenly Worthies and Supreme Sages, and in accordance with the divine ranks of the Yellow Register’s talismanic texts, your subordinate invokes the Flying Heavenly Divine Kings, the True Persons of Salvation through Suffering, the Salvation Youths, and the Azure Mystery Jade Maidens to descend upon the dark prisons. May they sprinkle the precious nectar of sweet dew and descend the Dharma rain of compassion. Through the resonance of majestic power and the efficacy of wisdom, wherever they reach, flames shall be extinguished, and spring shall arise amidst ice and snow. Blades shall transform into jade trees, swords into flowering forests. Bronze pillars and iron beds shall become furnishings of precious thrones; cauldrons of boiling liquid and furnaces of coals shall become lamps of cool clarity. Iron pellets and molten gold shall lose their scorching menace; saws and knives shall blunt their edges. Bronze serpents and iron dogs shall sever their evil affinities. The ox-headed jailers shall awaken to kindness, the demon kings shall bow their heads, and the underworld clerks shall submit in sincerity. The registers of sin shall be erased, the records of karmic debt burned. Enmities shall be reconciled, debts dissolved. All beings of the four births and six paths shall depart the dust of the mundane. Shell-covered creatures and insects shall attain transformation. Those burdened with sand and stone, the souls who draw waves from the dark sea, the spirits who harness thunder and lightning, the gods who encircle the heavens, the ghosts who sweep mountains with wind, the dragons who tunnel earth and channel water—all shall be released from their toils and ascend to the Southern Palace. May they forever escape the Five Sufferings and be far removed from the Three Evil Paths.

Thus, may the departed **[name]**, the souls listed for deliverance in this assembly, and the ancestral spirits of the disciple **[name]**’s family don the celestial regalia, wear the vermilion sashes of office, ride the winds through the azure vaults, and ascend in feathered chariots to the Supreme Clarity. May the cycles of karmic retribution never cease, and may they be reborn in the halls of princes and kings, cultivating myriad virtues. May they attain the fruits of immortality and reach the Land of Bliss. May all be as your subordinate has petitioned, without fail.

Imploring the Most High to distinguish and heed this plea.

Your humble servant, in accordance with the preceding memorial but altering only the direct divine invocation, respectfully submits on behalf of the chief patron **[name]** of the Great Register Fast a petition to the Celestial Officials of Fengdu, the "Precious Memorial for the Establishment of the Dao and the Pardon of Sins," one sealed document, to be presented to the Bureau of the Most High **[name]** Palace.

Following the format of the preceding memorial:

**Primary Deliverance:**
**[Name]** (only the name is written)

Prepared on the **[day]** of this month by the High Ritual Master, the humble servant **[name]**.

Write in neat, standard script, with rows and columns aligned. Place the document within the memorial’s circular seal, enclose it in the second envelope, and dispatch it.

**Memorial for Opening the Roads**

Prepared by the Ritual Master, your humble servant **[name]**, with reverence and awe, kowtowing and bowing twice, respectfully addresses this memorial:

Your servant, in accordance with the Mysterious Regulations, now bases this upon the same memorial for invoking the Celestial Vault, having already presented the Dragon Tablet and Advanced Petitions to the Heavenly Thearchs, and filed them with the True Offices of the Three Realms and their respective jurisdictions. The external offerings and ritual implements have been prepared.

Your servant petitions to present this memorial to the Celestial Officials, beseeching the redemption and deliverance of all petitions, that they may ascend and be saved.

I humbly reflect: From youth, I have admired the Mysterious Wind and early joined the Registers of Governance. Though my name has been presumptuously included among the Libationers, I dare not neglect my duties in submission.

Having already followed the canonical rites and reverently performed the fast, I still fear that the gates of the unseen are distant and the paths of the netherworld remote. The waters and lands are cut off, and the directions are blocked. The departed **[name]**, the souls for deliverance in this assembly, and the suffering spirits confined in the Nine Dark Realms require this memorial of pardon to escape the depths of dense yin. Without the power of the Dao, the passes and fords cannot be opened. May they all reach the altar of the fast and universally receive liberation.

Respectfully, I present this memorial to be heard by the Three Heavens, to dispel impurity and open the Way amid the yellow clouds. May the Four Directions and Six Connections be unobstructed.

I humbly invoke the Direct Envoys of the Most High and the Direct Envoys of the Three Realms, one each, to bear the Talismans of the Most High and the Mandates of the Great Clarity, and proclaim them to the Three Palaces and Nine Bureaus, the One Hundred Twenty Offices, the Five Thearchs’ Examiners and Chief Clerks, the inner and outer palaces and caverns of Fengdu in the Northern Yin, the Five Marchmounts and Nine Dark Realms, the Thirty-Six Prisons of the Four Quarters, the Great Iron Enclosure Mountain and the Avīci Hell, the Springs and Bends of the Yellow River, the Three Primordial Water Palaces, the Five Paths’ Capital, the Earth Lords of the Nine Provinces, the Dao Masters of the Ten Directions, the Mound Sergeants and Tomb Lords, the River Earls and River Marquises, the Elder of the Barrows, the officials of the Two Thousand Stones, the Two August Lords of the Nine Ramparts, the divine officials of the Earth’s Nether Bureaus, the hidden governances of the Grotto-Heavens, the Examiners of the Bureaus, the Chief Officers of Mount Tai, the various hellish offices, the Mountain and Forest Elders, the deities of temples and altars, the great spirits of the Dark and Cold, the **[Year]** Celestial Noble of the Great Year, the City Gods and Earth Lords of the world, the local Earth Gods, the chief officials of the Departments of Good and Evil, the One Hundred Twenty Offices of Divine Officials, the Seventy-Two Forbidden Guardian Generals, the Heavenly Prisons and Earthly Hells, the hidden governances and dark passes, the eternal springs and gates of the netherworld, and all authorities:

Respectfully heed the Mandate of the Most High. Open the passes, unseal the roads, break the locks, and swing wide the gates. Release the departed **[name]**, the souls for deliverance in this assembly, and all beings of the Six Paths and Four Births—lonely souls and lingering spirits—so that they may all proceed to the Mysterious Altar, attend the Three Treasures, receive the transmission of talismans and precepts, hear the Dharma and the scriptures, and attain the fruits of all virtues. May the paths of the unseen be free of peril, and the gates of the netherworld open to carefree passage. When merit is complete and fruit is fulfilled, may they ascend the ranks of immortality. Those who obstruct shall be demoted by the netherworld’s offices.

Imploring the Most High and the Host of Perfected, to distinguish and heed this plea.

Your humble servant, in accordance with the preceding memorial but altering only the direct divine invocation, respectfully submits on behalf of the chief patron **[name]** of the Great Register Fast this "Precious Memorial for Opening the Roads," one document, to be presented to the Bureau of the Most High **[name]** Palace. **Memorial for Refining and Bathing**

Prepared by the Ritual Master, your humble servant **[name]**, with reverence and awe, kowtowing and bowing twice, respectfully addresses this memorial:

Your servant, in accordance with the Mysterious Regulations, now bases this upon the same memorial for invoking the Celestial Vault, having already presented the Dragon Tablet and Advanced Petitions, with external offerings and ritual implements prepared.

Your servant petitions to present this memorial to the Celestial Officials, beseeching the power of the Dao to redeem and deliver the departed souls.

I humbly reflect: From youth, I have admired the Mysterious Wind and early joined the Registers of Governance. Though my name has been presumptuously included among the Libationers, I dare not neglect my duties in submission.

I still fear that the departed **[name]**, the souls for deliverance in this assembly, and the beings of the Six Paths and Four Births—lonely souls and lingering spirits—are bound by the grime of past karma and have fallen into evil origins. Unwashed in body and form, they cannot attend the altar. May they be refined and delivered, each attaining transcendence.

Relying on the compassion of the Dao, I humbly beseech liberation.

Respectfully, I invoke the Five Spirits’ Youths of the Five Directions, five each; the Officers and Generals for Dispelling Impurity, one hundred twenty each; the Bathing Ladies; and the Jade Maidens of the Yellow Flower, one each. May they descend at this time and draw the Divine Water of the Yellow Flower, the Refined Corpse’s Pure Essence, the Cloud Nectar and Jade Wine, and the Golden Dew of Sweet Springs, pouring them into the fragrant waters to bathe the aforementioned departed souls and the boundless suffering spirits. May they wash away the shadows of yin, cleanse the dust of toil, sever the roots of karmic debts and grievances, and purify the inner and outer filth of affliction. Then, may the Five Directions’ Youths invoke the True Qi of the Green Spirit of the Eastern Primordial Elder, nourishing them with the Green Essence of the Nine Qi...

May the Southern Vermilion Spirit of the True Elder bestow the True Qi, nourishing them with the Vermilion Essence of the Three Qi; may the Western Radiant Spirit of the August Elder bestow the True Qi, nourishing them with the Pristine Essence of the Seven Qi; may the Northern Fivefold Spirit of the Mystic Elder bestow the True Qi, nourishing them with the Mystic Spring of the Five Qi; may the Central Primordial Spirit of the Primordial Elder bestow the True Qi, nourishing them with the Yellow Essence of the One Qi. Thus may the souls thus offered partake of this nourishing grace, their hun and po securely settled, their five viscera naturally formed.

We further invoke the Vajra’s Hundredfold Refinement, the Jade Nectar of a Thousand Harmonies, the Flowing Radiance of Venus, and the Primordial Emperor’s Scattered Elixir, to dissolve stagnation, purge impurities, refine body and mind, and illumine wisdom with clarity.

We then invoke the Divine Physicians and Celestial Attendants, the Numinous Officials of Healing. The Three and Five Merit Clerks, the Grand Physicians and Masters, the Attendants of Acupuncture and Stone Needles, and the Numinous Officials of Medicinal Application—may they gather the Supreme Five-Colored Divine Medicines and scatter them within the viscera of the departed souls. May they heal the ailments of the constructive and protective qi from their former lives, needle and purge the stagnations of heart and abdomen, and massage the swellings and sores of qi and blood. For those with severed sinews or broken bones, may their forms be restored and life returned; for those with scattered or fallen limbs, may their substance be renewed and their original state recovered. May flesh grow and muscles lengthen, each part made whole; may bones and body be robust and strong, hun and po unclouded. May sorrow and affliction dissolve, hunger and thirst vanish; may knots be untied, obstructions in the primordial womb dispersed. May form and spirit be upright and proper, their countenances dignified and majestic.

We further invoke the True Water and True Fire of the Celestial Primordial, the Master of Refinement of the Southern Prosperity Upper Palace, the Ninefold Radiance Perfected, the Ninefold Radiance Youths, the Fire Mound Numinous Youths, the Jade Maidens of the Eastern Well, the Great Spirits of Refinement and Salvation, the True Lords of the Five Treasuries, the Governing Masters of Refinement, and the Divine Generals and Officials of Refinement and Salvation—may they restore the dead to their bones, reverse form, and deliver life. May all the true hosts, each bearing their ritual implements, descend to the Mystic Altar. On behalf of the deceased so-and-so, and those souls named in the petition for absolution, together with all the male and female souls thus offered, and universally extending to the six paths, four modes of birth, and all wandering and stagnant spirits, may they be abundantly refined. May they follow the subtle and profound, receive this extraordinary grace, and ascend to the Immortal Realms.

With grace and reverence, we beseech the Most High to distinguish and heed our plea. Your humble servant, following the precedent of the previous petition and altering only the presiding deities, respectfully presents on behalf of the deceased so-and-so and others this Precious Petition for Celestial Bathing, Refinement, and Salvation, to be submitted to the Bureau of the Most High.

[Petition for the Salvation of the Departed appended to the Yellow Register on the third day at dusk, presented at the Altar of the Fast and Offering.]

The Petitioner, in awe and trepidation, bows his head to the ground, prostrates himself, and respectfully addresses:

Your servant, in accordance with the Mystic Regulations, now bases this petition upon the previously submitted Celestial Petition, extending to the presentation of the Dragon Tablet and the offering of ritual tokens. Your servant humbly requests to present the Celestial Petitions for Salvation, beseeching the power of the Dao to uplift and deliver the departed souls. Reflecting upon my youthful admiration for the Mystic Wind and early participation in the Registers of Governance, my name has been recklessly included among the Libationers, and my office dare not neglect its duties of transmission and verification. Having already exhorted and led the ritual currents, I have followed the regulations in performing the rites: ninefold repentance and gratitude, and a three-day proclamation of vows. The Ritual Patron so-and-so has exhausted his sincerity and fulfilled the ceremonies, his words and intent reaching all realms, his grace and light universally bestowed upon the Nine Springs. May the souls thus offered be absolved of their transgressions and karmic burdens; may the Dao return them to the Golden Gates, and the scriptures be fittingly placed within the Jade Caskets. May blessings extend to both the living and the dead, and merit accrue to all.

We respectfully invoke the Lords of Destiny of the Southern Prosperity Upper Palace: the Lord of Life Records, the Lord of Longevity Extension, the Lord of Lifespan Augmentation, the Lord of Tribulation Deliverance, and the Lord of Superior Birth, one each, to elevate the souls of the deceased so-and-so thus offered, and those male and female souls named in the Fengdu Petition, universally extending to the six paths, four modes of birth, and all wandering and stagnant spirits, to be reborn in the Southern Palace, their lifespans recorded on Jade Tablets, their names inscribed in Golden Script.

We further invoke the Great Spirit Sima, the Great Spirit of Life Surveillance, the Numinous Matron of the Protective Chamber, and the Youths of the Cavernous Yang, to refine and deliver the deceased so-and-so and the souls thus offered, together with all wandering and stagnant spirits. May they enter the Divine Courtyard of Flowing Fire and the Yellow Flower Precious Pool, their forms purified and substance renewed, their bones restored and life returned. According to the rank of the Vermilion Palace, may they be entrusted to the transformations of humanity and heaven, re-establish their Mystic Merit, and directly attain the Daoist Fruition.

With grace and reverence, we beseech the Most High to distinguish and heed our plea. Your humble servant, following the precedent of the previous precious petition and altering only the presiding deities, respectfully presents on behalf of the deceased so-and-so and others this Precious Petition for Celestial Salvation, to be submitted to the Bureau of the Most High.
