From the Three Antiquities onward, down to the Great Tang,
The sacred scrolls and numinous texts, now hidden, now revealed,
Appeared in historical records or were separately recorded.
By the Song dynasty, Master Jianji,
In the course of collation, compiled the *Catalogue of Pearl-Bag Scriptures*,
Totaling eighteen thousand scrolls.
Thereafter, war raged in the Jiang region, and armed conflict in Qin,
Many authentic scriptures and secret texts were scattered and lost.
Emperor Wu of the Later Zhou established the Abbey of Penetrating Mystery,
Collecting the various scriptures, still numbering ten thousand scrolls.
When the Sui dynasty’s flames raged and the Tang arose,
Evil vapors were swept away, and the realm was pacified.
By the Kaiyuan era, scriptures and instructions flourished.
Emperor Xuanzong compiled the *Jade Network Catalogue*,
Comprising seven thousand three hundred scrolls.
Additionally, there were separate catalogues of sacred names,
Records, commentaries, and treatises, totaling over nine thousand scrolls.
Soon after, the Two Hu barbarians disrupted the orthodox teachings of Xia.
The two capitals fell into decline, and many secret repositories were burned.
In the Shangyuan era, over six thousand scrolls of scriptures and registers were collected.
By the Dali era, Master Shenfu of the realm,
Through nationwide searches and transcription in the capital,
Amassed another seven thousand scrolls.
After the Changqing era, between the Xiantong years,
The two streets transcribed only five thousand three hundred scrolls.
Recently, as great bandits invaded and the imperial carriage fled south,
The two capitals were reduced to smoke and ashes, the six directions overgrown with brambles,
Temples and abbeys lay in ruins everywhere.
Of the jade tablets and numinous cases, barely a third remained.
I, caught in these dire times, drifted to Chengdu,
Accompanying the imperial return, lingering briefly,
Undertook another search, enduring hardships.
New and old scriptures and edicts numbered only three thousand scrolls,
Yet remained uncompiled.
Moreover, the scriptures obtained during the imperial inspection were soon lost.
I journeyed again through the Three Shu regions, intending further searches,
But was repeatedly hindered by the blades of war, my earlier resolve unfulfilled.

On the third day of the eighth month, gengchen, in the second year of Dashun (Xinhai),
At the Jade Bureau of Transformation in Chengdu, I briefly record this account of the provincial examination of precepts and teachings.
Recorded by Du Guangting.

*Concluded: Scroll Twenty-One of the* Ritual of Establishing the Great Fast of the Supreme Yellow Register
*Begins: Scroll Twenty-Two of the* Ritual of Establishing the Great Fast of the Supreme Yellow Register

Transmitted by Master Liu Chongjing of the Three Caverns, the Serene One
Compiled by Jiang Shuyu, the Celestial Enforcer of the Supreme Dao, Immortal Officer of the Registers

*Section on Rituals*
*First – Rite of Submitting Memorials to the Emperor*

First, the hymn of praise to the Hua-Xia is recited, and the High Priest is led to stand before the Patriarch’s Dao and before the Divine Marshal of Memorials. After offering incense and performing the purification by sprinkling, the Dharma Master makes the invocation, inviting the Perfected to receive the libation.

Next, the *House-Entering Mantra* is recited:
*"The Four Luminaries, Attendants of Merit,
Messengers of the Realized, transmit this truth:
May the primordial qi of the Upper Prime enter my body,
That the memorial I present be conveyed and heard on high."*

The *Hua-Xia* rite follows, with the incense rotated once around. Then, incense is offered at the imperial desk.

Each pays reverence to the masters, visualizing as prescribed.

With the memorial placed upon the tablet, held in both hands at the heart, the officiant stands upright, bows slightly, and visualizes their root master, standing to the west.

Three silent bows are made, then:
—Visualizing the Lords and Elders of the East, three silent bows.
—Visualizing the Heavenly Worthy of Dao and Virtue in the South, three silent bows.
—Visualizing the Three Masters of the West, three silent bows.
—Visualizing the Most High Lord Lao in the North, three silent bows.
—Visualizing the sun to the left and the moon to the right, each nine inches from the face, with the Seven Stars above the head.

Green qi emanates from the liver, filling the chamber, its pure radiance surpassing sun and moon.

Next, visualize:
—General Tang emerging from the left kidney, standing to the left.
—General Ge emerging from the right kidney, standing to the right.
—General Zhou emerging from the heart, standing in front.
Each commands thirty million soldiers, all clad in crimson, resplendent.

Then visualize the Five Virtue Generals—the five spirits—arrayed in the four directions.

Next, visualize:
—The celestial couriers and armored guards emerging from the navel.
—The Heavenly Ding warriors emerging from the forehead.
—The wolf officers and tiger guards emerging from between the brows.
—The riders of the fierce winds and placers of documents emerging from the knees.
—The qi-gathering and qi-consuming officers emerging from the nose.

Then visualize the jade youths and maidens who transmit memorials, standing to the left and right. The Directing Attendant of Merit, clad in crimson with a black headband, stands before them.

Only then proceed with the ritual.

The Dao of immortals manifests in the flicker of an instant; delay not in visualization. Let the mind be ever alert, for with each thought, clarity arises.

Next, the *Mantra of Guarding the Spirits* is recited, followed by twenty-four strikes of the Dharma drum.

Invoking the Brazier

The Supreme Mysterious Origin Five Numinous Venerable Lords, summon now the Attendants of Merit, the Left and Right Dragon-Tiger Lords, the Incense-Bearing Attendants, and the Three Qi Rectifying Spirits. Hasten to report above to the Three Heavens’ Mysterious Origin Supreme Dao Lord.

Your servant now kindles this incense, reverently offering it on behalf of the master of the retreat, so-and-so, to directly present the deceased kin, so-and-so, and universally present all the assembled souls. On such-and-such a day, an unsurpassed Yellow Register Grand Retreat was established to provide aid for their transcendence.

In strict accordance with the ritual protocols, petitions to the Celestial Offices were previously submitted—so many scrolls of such-and-such a petition—ascending to such-and-such a palace bureau for processing at such-and-such a palace.

May the upright and true life-qi of the eight directions descend into your servant’s body, that what your servant petitions may swiftly ascend and directly reach the presence of the Jade August Thearch, the Supreme Honored One of the Limitless Dao.

Each proclaims their dharma rank:

With due reverence, your servant so-and-so, holding the dharma rank, humbly petitions the Vacuous and Spontaneous Primordial Heavenly Venerable One, the Limitless Dao Supreme Lord of the Dao, the Supreme Venerable Lord, the August Jade Thearch on High, the hosts of great sages who have attained the Dao in the ten directions, the Heavenly Venerables and Perfected Ones, the Great Thearchs and Celestial Thearchs, the Great Dharma Masters of the Mysterious Center, the Great Dharma Masters of the Three Heavens, the Perfected Lord of Orthodox Unity and Serene Response, the Perfected Woman Master of Orthodox Unity, the Perfected Heirs and Lineage Masters of Orthodox Unity, the Three Yuan Perfected Lords Tang, Ge, and Zhou, the divine administrators of the various bureaus under the Three Heavens, the transcendent officials who transmit petitions to the celestial bureaus, the numinous officials and registrars of such-and-such a petition in the Celestial Offices, the transcendent generals and officers governing the registers of the dharma, the spirit honored in such-and-such a year, and all the responsive and mighty numina within and beyond the Three Realms.

Your servant, born of flesh and blood, a humble being of dust and clay, by fortunate karmic conditions has presumptuously ascended the ranks of the dharma. Bearing talismans and registers, I follow and practice the teachings and methods.

May all universally enter the gate of the dharma.

Should any seek refuge and submission, it is fitting to report and inform. Now your disciple, [Name], moved by the bonds of righteousness and desiring to repay kindness, is earnest in cultivation and reverence. Wishing to establish the merit of a fast, broadly bestowing hidden blessings, I humbly request to follow the ritual statutes and present a memorial in worship. May the universal bestowal of wisdom’s power open the dark paths to prosperity. Your servant, unworthily filling the office of Libationer, bears the duty of proclamation and transcription. With reverence, I petition the Three Heavens and offer sincerity to the host of sages. Looking upward, I hope for resonance and response; bowing downward, I pray for inspection and regard. May celestial grace descend, and the memorial ascend. Let the prayers be fulfilled, and both the hidden and manifest realms receive favor. May the winds of Orthodox Unity forever flourish, and the transformative power of great compassion universally extend.

Your servant, with utmost sincerity and awe, prostrates and bows twice. Respectfully, I make this known.

Next, proceeding to the thrones of the Three Pure Ones, I offer incense to summon the sages and pour libations in ritual observance. Before the thrones of the Three Pure Ones, one censer of incense is offered at each. Before the Supreme Clarity, a censer of blazing, abundant incense must be maintained without interruption in its smoke—this is the decree of ascending tranquility.

Next, I knock my teeth twenty-four times. Kneeling lengthily, I invoke the officials; all officials likewise kneel lengthily.

Respectfully, I summon the Five Body Perfected Officials and the Merit Archivists from within my own body. The Direct Envoys of the Upper Transcendents and Upper Numinous Ones, two Orthodox Unity Merit Archivists, two Healing Merit Archivists, two Left and Right Official Envoys, two Yin-Yang Divine Decision Clerks, two Red Talisman Chariot Clerks, and two Post Horse Memorial Clerks emerge. Those who emerge don proper attire, caps, and pendent tassels, arraying their majestic dignity. The Direct Envoy Merit Archivists wear the Cap of Penetrating Heaven, holding black single-layered robes. The Orthodox Unity Merit Archivists wear the Scarlet Yang Turban, crimson single-layered robes, and gird themselves with dragon-headed swords, bearing memorial tablets. The Envoys wear the Dark Yin Turban, the Nine Virtues Cap, multicolored corded single-layered robes, tiger-symbol girdles, and carry jade tablets.

The Direct Envoy Merit Archivists stand at the four directions; the Orthodox Unity Merit Archivists stand at the center; the Healing Merit Archivists guard and protect your servant’s body. The Left Official Envoys erect standards at the front; the Right Official Envoys hold banners at the rear. The Yang Divine Decision Clerks stand to the left; the Yin Divine Decision Clerks stand to the right. The Wolf Clerks, Tiger Warriors, Inspectors of Treachery, Hook Cavalry, Three Officials’ Archers, Celestial Couriers, Celestial Soldiers, Celestial Might Generals, Rectifying and Upholding Clerks, Qi-Gathering and Qi-Consuming Clerks, Spirit-Gathering and Spirit-Consuming Clerks, Ghost-Gathering and Ghost-Consuming Clerks, Toxin-Gathering and Toxin-Consuming Clerks, Evil-Gathering and Evil-Consuming Clerks, Essence-Gathering and Essence-Consuming Clerks, Fever-Gathering and Fever-Consuming Clerks, Talisman-Subduing and Shrine-Destroying Clerks, Gale-Riding Clerks, and Flying Dragon-Riding Clerks—two of each—emerge, all arrayed and standing before, behind, to the left, and right of your servant. They all receive the words from your servant’s mouth, distinguishing the memorial to be presented to the Celestial Officials of such-and-such a petition, and report to the Perfected Officials within the district, the Qi-Recording Overseers, the Examiners and Summoners of the District Lords, the Left and Right Capital Lords, the Lords and Clerks of the Four Directions, the Two Mysteries and Three Primordials of the Dao spread below by the Celestial Master, the August Thearch of the Twelve Hours of the Four Beginnings of the Twelve Earthly Branches of the Royal Heaven, the Lords of Jiazi, the Benevolent Lords of Bingzi, the Red Yang Lords of the Five Sevens, the Lords of the Twenty-Five Offices, and all Examiners and Summoners of the various Lords and Clerks.

The twenty-four male and female officials of such-and-such a register received by your servant, the twenty-four male and female qi, the twenty-four male and female offices, the twenty-four yin and yang qi of the left and right within the register, the Great Generals of Erecting Standards and Supervising Merit, the true qi of the high and low within the register, the Front Division’s Merit Effecters, the Rear Division’s Executioners, the Post Station Commandants and Vice-Commandants, the Four Divisions’ Memorial-Overseeing Attendants, Memorial-Reviewing Attendants, Memorial-Presenting Attendants, Memorial-Recording Attendants, Memorial-Transmitting Attendants, Memorial-Guarding Attendants, Memorial-Fixing Attendants, Memorial-Collating Attendants, Memorial-Carrying Attendants, and the Five Hundred Seal-Bearing Attendants; the Eastern Nine Yi, Southern Eight Man, Western Six Rong, Northern Five Di, Central Three Qin; the over thirty-six thousand gods of the Mysterious Origin Beginning; the mountains, rivers, streams, valleys, and the Lords and Clerks of the Altars of Soil and Grain—all join in sincerity to report above to the Supreme Clarity, Mysterious Origin, Peerless Three Heavens, Boundless Great Dao, the Most High Lord Lao, the Heavenly Thearch Lord of the Celestial Venerable, the Nine Elder Transcendents of the Celestial Venerable, the Nine Qi Venerable, the myriad layers of Dao qi, the twelve hundred Lords of the Offices, before the Seven Treasures Jade Steps of the Golden Portal of Supreme Clarity, the Celestial Master, Female Master, Heir Master, and Lineage Master Ladies, under the Dao’s gate, the Upper Officials and Scribes, the minor assisting clerks, who carry out the affairs of documents.

Your servant, of fleshly substance, is dull and ignorant in all matters, yet bears the duty of proclamation and transcription. I universally proclaim the Master’s commands to succor and relieve the people and all beings.

At this moment, with reverence, so-and-so respectfully submits such-and-such a memorial, which now rests upon your servant’s plain desk, enclosed within its case. Your servant prostrates himself and recites the memorial according to ritual. The Attendant Officers and Messengers, having jointly prepared the proceedings, are specially granted direct audience. With care, the jade case is opened, and the memorial’s text is read in prostration.

Next, incense is held in the hand-warmer, and the memorial case is unsealed with the dragon-headed writing knife. Three rounds of tooth-clicking are performed, and the invocation is spoken:

*"Attendants of the Four Clarities, Opening-Case Clerks—*
*With writing knife in hand, unseal the case’s track.*
*The memorial ascends in petition, opening the Dao’s path.*
*The deceased rise to heaven, the living receive protection.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as in the statutes and decrees!"*

Then the memorial is drawn from the case and passed over the incense. Three more rounds of tooth-clicking are performed, and the invocation is spoken:

*"Smoke of five colors, bearing the memorial to heaven.*
*Qi of five hues, conveying the memorial to the Thearch.*
*Let no wayward qi of subordinate officials dare interfere.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as in the statutes and decrees!"*

Next, the Dharma Master hands the memorial to the Scripture Attendant, who kneels to receive it. Together with the incense attendants, they present the golden fish to the right and the jade wild goose to the left.

The Dharma Master who recites the memorial then faces the Heavenly Gate and bows twice. Advancing on his knees to the petitioning official’s station, he bows twice more, maintaining the prescribed posture. Upon completing the recitation, the memorial is placed upon the desk, with the writing knife set to the left and the brush to the right. The Dharma Master bows twice more and returns to his position, comforting the memorial as ritual dictates.

Next, the Dharma Master places the memorial upon the incense burner of the imperial desk to be fumigated. Two rounds of tooth-clicking are performed to dispatch the memorial.

With reverence, your servant dispatches the True Officials of the Five Viscera within his body, each accompanied by a minor clerk, twelve scribal assistants, all properly capped and sashed with hanging cords, grinding ink and dipping brushes. At this time, your servant, acting with diligence, respectfully submits such-and-such a memorial to the Celestial Officials, presenting it to the Bureau of such-and-such a Celestial Palace for adjudication.

Your servant, foolish and unworthy, has presumptuously taken part in the administration of registers. His ears and eyes are blocked, his inspections and verifications unclear. The memorial now submitted may contain errors: ranks out of order, characters poorly formed, omissions or transpositions, phrases disjointed, front mistaken for back, left for right. May the officials of yin and yang, the divine clerks, the messengers, the scribal assistants, and the minor functionaries follow the memorial in its presentation, wielding the dragon-headed writing knife to seek out and amend the text, using long, sharp brushes to certify and correct according to ritual. Let no supervising official reject it, but allow the qi to close and the memorial to ascend directly to the presence of the Most High Lord Lao, to the Left Clerk before his throne and the Right Clerk at the passes, passing through each office in sequence. Let each gate be opened in turn, each office notified in order. May those your servant has petitioned descend, those he has summoned arrive, those he has sought to deliver be delivered, and those he has memorialized reach their destination.

Should any subordinate official’s wayward qi intercept your servant’s memorial and prevent its ascent, let them be recorded and delivered to the nearest prison, punished according to the statutes, to uphold the celestial decrees.

Your servant prostrates himself to the left of the desk, awaiting the sacred response with reverence.

The memorial is sealed in its case. The Scripture Attendant bears the memorial, accompanied by the Fast Supervisor. With solemn dignity and refined praise, they are led to the burning site. The Scripture Attendant reads the memorial and recites the pass-opening litany. The memorial is burned with the appropriate hymn. The Dharma Master prostrates himself and presents it according to ritual, awaiting the response.

The hymn of ascent is raised, and the officials are received in prostration.

The submission of the memorial now complete, the Attendant Officers and Messengers, all the numinous officials and clerks who emerged from your servant’s Gate of Myriad Wonders, return to their places—those on the left to the left, those on the right to the right. The Directing Attendant Officer oversees and verifies, returning to the palace chambers without error. Should they be summoned again, let it proceed as before.

Three rounds of tooth-clicking are performed, and saliva is swallowed three times. The incense burner is restored.

The Incense Officials and Messengers, the Lords of the Left and Right Dragon-Tiger, and all the numinous officials attending the incense—may they cause golden liquid, cinnabar, and azure mushroom blossoms to arise naturally at the place where your servant presents the memorial. May the hundred spirits and host of perfected ones converge here before the incense burner. May your disciple, so-and-so, and his entire household receive blessings, with both the hidden and manifest realms receiving grace.

May the jade maidens and immortal youths of the ten directions, who attend the incense smoke, transmit your servant’s words and the memorial just presented directly to the august presence of the Most High Jade Sovereign of the Limitless Dao.

The Hymn of Departure from the Hall is raised. Before the Heavenly Master, the ritual of thanksgiving is performed. The Cloud Chariot escorts the Master away. The recitation of merits concludes. The rite of offering is conducted to request blessings.

This ceremony is not recorded in ancient rituals. Master Tang established it, and it is now followed as available. If the Master is a scholar of antiquity, he should adhere to the old methods of the Jin and Tang dynasties.

First, purify and arrange all offerings—incense, lamps, tea, wine, fruits, and the implements for the offering—each prepared according to proper ritual. Next, the water is consecrated to cleanse impurities, and the grand liturgy ascends the altar.

The *Entering the Chamber Spell* is recited. Circling the offering mat, the incense is carried once around, while the Daoist assembly stands in ranks according to sequence. Each bows to the Master, maintaining proper mindfulness.

The *Guardian Spirit Spell* is recited.

The twenty-four strikes of the Dharma drum resound. The Most High Three Heavens’ Primordial Origin and First Three Qi, the Supreme Lord Lao, summon forth from within us the thirty-six each of the Three and Five Merit Officials, the Left and Right Attending Envoys, the Left and Right Incense-Bearers, the Courier Dragon Riders, the Golden Lads Attending Incense, the Jade Maidens Transmitting Words and Scattering Flowers, and the Five Thearchs’ Direct Talismans and Daily Incense Officials. Let those summoned array themselves in solemn attire and open the gates of this local earth deity and the true officials and divine spirits of this domain. We now reverently burn incense to petition on behalf of [Name] for the establishment of the Supreme Yellow Register Grand Retreat. The rites of the Dao now concluded, we respectfully set forth a pure offering altar, one seat of several ranks. We humbly beseech the vast grace of the Most High, that the life-qi of the Ten Directions’ True and Upright Ones may descend and flow into our bodies, so that our petition may swiftly ascend to the presence of the Most High, Boundless, and Utmost Dao, the Perfect and Jade August Thearch.

Next, kneeling in prostration, we summon the officials, strike the teeth, and swallow the saliva according to ritual. Together, we summon forth from within our bodies the true officials and merit officials of our five viscera, the twelve each of the officials who ascend to the Three Heavens, enforce the Dharma and transform beings, the yin and yang merit officials, and those who deliver from the Dao, dispel calamities, scatter misfortune, and resolve adversities. From within us, the governing officials of our bodies: the Great General Who Establishes the Standard and Oversees Merit in our office, the Vanguard Who Effects Merit, the Rear Guard Who Effects Severity, the Courier Court Director, the Courier Court Deputy, the Inspectors of the Four Quarters’ Merit, the Petitioners, the Transcendent and Numinous, the Direct Merit Officials, the Left and Right Attending Envoys, the Yin and Yang Spirit-Deciding Officials, the Scarlet Talisman Chariot Officials, the Gale Courier Officials, the Courier Horse Memorial Officials, the Flying Dragon Riders, and two each of all other officials, emerge. Let those summoned array themselves in solemn attire, displaying their regalia, with caps and pendants hanging in proper order, their dignity and bearing impeccable.

The Merit Officials wear crimson yang headbands, the Heaven-Pervading Crown, black silk unlined robes, and gird themselves with dragon-headed swords, bearing the petition registers. The Envoys wear dark yin headbands, the Nine Virtues Crown, vermilion unlined robes, and gird themselves with tiger tallies, carrying jade tablets. The Direct Merit Officials stand at the four directions; the Orthodox Unity Merit Official stands at the center; the Healing Merit Official guards our bodies. The Left Attending Envoys establish the standard at the front; the Right Attending Envoys hold the banners at the rear. The Yang Spirit-Deciding Official stands to the left; the Yin Spirit-Deciding Official stands to the right. The Upper Merit Official stands above; the Middle Merit Official stands within our bodies. The Urging Qi Merit Official hastens the Ten Directions. The Upper Envoys gaze afar toward the heavens; the Middle Envoys survey the eight directions. The Capital Envoys encircle our bodies. The Wolf Officials and Tiger Warriors, the Inspectors of Treachery and Hook Riders, the Capital Officials and Archers, the Heavenly Couriers and Armored Soldiers, the Heavenly Might Warriors, the Rectifying and Upholding Officials, the Spirit-Seizing and Spirit-Feeding Officials, the Ghost-Seizing and Ghost-Feeding Officials, the Qi-Seizing and Qi-Feeding Officials, the Toxin-Seizing and Toxin-Feeding Officials, the Essence-Seizing and Essence-Feeding Officials, the Evil-Seizing and Evil-Feeding Officials, the Talisman-Destroying and Shrine-Demolishing Officials, the Gale Courier Officials, the Courier Horse Memorial Officials, the Flying Dragon Riders, and all others, station themselves to our left and right, before and behind, to receive our words and transmit them accordingly.

This local earth deity, the true officials and inspectors, the Left and Right Capital Lords of Rectification, the Twenty-Eight Treatments established by the Heavenly Master, the Thirty-Six Retreat Huts, the Seventy-Two Blessed Lands, the Three Hundred Sixty Named Mountains, the Kunlun and other Upper Palaces and Grotto-Heavens of the Seas and Peaks, the Three Origins and Four Beginnings, the Twenty-Four Qi, the Twelve Bureau Deities, the Year Star and Great Yin, the Officers of the Jiazi, the Three Myriad Six Thousand Spirits of the Primordial Origin and First Qi, those currently serving in the memorials, the Eastern Yi, Southern Man, Western Rong, Northern Di, and Central Three Qin, the Five Elder Spirit Lords, the deities of mountains, streams, and valleys, and the numinous officials and generals—all join in sincerity to reverently petition the Most High, Boundless, and Utmost Dao, the Primordial Heavenly Worthy; the Most High Lord of the Great Dao; the Supreme Lord Lao; the Most High Elder, the Supreme and Mysterious Lord; the Ten Directions’ Boundless Great Dao and the Host of Sages and Heavenly Worthies of Virtue; the Perfect and Great Thearchs and Heavenly Thearchs; the Thirty-Six Divisions of Venerable Scriptures; the Heavenly Master, Great Dharma Master of the Mysterious Center; the Host of Numinous Treasures and the Mighty Spirits of the Three Realms.

By our karmic destiny and affinity, we have presumptuously transmitted the teachings and Dharma. On the day of our covenant, we pledged to uphold and practice them. We vowed to propagate the true wind and broadly transform all beings. Now, for our disciple [Name], we reverently follow the ritual codes and uphold the precious retreat. Having dispersed the jade altar, we now present this pure offering. We look up to repay the vast creation and express our sincere devotion. We prostrate ourselves and earnestly beseech the Merit Officials, Envoys, and Flying Dragon Riders to transmit our memorial swiftly on our behalf. May the Three Clarities’ Great Thearchs and the Ten Poles’ Lofty Perfected Ones universally bestow their vast compassion, casting their radiance and descending their gaze. May they pour grace upon the earth below and bestow blessings upon the depths of the springs. May fortune extend to the living and the dead, and blessings be shared by families and states. With utmost reverence and awe, we bow our heads to the ground, our urgency and sincerity unbounded. We respectfully submit this memorial for your hearing. Each declares their Dharma rank.

Having declared their Dharma ranks, they undertake the grand jiao ritual of merit in accordance with the Yellow Register’s teachings.

Your servant [Name], together with the assembled altar officials, humbly and with one heart petitions the Vacuous and Spontaneous Primordial Heavenly Worthy of Original Commencement, the Boundless Dao’s Most High Great Dao Lord, the Most High Lord Lao, the August Jade Thearch, the ten directions’ great holy multitudes who have attained the Dao, the perfected lords and venerable masters, the thirty-two Heavenly Thearchs, the Jade Clarity Highest Deity, the Great Thearch of the Jade Capital, the Eastern Florescence, Southern Culmen, Western Numinous, Northern Perfected, and the Seven-Treasure Jeweled Terrace of the Purple Tenuity’s Upper Palace’s Numinous Treasure Perfected Radiant August Dao Lord; the Great Dharma Master of the Mysterium, the Heavenly Master Lord; the supreme ministers and prime ministers; the Four Offices and Five Thearchs; and all the perfected numina of the Three Realms’ officialdom.

Your servant reverently conducts the supreme Yellow Register grand fast on behalf of disciple [Name]. With the merit complete and the rites concluded, we respectfully choose an auspicious evening. Having prepared the jiao offering with utmost devotion, we invite the descent of the sacred perfected of the various heavens, the Numinous Treasure’s officialdom, the Three Realms’ administrative offices, and all governing numina. May they deign to descend in their chariots and inspect our sincere devotion.

We, unable to contain our longing as we gaze toward heaven and yearn for the sacred, prostrate ourselves in utmost urgency and reverence, bowing our heads twice to present our petition.

Next, the descent of the sacred is invoked.
Incense is offered.
Tea is presented.
Wine is offered.

The ritual procession circles the jiao altar once, bearing incense, and stands before the grotto shrine.
The long chant ritual is performed.
Each declares their Dharma rank.

Your servant [Name], together with disciple [Name] and the assembled altar officials, once more humbly and with one heart petitions the Three Clarities’ august sages, the Ten Poles’ lofty perfected, the numinous immortals of heaven and earth, the sun, moon, and stellar lodges, the Four Offices and Five Thearchs, the true officials of the mountains and rivers, the Numinous Treasure’s immortal courts, the Three Realms’ officialdom, and all perfected numina descending in response to the jiao altar.

We have long been blessed with residual fortune, having encountered the true wind. We have presumptuously borne the numinous scriptures and received the profound teachings. Our merit is as light as dust and dew, while our transgressions weigh like mountains and hills. Rightly should we restrain ourselves and exercise self-discipline. Yet the Dharma permits salvation and assisting the state in establishing merit. For all who take refuge, it is impossible in principle to refuse or reject. Bound by the words of the ritual, how dare we not make this known above?

The proclamation is recited.
In accordance with the ritual’s words, we have exerted utmost sincerity.

The fast’s sponsor, [Name], reverently upholds the true Dao and bears the Dharma’s token. Following the ritual codes, we have respectfully established the imperial altar. Conducting the supreme fast, we exhaust the sincerity of serving heaven. Bowing our heads to the Ten Poles, we turn in reverence to the Three Luminaries. We repent our accumulated sins before the divine scriptures and apologize for past transgressions before the mountains and rivers. Adorning each direction with radiant colors, we ensure utmost purity and solemnity. The incense and lamps are arrayed without lapse or interruption. Blue petitions and vermilion memorials ascend to the Mysterious Capital. Jade talismans and golden writs descend to the nether realms. Assured of the fast’s merit coming to fruition, we pray for the fulfillment of virtuous vows. May the hidden and manifest alike prosper, and the living and dead alike receive blessings.

Now that the ritual affairs are complete and the immortal’s model has concluded, the true chariots return to the upper mysteries, and the Dharma’s flow disperses to the lower realms. The scriptures are gathered into their precious scrolls, and the Dao returns to the Jade Capital. The Sanskrit qi’s tablets are removed, and the jade lotus’s tassels are inverted. We reverently consider the Three Realms and all perfected numina, the scriptures’ mighty spirits, and the altar’s guardian officers. From the initial invocation to the altar’s dispersal, following the canonical rites, we have performed the ninefold morning petitions. We have overseen and protected, ensuring unimpeded comings and goings. The laboring officials and hastening officers have fulfilled their duties. Respectfully presenting the jiao rites, we reverently give thanks for the numinous grace.

We humbly pray that you may briefly halt your cloud chariots and linger in your precious conveyances. Partake of this purity, and witness this sincerity. Bestow abundant fortune upon this household and descend auspicious blessings upon its members. May the netherworld flourish, and may the living and dead alike receive your grace.

We, unable to contain our utmost reverence and urgency, bow our heads twice, offer incense, and present the second libation of wine.

Next, the ritual procession circles the jiao altar once, bearing incense, and stands in order before the grotto shrine.
The long chant ritual is performed.

Your servant [Name], together with disciple [Name] and others, once more humbly and with one heart petitions the Most High Three Worthies, the ten directions’ sacred multitudes, the Three Realms’ officialdom, and all perfected numina.

We have heard that the great Dao is non-action, and its divine power is unfathomable. It engenders and completes heaven and earth, nurturing the myriad numina. It benevolently aids the hidden and manifest, bestowing benefit upon all beings. For all who present their prayers, resonance is surely attained.

Now disciple [Name], having planted good causes in past lives, has taken refuge in the true teaching. Deeply indebted to its boundless grace, we have striven to repay it without lapse. The precious fast has concluded on this auspicious night, and the pure jiao is again presented on this propitious evening. We answer the virtue of heaven and earth’s engendering and completing, and give thanks for the true numina’s protection and guardianship. We wash away the transgressions of accumulated lifetimes and dissolve the karmic knots of a hundred existences. May the departed ascend, and may our kin be safeguarded.

We humbly beseech the august sages to bestow their compassion and the perfected to grant their protection. May the Three Officials record our goodness, and the Five Thearchs inscribe our names. May merit and virtue be fully perfected, and good affinities come to fruition. May fortune flow without limit, and benefit extend to all sentient beings.

First, we pray for our ancestral line and former sages, the state’s august numina, that they may long preserve their great enterprise and ensure the prosperity of their descendants. May the emperor’s heavenly foundation endure forever, and his sagely lifespan know no bounds. May the four barbarians all submit, and the five weapons be laid to rest. May yin and yang harmonize in sequence, and wind and rain arrive in due season. May the year bring abundant harvests, and all things be free from blight and pestilence.

Next, we pray for disciple [Name] and their ancestors of a hundred thousand generations, the suffering souls and hidden spirits, that all may partake of the wondrous goodness’s merit and together attain the path of transcendence. May the dead souls undergo refinement, forever casting off the bonds of defilement; may their true nature endure, suddenly awakening to the fruit of non-action.

Next, we pray for ourselves and our families, our entire clan and kin. May our bodies harmonize with primordial harmony, and our spirits merge with the wondrous Dao. Like gold refined and jade polished, may our fortune and prosperity increase in grandeur; like mirrors bright and dust cleared, may our lifespans extend into the distant future. May disasters dissipate like mist, and goodness arrive like clouds. Whether moving or still, flying or submerged, within the realm or beyond, may all partake of vast fortune and together bathe in the profound grace.

Finally, we pray for the spirits of this place, the local earth deities, that they too may partake of the fast’s power and ascend the immortal ranks. May they guard the home and pacify the household, bringing peace to people and protection to all things. May those in the three paths and five sufferings, the six destinies and four births, those who died in battle or perished in war, the sunken souls and lingering spirits—may all receive the Dao’s power, universally attain special merit, swiftly depart the dark passes, and soon transcend to the true realms.

May we humbly look up to the true responses, that they may fully accord with our prayers. With heads bowed in reverence, we present the final libation. The rites of the jiao altar are now complete, respectfully proclaimed in full.

Next, we offer the chariots and carriages, the paper money and horses, and present the *General Memorial of Merit and Virtue*. The ritual procession circles the jiao banquet with incense, completing one round before standing in order before the grotto altar.

We, your humble servants, once more offer our sincerest devotion, reverently invoking the Perfected and Greatly Sagely, the Boundless and Exalted, the True Spirits of the Three Realms, and all their divine retinues. We dutifully uphold the immortal statutes and celebrate the completion of the Daoist canon. The rites have been fulfilled with the threefold offering, and blessings now descend in a hundred auspicious forms. May all that we desire be granted, and all that we seek be realized. May merit extend to the water and land realms, and goodness reach both the living and the dead. May all sentient beings partake of the profound grace.

Yet we fear that we, your servants, may have been unprepared in our study of the law, or may have transgressed in our conduct. Your disciples, so-and-so, may have erred in the offerings or fallen short in the rites. We humbly beseech your forgiveness and the universal bestowal of vast mercy. Though we are but dust in the mortal world, we dare not delay. Gazing up, we see the true chariots already ascending the cloudy heavens. May the grace of your ascent not fail our prayers.

Our hearts below are filled with boundless longing and hope for your favor. With deepest reverence, we bow twice and take our leave.

*Returning the Chariot Hymn*
Kneeling in prostration, we receive the official decrees.

The memorial is now concluded. The *Gongcao* messengers previously dispatched shall return to our bodies: entering through the Gate of Myriad Mysteries, those on the left return to the left, those on the right to the right. The *Zhishi* *Gongcao* shall preside over and supervise their return. Let each resume their original position, with no errors or confusion. When summoned again, let them arrive as before.

The incense is restored to the censer.

Fragrant Official Messengers, the Lords of the Left Dragon and Right Tiger, and all Attending Fragrant Spirit-Officials—may this place of ritual offering naturally generate golden liquid, cinnabar, azure mushrooms, and divine herbs. May the hundred spirits and host of perfected beings gather here before the incense burner. May the living and the deceased receive blessings, may households and the realm be graced with favor, and may the golden lads and jade maidens of the ten directions attend and guard the fragrant smoke. Convey this servant’s sincerity, as previously expressed, directly to the Most High, Boundless, and Utmost Dao—the Perfected Jade Emperor of the Supreme Heavenly Thearch.

Chant the hymns of burning, proceed to the pyre site, and dedicate the merit. Recite the good, intone the completion of the ritual offering—let all officials return to their positions.

*Concluding the Twenty-Second Scroll of the* Supreme Yellow Register Great Fast’s Established Rites
*Beginning the Twenty-Third Scroll of the* Supreme Yellow Register Great Fast’s Established Rites

*Transmitted by Master Chongjing of the Three Caverns, retained for use by the Most High’s Enforcing Immortal Officer Jiang Shuyu*

*Section on Ritual Procedures*
*Rite of Requesting Light and Dividing the Flame*

First prepare a bright torch and place it before the Three Treasures. The Daoist assembly arranges ranks at the fast altar, inviting the fast’s officiant to offer incense and bow. The ritual proceedings commence.

Next, the Dharma Master, together with the Attendants of Incense and Lamplight, approaches the Dao and requests the light.

The Dharma Master petitions:
Your humble servant, [Name], in full Dharma rank, now petitions the Jade Pure Highest Emperor, the Heavenly Venerable of Primordial Beginning; the Supreme Pure Great Emperor, the Heavenly Venerable of Numinous Treasure; the Grand Pure Great Emperor, the Heavenly Venerable of Dao and Virtue; the Eastern Ultimate Great Unity, the Heavenly Venerable Who Saves from Suffering; the Heavenly Venerables of the Ten Directions Who Respond to Cries for Salvation; the Greatly Compassionate and Greatly Merciful Perfected Who Save from Suffering; the Greatly Compassionate, Greatly Merciful, and Greatly Wise Perfected; and the Five Preceptor Perfected Lords of Numinous Treasure.

This servant has heard that the four kinds of birth dwell in darkness, never straying from the path of delusion; the six destinies languish in gloom, abiding forever in eternal night.

This servant has accumulated the filth of unilluminated obscurity, never encountering the radiant grace of resplendent mercy. Thus does the Preceptor’s Treasure extend compassion, as the Perfected Lords of the Emperor emanate transformation. They reveal the luminous statutes of reflected brilliance and descending light, unfolding the rites of the Lamp Repentance to dissolve transgressions. Above, it illumines the manifold heavens, augmenting the splendor of the Three Mornings; below, it shines through the Nine Nights, halting the bitterness of the myriad hells. At its center, it reflects through the ten directions, universally aiding the six destinies. The divine light universally bestowed—its wondrous efficacy defies comprehension.

Now, this disciple [Name] respectfully dedicates this offering for the departed kin [Name], and universally for all the assembled souls, establishing the Supreme Yellow Register Grand Fast to aid their deliverance. Reverently following the ritual protocols, the altar is arrayed. The divine lamps are kindled, dispelling the darkness of the unseen.

Humbly beseeching the celestial light to descend in aid, and the blessings of the Dao to flow abundantly, may the nine-hued radiance be released to deliver the suffering souls of the Yellow Springs. Throughout the ten Dharma realms and the Nine Nights’ nether gates, may all, by the merit of this illumination, together fulfill their aspirations for ascent.

With bowed head, we take refuge and invoke the empowerment of the Lamp’s fruition.
Great Sage, Primordial Beginning Heavenly Venerable,
Great Sage, Jade Pure Heavenly Venerable,
Great Sage, Mysterious Origin Heavenly Venerable.

The Dharma Master holds the talismanic candle in hand and recites the *Divine Radiance Returning* incantation:

Nine suns’ utmost purity, the Three Heavens’ Dao illumined.
Sun and moon’s divine splendor, starlight conjoined in brightness.
Threefold blossoms’ precious radiance, merging with all crystalline hues.
The Three Treasures unfold their glory, wisdom’s light awakens the divine.
Ever descending through the flying void, below it illumines the netherdark.
With a single flash of wisdom’s light, it pervades and pierces the ten directions.
The Three Wretched Paths cease their opposition, the Five Sufferings halt their turning.
The flames of Fire Mountain are stilled, ice melts and snows dissolve.
Blades transform into jade trees, swords become towering forests.
Iron cities crumble to ruin, souls ascend to Jade Clarity.
Your servant now humbly invokes, beseeching the gift of opening and clarity.
Sun and moon’s numinous consorts, starlight’s perfected ones—
the twelve bearers of the burden bow their heads in reverent compliance.
Scattering the lamps’ radiance, it shines through the cold courts.

The Dharma Master brings the talismanic candle before the Three Treasures, invoking the light into his hand, and recites the *Wisdom Light Dividing* incantation:

Vermilion brightness unfolds the chart, the workings of destiny naturally revealed.
The Three Luminaries’ brilliance opened, since before kalpas uncounted.
Today’s great celebration: sunken souls receive refinement.
The dense gloom of darkness forever sealed in the cold springs.
We now invoke wisdom’s light to shatter the gates of the netherworld.
Frozen cold warmed to harmony, furnace coals’ flames extinguished.
Blade mountains and sword trees forever severed from grasping.
Turning the light toward the ten directions, it illumines all heavens.
Souls dissolve the Five Encumbrances, karmic entanglements are erased.
The Three Celestial Bodies shine as one, through eternal kalpas unchanging.
The Light-Opening Lads, bearing grace from the Supreme Mystery,
The Three Lights’ Jade Maidens—may they fulfill this prayer as spoken.

The incense and lamp attendants, each with paper candles, approach the Dharma Master’s talismanic candle and divide its light into three torches.
The Dharma Master divides the radiance:
One gives rise to two, two gives rise to three, three gives rise to the ten thousand things.
Universally illumining the sunken darkness, all in the assembly of the pure and clear are invited to share in the radiance.

The *Flowing Light Dharma Realm Heavenly Venerable*

The incense and lamp attendants distribute and light the altar’s lamps.
Each officiant holds a paper candle, approaching the Dharma Master’s hand to receive and kindle their light.
The altar’s lamps are all fully lit, their brightness clear and far-reaching, their splendor reflecting through the ten directions.
The officiants stand in order and chant the *Returning Radiance Flying Light Hymn*.

The Dharma Master offers the dedication:
The merit of the lamps just kindled is measureless and supreme.
Dedicated to the deliverance of the hidden spirits, their ascent to the Pure Realms.
Forever parted from suffering’s darkness, eternally dwelling in light.
Benefiting the ten directions, grace extending to the Six Paths.
As an offering of the finest karmic affinity, we invoke:
The Three Clarities’ Supreme Heavenly Venerables,
The Great Unity Savior from Suffering Heavenly Venerable,
The Ten Directions’ Savior from Suffering Heavenly Venerables.
Inconceivable merit and virtue.

*Golden Bell and Jade Chime Rite*
First, place the golden bell and jade chime outside the main gate, before the incense table—the bell to the left, the chime to the right.
Next, the High Priest offers incense.
The Precentor makes the announcement.

We humbly observe: amidst the mist-veiled Flowery Grove, the heavens of heavens encircle the central realm; the cinnabar towers stand in solemn array, their reach extending beyond all phenomenal forms. Moreover, the Jade Casket offers the raft to cross the River of Love, while the Treasure Retreat moors the boat to escape the Shore of Suffering. Broadly ferrying across the Sea of Delusion, all ascend together to the fruit of the Dao. Instruments are fashioned with symbolic form—how could their functions not be fully displayed? Thus we reverently consult the grand rites of the Great Dharma, meticulously following the subtle applications of the profound liturgy. Golden bells resound in alternation, jade chimes ring in harmony. The Four Openings and Six Penetrations unfold, interspersed with the circling steps of the "Void-Stepping" hymn; the Nine Harmonies and Ten Unions proclaim the vastness of the Great Brahma’s boundless expanse. The divine wind stills into silent harmony, while the vast qi soars aloft, bearing auspicious omens. Phoenixes sing and dragons dance, tigers roar and dragons chant. The rare sound vibrates, illuminating the Three Luminaries; it ascends to the imperial precincts of the Lofty Yang. The hidden resonance resounds, parting the Nine Yin; it descends, connecting to the spirit realms of the Dark and Obscure. We, your servants, reverently establish the sacred altar, solemnly welcoming the treasure chariot. Looking up, we pray for divine response; bowing down, we present our sincere devotion. Prostrating, we take refuge in the Boundless Great Dao.

**Strike the golden bell twenty-five times**
We humbly observe: the Nine Yang conceal their resonance, the Great Sound is without sound. Its form embraces the perfection of the round ultimate, its measure encompasses the vastness of the Great Void. Relying on true quiescence to move the sagely, we hope for the mysterious harmony to gather the immortals. When struck, it responds—like the valley answering the echo. Soaring through the vast and boundless, it reaches the resplendent halls of the Crimson Precinct; silently moving the celestial pivots, it subtly manifests the elegant vistas of the Nine Heavens. Beyond the outermost, there is no beyond; knowing emptiness is not empty. The mysterious sound operates in secret, renewing the merit of the ritual.

**Incantation for Summoning the Yang Spirits**
The primordial expanse is vast and boundless, the Nine Clouds illumine the sky. The cinnabar spirits manifest their brilliance, the Five Planets interflow. True Yang blazes through, its resonance harmonizing with the Mysterious Palace. The Primordial Beginning lingers, the host of immortals reverently follows. The ten thousand qi ascend together as immortals, their subtle presence descending with profound intent. The Dao arises naturally, uniting with the Dao in truth.

**Strike the jade chime thirty times**
We humbly observe: the jade altar is purified and immaculate, the jade chime resounds with crystalline clarity. The true lords of the Six Directions gather their spirits, the yin spirits of the Nine Wilds bow their heads. Radiance descends in fivefold response, glances divide to observe the Three Paths. Awakening the deluded, returning to the origin and restoring the root. The wondrous mechanism of subtle being stirs the wondrous, the ethereal resonance of the void unites with the void. Mysteriously aligning with nature, it completes the secret model.

**Incantation for Summoning the Yin Spirits**
Supreme and lofty, the Great Void—its jasper palace and purple chambers. The Mysterious Altar fashions its instruments, the jade chime resounds with crystalline clarity. Clouds and dawns rise in flight, heaven and earth expand in unison. Yin arises in Brahma’s chant, flowing forth the primordial net. Auspicious clouds emerge at the gate, ascending to deliver the drowned and lost. Perfecting the attainment of lofty immortals, forever dwelling in the land of fortune. Uniting with the Dao in truth.

**Strike both bell and chime together thirty-six times**
We humbly observe: soaring through the void, halting the purple lightning in distant skies; streaming beacons hang like crystals, scattering subtle essences across the mysterious desert. A thousand zithers sing in the wind, ten thousand stone chimes clash in battle. Dragons hold tiger qi to welcome auspices, jade harmonizes with golden winds to display omens. Lightly dispersing the four directions, illuminating the space between the altar’s hairpin and topknot; thin mists sink into the nine depths, guiding the path of the Dharma Realm’s emptiness and non-being. Nine Harmonies and Two Qi, Ten Unions and Three Palaces. Rain and dew bestow grace, wind and clouds gather in felicitous assembly. The Two Qi merge and blend, manifesting yin and revealing yang. Gold harmonizes to move auspiciousness, jade moistens to bring tranquil prosperity. Interacting above and below, reaching the Ten Directions. The Mysterious Palace resounds in profound vibration, jade pendants chime with resonant clarity. The divine talismans proclaim their message, the altar stands in solemn reverence. The secret model is solemnly proclaimed again, the myriad spirits open and expand. Uniting with the Dao in truth.

**Strike the golden bell nine times**
**Strike the jade chime six times**
We humbly observe: at the primordial division of the undifferentiated, heaven and earth took separate forms. The nine hundred million layers of lofty clarity were distilled, while turbid stagnation congealed in the thirty-six barriers. Sound transcends phenomenal form, resonance pervades without limit. Flowing through the eight extremities to explore the depths of obscurity, penetrating the five agents to reach the outer bounds of creation. Dragons coil and clouds gather, dispelling the perverse traces of the vast seas; tigers crouch and winds calm, revealing the true knowledge of humans and heavens. The efficacy of warding off evil, the merit of the consecrated altar—inexhaustible in praise, we first reverently comply. Now, as the purified precinct is newly opened, we welcome auspiciousness from the realm of the Great Desert; the purple model is reverently proclaimed, bestowing grace upon the depths of the Dark Yin. The golden bell rings with clarity, the jade chime holds harmonious resonance. Summoning the yang spirits of virtue from the ten directions, assembling the yin lords of the nine earths. Universally attending the Dharma assembly, together witnessing the merit of the retreat. The pure assembly unites in sincerity, circling in procession to offer praise and hymns.

*Concluding the Twenty-Third Scroll of the* **Rites for Establishing the Supreme Yellow Register Great Retreat**
*Beginning the Twenty-Fourth Scroll of the* **Rites for Establishing the Supreme Yellow Register Great Retreat**

After the arrangement of the *Nine Darknesses Spirit Lamps* is complete, the *Master of the Three Caverns* burns incense, collects his spirit, and strikes his teeth twenty-four times.

**Invocation:**
In full ritual position, [Name] humbly invokes the assembly of the *Yellow Register*, the boundless immortals and sages, the lords of the Nine Darknesses, and all true spirits. May they turn their vast compassion and deign to reflect with penetrating insight.

We have heard that when the Two Modes settled into place, the Three Qi radiated their light. Darkness and brightness divided the distinction of day and night; the hidden and manifest distinguished the images of ascent and descent. Throughout the ten directions of the Dharma-realm, across the nine nights of the nether gates, the power of the Dao enables subtle communication, while the brilliance of the spirits illumines all with penetrating light.

Now, on behalf of [Name], the sponsor of this *Supreme Yellow Register Great Retreat*, we humbly dedicate this rite for the deliverance of the spirit of [Name], establishing the *Yellow Register Great Retreat*. During the retreat, we beseech that lamps be kindled according to ritual, breaking darkness and continuing brightness, entreating grace and invoking blessings. We pray that the Three Luminaries above be petitioned and the Nine Darknesses below be addressed, that the sincerity of the retreat be proclaimed and auspicious favor be guided and welcomed. From the nine heavens and eight poles to the six destinies and three paths, may all rely on the merit of illumination and together attain the fruit of transcendence and ascent. With reverence, we take refuge in the boundless Great Dao.

**Ten Directions Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy,**
We have heard that the Great Dao divides its form and the true essence spreads its transformations, establishing the Three Powers and presiding at the center of the myriad transformations.

Now, on behalf of [Name], the sponsor of this *Yellow Register Great Retreat*, we dedicate this rite for the deliverance of the spirit of [Name], reverently kindling the *Nine Darknesses Spirit Lamps*. Above, they illuminate the halls of blessings within the heavens of the ten directions, their radiant light shining brilliantly and reflecting across the ten thousand voids. At the center, they illuminate the divine continent of the Central Palace, causing malevolence to vanish and disasters to cease. Below, they illuminate the prisons of the Central Netherworld, breaking all darkness and opening all light. The blades of sword trees sheathe their edges; the blades of knife mountains dull their points. The boundless sinful souls and all destitute spirits cease their suffering, halt their bitterness, and have their transgressions erased and sins extinguished. Together, they enter the realm of light and forever depart the domain of qi-darkness.

The pure assembly takes refuge with reverence and sincerely offers praise and hymns.

**Nine Darknesses Deliverance from Sin Heavenly Worthy,**
We have heard that when the primordial qi spread in vast chaos, the Two Modes opened and unfolded. The Wood Virtue is called the palace of generation, and the Compassionate One established the ordinances of deliverance.

Now, on behalf of [Name], the sponsor of this *Yellow Register Great Retreat*, we dedicate this rite for the deliverance of the spirit of [Name], reverently kindling the *Nine Darknesses Spirit Lamps*. Above, they illuminate the halls of blessings within the boundless heavens of the Eastern Quarter, their yang light blazing and shining through the Eastern Direction. At the center, they illuminate the palace of the *Zhen* trigram and the *Mao* position, the domain of the Azure Emperor of the Three Palaces, sweeping away calamities and dispelling malevolent obscurations. Below, they illuminate the Wind and Thunder Hells of the Eastern Direction, breaking all darkness and opening all light. The might of thunderous roars ceases, and the perils of flying halberds and arrows are averted. The boundless sinful souls and all destitute spirits shed the names of their sins from the Black Bureau and ascend the register of life in the Azure Origin. Freed from sorrow and suffering, they ascend to witness the light.

The pure assembly takes refuge with reverence and sincerely offers praise and hymns.

**Majestic Radiance Precious Boundary Heavenly Worthy,**
We have heard that when the Three Qi radiated their light, the Five Spirits divided their transformations. The cinnabar tablets inscribe the register of long life, and the Vermilion Mound opens the courtyard of refinement.

Now, on behalf of [Name], the sponsor of this *Yellow Register Great Retreat*, we dedicate this rite for the deliverance of the spirit of [Name], reverently kindling the *Nine Darknesses Spirit Lamps*. Above, they illuminate the halls of blessings within the boundless heavens of the Southern Quarter, their yang brilliance resplendent and shining without end. At the center, they illuminate the wilds of the *Li* trigram and the *Wu* position, the domain of the Vermilion Emperor of the Nine Palaces, pacifying calamities and dispelling malevolent vapors. Below, they illuminate the Fire Obscuration Hells of the Southern Direction, breaking all darkness and opening all light. The might of the Fire City’s interrogations ceases, and the suffering of burning and scorching ends. The boundless sinful souls and all destitute spirits forever depart the realm of eternal night and directly ascend the realm of the Cinnabar Spirit. They dwell perpetually in blessings and forever gain good affinity.

The pure assembly takes refuge with reverence and sincerely offers praise and hymns.

**Light Flowing Myriad Transformations Heavenly Worthy,**
We have heard that the azure void forms its script and the Great White flows its essence. The Western Flower divides the capital of the Supreme Mystery, and the Right Ultimate governs the peaks of Floating Gauze.

Now, on behalf of [Name], the sponsor of this *Yellow Register Great Retreat*, we dedicate this rite for the deliverance of the spirit of [Name], reverently kindling the *Nine Darknesses Spirit Lamps*. Above, they illuminate the halls of blessings within the boundless heavens of the Western Quarter, their divine light blazing and shining brightly across the great void. At the center, they illuminate the domain of the *Dui* trigram and the *You* position, the realm of the White Emperor of the Seven Palaces, sweeping away defilements and cleansing calamities. Below, they illuminate the Vajra Hells of the Western Direction, breaking all darkness and opening all light. The might of metal hammers and iron staves ceases, and the suffering of piercing bellies and blocking hearts ends. The boundless sinful souls and all destitute spirits surpass the gate of liberation and directly enter the adorned realm. Grudges are reconciled, and wisdom is perfected.

The pure assembly takes refuge with reverence and sincerely offers praise and hymns.

**Precious Light Pervading Illumination Heavenly Worthy,**
We have heard that in the vast kalpas of primordial chaos, the Five Qi summoned the perfected. The great transformations spread across the Dark Heaven, and the divine works matched those of the Black Emperor.

Now, on behalf of [Name], the sponsor of this *Yellow Register Great Retreat*, we dedicate this rite for the deliverance of the spirit of [Name], reverently kindling the *Nine Darknesses Spirit Lamps*. Above, they illuminate the halls of blessings within the boundless heavens of the Northern Quarter, their auspicious light shining brilliantly and illuminating without end. At the center, they illuminate the wilds of the *Kan* trigram and the *Zi* position, the domain of the Black Emperor of the First Palace, dispelling evil defilements and washing away calamities. Below, they illuminate the Dark and Cold Hells of the Northern Direction, breaking all darkness and opening all light. The might of ice halberds and frost blades ceases, and the suffering of eternal night’s bitter cold ends. The boundless sinful souls and all destitute spirits, by the merit of repentance and deliverance, directly ascend the realm of the Void Perfected. Forever departing the evil destinies, they transcend and witness the immortal homeland.

The pure assembly takes refuge with reverence and sincerely offers praise and hymns.

**Golden Flower Vast Radiance Heavenly Worthy,**
We have heard that the Dao of Qian flows its forms and the Mountain of Gen arrays its positions. It gathers the transformations of life in the domain of the Azure Origin and fans the divine winds in the courtyard of the Purple Ultimate.

Now, on behalf of [Name], the sponsor of this *Yellow Register Great Retreat*, we dedicate this rite for the deliverance of the spirit of [Name], kindling the *Nine Darknesses Spirit Lamps*. Above, they illuminate the halls of blessings within the heavens of the Northeast Quarter, their numinous light shining brilliantly and reflecting across the void.

At its center, it illuminates the wilds of the Gen trigram’s eight palaces in the Chou and Yin directions, purging calamitous sands and shattering malevolent spirits. Below, it shines upon the cauldrons and boiling hells of the Northeast Quarter, shattering all darkness and unfolding all radiance. The terror of scalding immersion ceases forever, and a realm of pure coolness universally transforms. Boundless sinful souls and all destitute spirits swiftly ascend to the Land of Eternal Joy, forever freed from the suffering of dense shadows. Form and spirit ascend and transcend; karmic debts and transgressions dissolve. The pure assembly takes refuge with reverence and sincerely offers praise and hymns.

**Heavenly Worthy of the Great Radiance of the Celestial Microcosm,**
We have heard that the qi of Brahma surges with essence, and the Xun direction converges with the ultimate. Within the wondrously serene and majestic realm, there exists the Honored One who cherishes life and delivers beings. Now, on behalf of [Name], the sponsor of this *Yellow Register Great Retreat*, we dedicate this rite for the deliverance of the spirit of [Name], kindling the *Nine Darknesses Spirit Lamps*. Above, they illuminate the halls of blessings within the boundless heavens of the Southeast Quarter, their luminous splendor shining universally and resplendently without limit. At their center, they illuminate the wilds of the Xun trigram’s four palaces in the Chen and Si directions, dissolving evil and shattering calamities. Below, they shine upon the bronze pillars of the Southeast hells, shattering all darkness and unfolding all radiance. The terror of raging flames ceases, and the suffering of scorched and charred bodies is stilled. Boundless sinful souls and all destitute spirits forever bid farewell to the Land of Eternal Night, swiftly ascending to the luminous realm of the True. Karmic roots are scoured clean, and the spirit’s awareness attains tranquility. The pure assembly takes refuge with reverence and sincerely offers praise and hymns.

**Heavenly Worthy of Flowing Light Manifesting Presence,**
We have heard that the true wind disperses brilliance, and the qi of Brahma contains radiance. It arrays the vast earth in the Kun direction and reveals the primal merit of the Qian virtue. Now, on behalf of [Name], the sponsor of this *Yellow Register Great Retreat*, we dedicate this rite for the deliverance of the spirit of [Name], kindling the *Nine Darknesses Spirit Lamps*. Above, they illuminate the halls of blessings within the boundless heavens of the Southwest Quarter, their flowing light penetrating and shining without end. At their center, they illuminate the lands of the Kun trigram’s second palace in the Shen and Wei directions, sweeping away yin pestilence and purging malevolent spirits. Below, they shine upon the butchering hells of the Southwest, shattering all darkness and unfolding all radiance. The terror of inverted suspension and dismemberment ceases, and the suffering of severed limbs and scattered bodies is stilled. Boundless sinful souls and all destitute spirits dissolve the transgressions of countless kalpas and release the sins of many lifetimes. Their karmic roots purified, they perfect the fruit of goodness. The pure assembly takes refuge with reverence and sincerely offers praise and hymns.

**Heavenly Worthy of Pervasive Illumination,**
We have heard that the primal essence has unfolded, and the celestial gates have opened. The stars array the pattern of the Pole, and the ten thousand phenomena embody the movement of primal harmony. On behalf of [Name], the sponsor of this *Yellow Register Great Retreat*, we dedicate this rite for the deliverance of the spirit of [Name], kindling the *Nine Darknesses Spirit Lamps*. Above, they illuminate the halls of blessings within the boundless heavens of the Northwest Quarter, their luminous splendor shining clearly and reflecting across the great void. At their center, they illuminate the divisions of the Qian trigram’s six palaces in the Xu and Hai directions, sweeping away malevolent spirits and shattering calamities. Below, they shine upon the fire chariot hells of the Northwest, shattering all darkness and unfolding all radiance. The terror of whirling blades ceases, and the suffering of scorching and charring is stilled. Boundless sinful souls and all destitute spirits bathe in the flowing fire to refine their forms and journey to the radiant clouds to realize the Dao. Sins vanish in the Northern Office, and names are recorded in the Southern Palace. The pure assembly takes refuge with reverence and sincerely offers praise and hymns.

**Supreme Heavenly Worthy of Penetrating Spirit,**
The merit of the lamps kindled thus far illuminates the Three Realms above and shines upon the Nine Darknesses below. Beholding this radiance, all equally partake of its blessed power. Even the flames of the mountain of fire are stilled, and the waves of the icy pools grow calm. Those who swallowed fire and consumed coals now taste sweet dew. Golden hammers and iron staves transform into lotus blossoms. Whether lingering or departed, all ascend to the fruit of the Dao. Within the Nine Darknesses hells, the boundless sinful souls—whether they be nine generations of ancestors or seven degrees of kinship, whether forebears or recent dead, whether known or unknown, whether enemies or kin—have fallen into these hells to endure their karmic retribution. Some committed transgressions in past lives, others perpetrated wrongs across seven existences; some were bound by the three karmas or the six emotions, others by the ten evils or the five rebellions. In their lifetimes, they failed to awaken to good causes. They acted upon their own deeds, defying heaven and betraying earth. After their lives ended, they were seized by the dark officials of the netherworld, tormented by the five sufferings, and subjected to every evil. Only when their sins were exhausted and their retribution fulfilled could they obtain rebirth, yet they revolved through the three paths and cycled through the six destinies. Countless kalpas passed, and no means of escape arose. Once the human form was lost, the path of the worthy was forever forsaken. Were it not for the deliverance of the Great Dao and the compassion of the Most Sagely, the eternal night would remain unbroken, and liberation would never come. Therefore, we now repent, kindle lamps, and burn incense, praying to behold this radiance so that myriad sins may dissolve. By the power of this merit, may they be reborn among humans and gods, pay homage to the Heavenly Worthies, hear the sutras, and awaken to the Dharma. May all evils forever cease, and may all virtues be upheld. Life after life, may they forever return to the true Dao.

For this noble cause, we once more rely upon and invoke the **Heavenly Worthy of Deliverance from the Nine Darknesses**. Inconceivable is this merit.

Master Du Guangcheng states: The *True Immortal Ranks of the Golden Register of the Upper Prime* says that the ritual of kindling lamps serves emperors and rulers, above dispelling celestial disasters and rectifying celestial destinies, and below pacifying the multitudes and delivering the living and the dead. Thus, the *Nine Darknesses Spirit Lamps* illuminate the halls of blessings in the Nine Heavens above and the Nine Darknesses hells below. Humans and gods receive blessings, and the living and the dead bear its grace. As for the *Nine Darknesses Lamps*, one should procure pure fragrant oil, avoiding wealth obtained through unrighteous means or impure, foul, and defiled substances. Alternatively, various incenses may be steeped within it, so that the lamp’s flame emits a fragrant and pure fragrance. The incense’s qi ascends to move the heavens and descends to dispel foul impurities. The lamp’s light shines clearly, dispelling darkness and continuing brightness, thereby accruing great merit. The *Nine Darknesses Lamps* should be arranged before the sacred altar in a spacious hall, in the presence of the assembled sages. They are divided into nine trees, arrayed according to the nine directions, each tree bearing nine lamps. Alternatively, each tree may have nine tiers, with nine lamps on each tier. The number nine times nine models heaven and emulates earth. Below, it opens the nine nights; above, it reaches the nine ancestral generations. Delivering the living and rescuing the dead, this is the most supreme blessing. For those whose means are insufficient, even preparing nine lamps suffices, and the full ritual need not be observed. Simply burning incense and invoking the true, with sincere and profound prayers, the merit will still resonate and be equally efficacious.

Alternatively, offerings may be prepared according to each position: nine portions of water, congee, and seasonal fruits, or eighty-one portions arranged before the nine directions—this is especially refined and wondrous.

**Ritual of the Nine Hells Spirit Lamps**
The Daoist assembly establishes the hells’ precinct. The officiant offers incense, and the Dharma Master petitions the *True Talisman of Jade Purity for Breaking Open Hell*.

The Heavenly Worthy of Great Unity Who Saves from Suffering,
The Heavenly Worthy of the Nine Hells Who Delivers from Sin,
The Heavenly Worthies of the Ten Directions Who Save from Suffering,
The Greatly Compassionate True Person Who Saves from Suffering,
The Greatly Compassionate and Greatly Wise True Person,
The Transformer Within the Mysterious,
The Three Heavenly Sage-Masters,
The Lords of Heaven, Earth, and Water,
The Great Emperor of the Northern Darkness of Fengdu,
The Sacred Emperors of the Five Peaks,
The Great Emperor of the Mulberry Water Palace,
The Thirty-Six Lords of the Earth Mounds,
The Wardens of the Eastern Wind-and-Thunder Hell,
The Wardens of the Southern Fire-and-Glare Hell,
The Wardens of the Western Diamond Hell,
The Wardens of the Northern Dark-and-Cold Hell,
The Wardens of the Northeastern Cauldron Hell,
The Wardens of the Southeastern Bronze-Pillar Hell,
The Wardens of the Southwestern Slaughter Hell,
The Wardens of the Northwestern Fire-Cart Hell,
The Wardens of the Central Universal Torment Hell,
The Wardens of the Eighteen Hells of Fengdu,
The Wardens of the Eight Great Hells of Fengdu,
The Wardens of the Thirty-Six Hells of Fengdu,
The Wardens of the Twenty-Four Hells of the Three Officials of Fengdu,
The Wardens of the Hells of the Five Peaks and Four Waterways,
The Wardens of the Twelve River-Source Hells,
