May they descend without partiality, together turning back those under surveillance. On this day, we humbly serve as the chief patron [Name] of the Great Yellow Register Retreat, dedicating merit to the deceased kin [Name]. We now establish the Supreme Great Yellow Register Retreat, kindle the Nine Hells Spirit Lamps in accordance with the Dharma, and present the *Jade Purity Precious Register* and the *True Talisman for Breaking Open Hell*. By the Emperor’s talismanic command, may they ascend at this very hour.

O Prisons of Heaven and Hells of Earth,
Dark Passes and Shadowy Roads,
Gates of the Long Night and Springs of the Underworld,
All underworld officers,
The hundred spirits who fulfill their duties,
The examiners and clerks—
Hear the talismanic command of the Highest Mystery!
Open the gates, clear the roads,
Shatter the locks, unbar the doors.
Release and deliver the bound and dedicated souls,
All the imprisoned and submerged spirits of the Nine Hells and Ten Paths.
Regardless of the weight of their transgressions,
May all be universally freed.
Let their guardian hosts come forth,
Subdue the demons and protect their ascent.
Let the dead be refined in the Southern Palace,
Their souls receive transformation.
Let them be reborn as humans,
Turn with the kalpas,
Live as long as heaven,
Forever escape the Three Paths, Five Sufferings, and Eight Adversities,
Transcend the Three Realms,
And roam freely in the Highest Clarity.
The *Precious Register* and *True Talisman* are now respectfully presented.

**Proclamation of the Talismanic Command**
**Petition to the Spirits**
The Dharma Master summons the Underworld Officers:
Reverently summon the Underworld Officers to attend before the Dao and receive the talismanic command.
Proclaim it to the Ten Directions,
And grant amnesty in accordance with the Dharma.

**Proclamation of the Pass**
**Burning of the Talisman**

The *Hymn of the Bright Lamps* is recited, and the assembly circumambulates once.

The Dharma Master transforms into the Heavenly Worthy of Great Unity Who Saves from Suffering and performs the rites as prescribed.

The lamp attendants hold the scroll and proclaim:
The Primal Unity unfolds its transformation, distinguishing high and low to shape heaven and earth.
The Three Qi radiate light, determining the rise and fall of the hidden and manifest.
Gather the immortals and sages in the azure void of celestial song,
Confine the sinful souls in the springs and valleys of Fengdu.
Karma and consciousness interact,
And beings receive retribution in the cycle of rebirth.
Once fallen into the evil destinies,
They are forever bound in the dark passes.
For aeons uncounted, they see no light,
Enduring suffering in the long night.
O Jade Capital’s sagely beings,
O Golden Portals’ mysterious perfected ones—
Greatly compassionate, universally saving, universally delivering.
You establish the standards for turning back radiance and descending light,
And bestow the texts for continuing brightness and breaking darkness.
May they attain the merit of repentance and purification,
And fulfill the vow of transcendence and ascent.

Now, the chief patron [Name] of the Great Yellow Register Retreat dedicates merit to the deceased [Name], performing this great retreat to transcend them into the immortal realms. During the retreat, we humbly kindle the lamps in accordance with the Dharma.

We pray that the Three Realms’ Imperial Masters,
The Heavenly Worthies of the Ten Directions Who Respond to Cries and Save from Suffering,
The Compassionate Lords of Great Unity—
Will release the nine-colored divine radiance,
And shatter the deep darkness of the underworld springs.
In boundless worlds,
May all suffering beings who behold the lamp light
Recognize their past lives,
Reflect on their transgressions, repent of their sins,
And cease their suffering and sorrow.
Riding the power of the Dao to ascend,
Relying on the true talisman to open the gates and deliver them.
Illumine the Nine Hells,
Radiate the Three Paths.
Universally reach all sentient beings,
That all may together attain the fruits of the Dao.
May the assembled pure assembly
Together offer praise.

**The Heavenly Worthy of the Nine Hells Who Delivers from Sin**
In the east of the Nine Hells lies the Wind-and-Thunder Hell.
Flying spears and drifting halberds assail the sinners.
Now, we humbly serve as the chief patron [Name] of the Great Yellow Register Retreat, dedicating merit to the deceased [Name].
We beseech the standards of the *Numinous Treasure* to kindle the Nine Hells Spirit Lamps.
We pray that the Heavenly Worthy of the Jade Treasure, the August Emperor of the East Who Saves from Suffering,
Will universally release auspicious light,
And illuminate the dark prisons.
May the compassionate breeze widely fan,
Ceasing the might of thunderclaps;
May the power of wisdom spiritually penetrate,
Forever stilling the trials of wind and thunder.
May the deceased transcend and ascend,
Their sins purified and elevated.
Entering the Cinnabar Radiance to refine their spirits,
Proceeding to the Azure Flower to receive their records.
May the assembled pure assembly
Offer praise.

**The Heavenly Worthy of the Jade Treasure, August Emperor of the Highest Heaven**
We bow to the August Emperor of the Jade Treasure in the Flowery Grove.
May you bestow your great compassion,
And deliver this deceased soul.
Liberated from the Wind-and-Thunder Hell,
Reborn in the human and heavenly paths.
Inconceivable merit.

The Dharma Master forms the Jade Purity mudra with the left hand and holds the ritual staff in the right.
Knocks the teeth nine times before the hell and recites the incantation:
Nine Qi generate smoke,
The Compassionate Lord of the Jade Treasure.
The August Qi of the Highest flows down into the underworld void.
Thunder ceases its might,
The swift winds subside.
Halberds and spears shatter,
Sins and evils collapse.
By the Numinous Mandate of the Primal Beginning,
May the ancestral souls ascend and be delivered.

The Heavenly Worthy of the Ten Directions Who Saves from Suffering approaches the lamp and burns the banner in the hell.
The Dharma Master knocks the teeth nine times and silently recites the *Incantation for Radiating Light*.
Holds the ritual staff before the hell,
Follows the principles of inner refinement in the original text,
And visualizes the precious light of the Primal Beginning illuminating and breaking open the dark prisons.

Next, visualize yellow qi in the form of clouds, covering one direction—proceed thus for all remaining hells.

In the nine dark realms of the southeast lies the Copper Pillar Hell.
Here, the condemned are made to clasp their feet and climb.
Now, the sponsor of this grand Yellow Register Retreat, [Name], offers merit on behalf of the departed soul, [Name].
We humbly beseech, in accordance with the *Lingbao* ritual codes, to kindle the sacred lamps of the nine hells.
May the Heavenly Worthy of Great Compassion Who Nurtures Life and Delivers from Suffering in the Southeast,
Radiate boundless mercy, illuminating and shattering the dark prisons.
As divine radiance penetrates, the torment of scorching agony is dispelled;
As karmic debts dissolve, the suffering of clinging is forever severed.
Evil roots are cut away, and the filth of the corpse disperses.
May all ascend to the realm of liberation, swiftly tread the path of carefree wandering.
The assembled pure assembly having witnessed this, we now invite praise.
**Heavenly Worthy Who Nurtures Life and Delivers from Suffering**
We bow to the Azure Cloud Realm,
To the Heavenly Worthy Who Nurtures Life and Delivers.
May Your great compassion extend,
To rescue this departed soul.
Liberated from the Copper Pillar Hell,
Reborn in the human or heavenly realms.
Inconceivable merit and virtue.

The Dharma Master holds the ritual staff and proceeds as before, reciting the incantation:
*Generative yang of Brahma transforms,
One qi nurtures life.
Great Sage Who Delivers,
Boundless salvation without end.
Charred flesh revives, scorching torment scatters.
The blazing copper pillar,
Forever extinguished, never to return.
Suffering dispelled, sins expiated,
Ascend to the immortal palaces.*

The Heavenly Worthy of the Ten Directions Who Saves from Suffering burns the talisman and banner, breaking open the hell as in the previous rite.

In the nine dark realms of the south lies the Fire-Shrouded Hell.
Here, the condemned are forced to swallow fire and devour coals.
Now, the sponsor of this grand Yellow Register Retreat, [Name], offers merit on behalf of the departed soul, [Name].
We humbly beseech, in accordance with the *Lingbao* ritual codes, to kindle the sacred lamps of the nine hells.
May the Heavenly Worthy of Great Compassion, the Mysterious Perfected One of Myriad Blessings in the South,
Radiate auspicious light, illuminating and shattering the dark prisons.
The flames of the fire mountain subside, bathing souls in the cool dew of wisdom;
The wheel of karmic paths halts, enveloped in merciful clouds that bring peace.
All boundless sinful shades and destitute souls,
Ascend from the court of flowing fire, to face the sacred presence of the Cinnabar Emperor.
The assembled pure assembly having witnessed this, we now invite praise.
**Mysterious Perfected One of Myriad Blessings**
We bow to the Brahma Heaven Realm,
To the Mysterious Perfected One of Myriad Blessings.
May Your great compassion extend,
To rescue this departed soul.
Liberated from the Fire-Shrouded Hell,
Reborn in the human or heavenly realms.

The Dharma Master proceeds as in the previous rite, reciting the incantation:

Myriad blessings of the Mysterious Perfected.
Breath of yang light,
Delivering dark souls.
The Fire-Shrouded Hell instantly vanishes,

Wisdom’s light spreads transformation,

As the decree commands,

The Heavenly Worthy of the Ten Directions Who Saves from Suffering burns the talisman and banner, breaking open the hell as in the previous rite.

In the nine dark realms of the southwest lies the Slaughter Hell.
Here, the condemned are hung upside down, their bodies carved by blades.
Now, the sponsor of this grand Yellow Register Retreat, [Name], offers merit on behalf of the departed soul, [Name].
We humbly beseech, in accordance with the *Lingbao* ritual codes, to kindle the sacred lamps of the nine hells.
May the Heavenly Worthy of Great Compassion, the Supreme Numinous Sovereign of the Void in the Southwest,

True yang descends, transforming swords and halberds into lotus blossoms;

Awakening to their original nature, they swiftly enter the source of wisdom.
Realizing the emptiness of karmic obstructions, they attain freedom of form and spirit.
The assembled pure assembly having witnessed this, we now invite praise.

To the Supreme Numinous Sovereign of the Void.
May Your great compassion extend,
To rescue this departed soul.
Liberated from the Slaughter Hell,
Reborn in the human or heavenly realms.

Resplendent primordial radiance,

In the nine dark realms of the west lies the Diamond Hell.

Now, the sponsor of this grand Yellow Register Retreat, [Name], offers merit on behalf of the departed soul, [Name].
We humbly beseech, in accordance with the *Lingbao* ritual codes, to kindle the sacred lamps of the nine hells.
