Wandering freely in the heavens of the seven qi, they traverse the realms of the ten blossoms.
The assembled pure assembly having witnessed this, we now invite praise.
**Supreme Wondrous One of the Utmost**
We bow to the Golden Light Realm,
To the Supreme Wondrous One of the Utmost.
May Your great compassion extend,
To rescue this departed soul.
Liberated from the Diamond Hell,
Reborn in the human or heavenly realms.
Inconceivable merit and virtue.

The Dharma Master proceeds as in the previous rite, reciting the incantation:
*Seven qi of pristine essence,
Supreme Wondrous One of the Utmost.
Golden light of precious radiance,
Universally delivering souls and consciousness.
Iron rods and beatings,
Forever cast aside.
Hammers, blades, and forks,
Instantly shattered and destroyed.
Heaven’s mercy absolves,
None dare defy.
Souls ascend to the Great Simplicity,
Freely wandering in divine splendor.*

The Heavenly Worthy of the Ten Directions Who Saves from Suffering burns the talisman and banner, breaking open the hell as in the previous rite.

In the nine dark realms of the northwest lies the Fire Chariot Hell.
Here, the condemned are sliced by wheels of ice and blades.
Now, the sponsor of this grand Yellow Register Retreat, [Name], offers merit on behalf of the departed soul, [Name].
We humbly beseech, in accordance with the *Lingbao* ritual codes, to kindle the sacred lamps of the nine hells.
May the Heavenly Worthy of Great Compassion, the Boundless Supreme Blossom One in the Northwest,
Radiate auspicious light, illuminating and shattering the dark prisons.
The tormented corpse and soul are refined, severing the roots of suffering across the ten directions;
The dead soul is reborn, emerging from the eight gates into the vast, untainted realm beyond embers.
The dark courts of Fengdu are stilled, the eternal night brightens.
May all who languish in the nine depths,
Be bathed in the profound grace of the Mysterious.

As the assembled pure assembly has been seen before, we now invite them to offer praise.

**Boundless Supreme Blossom Heavenly Worthy,**
We bow to the wondrous realm of the Dao,
Boundless Supreme Blossom Worthy.
May Your great compassionate power extend,
To deliver this departed soul,
Liberating them from the Fire-Cart Hell,
And rebirth upon the human or celestial Way.
Inconceivable merit and virtue.

The Dharma Master proceeds as before, reciting the incantation:
*"Numinous Jade Perfection, Boundless Supreme Blossom.
Celestial Primordial Qi, vast illumination without bound.
Fire-carts shatter their wheels, vanishing all traces.
Rotting, decayed souls transform into jade blossoms.
Spirit gathers, soul congeals, ascending to the immortal realm."*

The **Heavenly Worthy of Salvation from Suffering in the Ten Directions** burns talismanic banners, breaking open the hells as before.

In the north of the Nine Dark Realms lies the **Mingling Hell**.
Ice halberds and frost blades assail the sinful.
Now, the sponsor of this grand Yellow Register Retreat, [Name], offers merit on behalf of the departed soul, [Name].
We humbly beseech, in accordance with the *Lingbao* ritual codes, to kindle the sacred lamps of the nine hells.
May the Heavenly Worthy of Great Compassion, the **Supreme Jade Sovereign of the Mysterious North**,
Radiate compassionate light, illuminating and shattering the dark prisons.
Auspicious smoke seals the dead, opening the southern gate of rebirth;
The icy pools still their waves, dissolving the northern karmic retribution.
Roots of sin scatter and disperse, debts and disputes dissolve.
Swiftly ascend to the heavens of bliss, forever severing the path of rebirth.

As the assembled pure assembly has been seen before, we now invite them to offer praise.

**Supreme Jade Sovereign Heavenly Worthy,**
We bow to the realm of settled perfection,
Supreme Jade Sovereign Worthy.
May Your great compassionate power extend,
To deliver this departed soul,
Liberating them from the Mingling Hell,
And rebirth upon the human or celestial Way.
Inconceivable merit and virtue.

The Dharma Master proceeds as before, reciting the incantation:
*"Five Qi of pristine essence, Supreme Jade Sovereign.
Ninefold harmonious yang light, universally aiding souls.
Pure fragrance pervades, foul impurities disperse.
Ice spears and frost blades dissolve at their root.
The Dao Qi of the Nine Heavens forever banishes the frozen gates.
Suffering in judgment is released, swiftly ascending to the Southern Palace."*

The **Heavenly Worthy of Salvation from Suffering in the Ten Directions** burns talismanic banners, breaking open the hells as before.

In the northeast of the Nine Dark Realms lies the **Cauldron-Boiling Hell**.
Sinners are boiled and steeped, their limbs rotting and dissolving.
Now, the sponsor of this grand Yellow Register Retreat, [Name], offers merit on behalf of the departed soul, [Name].
We humbly beseech, in accordance with the *Lingbao* ritual codes, to kindle the sacred lamps of the nine hells.
May the Heavenly Worthy of Great Compassion, the **Supreme Sage of Salvation and Transcendence in the Northeast**,
Radiate auspicious light, illuminating and shattering the dark prisons.
Tormented souls and sinful spirits all transcend to realms of liberation;
The northern hells and dark dungeons transform into realms of cool purity.
The wheel of the Five Paths halts, blessings shower the ten directions.
Together they ride the supreme cause, all attaining the fruit of non-action.

As the assembled pure assembly has been seen before, we now invite them to offer praise.

**Supreme Sage of Salvation and Transcendence Heavenly Worthy,**
We bow to the realm of eternal joy,
Supreme Sage of Salvation and Transcendence.
May Your great compassionate power extend,
To deliver this departed soul,
Liberating them from the Cauldron-Boiling Hell,
And rebirth upon the human or celestial Way.
Inconceivable merit and virtue.

The Dharma Master proceeds as before, reciting the incantation:
*"Guardian of kalpas, divine radiant and compassionate Worthy,
Transformer of forms to save the suffering, Supreme Sage of Salvation and Transcendence.
Blessings flow and spread, cauldrons cease their fires.
Boiling, burning, and rotting—forms restore their integrity.
Scalding broth turns sweet and cool, lotuses bloom with crimson stems.
Forever freed from suffering hells, all ascend to the Primordial Response.
As the numinous decree commands, ghostly officials heed."*

The **Heavenly Worthy of Salvation from Suffering in the Ten Directions** burns talismanic banners, breaking open the hells as before.

At the center of the Nine Dark Realms lies the **Universal Flogging Hell**.
Sinners are tortured and flogged, enduring unbearable agony.
Now, the sponsor of this grand Yellow Register Retreat, [Name], offers merit on behalf of the departed soul, [Name].
We humbly beseech, in accordance with the *Lingbao* ritual codes, to kindle the sacred lamps of the nine hells.
May the Heavenly Worthies of Great Compassion, the **Jade Clarity Illustrious August Heavenly Worthy of the Upper Realm** and the **True August Cavern Spirit Heavenly Worthy of the Lower Realm**,
Radiate auspicious light, illuminating and shattering the dark prisons.
Sacred lamps shine brightly, transforming the depths into an unending realm of light;
Sword trees shatter their blades, all becoming groves of *jian* trees.
The departed soul receives deliverance, the sinful spirit is absolved.
Forever uprooting the five sufferings, fully attaining the six supernatural knowledges.

As the assembled pure assembly has been seen before, we now invite them to offer praise.

**Jade Clarity Illustrious August Heavenly Worthy,**
We bow to the Lord of Brahma’s Heaven,
Illustrious August Cavern Spirit Worthy.
May Your great compassionate power extend,
To deliver this departed soul,
Liberating them from the Universal Flogging Hell,
And rebirth upon the human or celestial Way.
Inconceivable merit and virtue.

**True August Cavern Spirit Heavenly Worthy.**

The Dharma Master proceeds as before, reciting the incantation:
*"Upper Primordial Jade Clarity, Illustrious August Purple Sovereign.
Lower Cavern of the Nine Abysses, True August Cavern Spirit.
Wisdom and compassion, twin lights universally deliver souls.
Blade mountains and sword trees instantly transform into *jian* groves.
Torture and torment swiftly dissolve, bitterness and sorrow end.
Sawing and inverted suspension forever cease.
Iron cities crumble, ghostly officials ascend to perfection.
Eons of sinful spirits universally attain deliverance to the Vermilion Mound.
The decree of the Ten Directions commands, all spirits obey.
Dare we not heed the decree? We present our petition to the Jade Sovereign."*

The **Heavenly Worthy of Salvation from Suffering in the Ten Directions** burns talismanic banners, breaking open the hells as before.

**Supreme One Heavenly Worthy of Salvation from Suffering,**
The Master holds the *Lingbao* talisman, grasping the **Azure Mystery Talisman for Breaking Fengdu**, silently reciting the **Incantation of Transformation**, along with the **Talisman of Returning Light**, and burns them within the hells.
Again, the Master silently prays, envisioning the lamp’s light forming a radiance of a hundred treasures, ascending to the Nine Heavens and penetrating the Nine Hells.
Envisioning the transformation of the **Boundless Heavenly Worthy**, pervading the Nine Dark Realms, all sinful souls receive absolution and deliverance.
The Master holds the **True Form of Fengdu Mountain**.
Forming the **Jade Clarity Mudra**, the Master recites the incantation:
*"By the Primordial Mandate of the Origin,
Demons are subdued and the decree is obeyed.
We commend the departed soul,
To ascend and be ranked in the Southern Palace.
Fengdu Mountain is dissolved, the Three Officials release their judgments.
Bonds, imprisonment, and karmic deeds are absolved,
Receiving transformation and rebirth.
Refined and delivered according to rank,
Ascend to the Court of Blessings."*

Upon completing the incantation, the talisman is burned.
Pressing the tongue against the upper palate, the Master envisions the **Primordial Origin** within the golden light atop the head, then exhales the ashes toward the northeast while releasing the mudra.
The assembly recites the **Perimeter Incantation for Breaking Fengdu** and the **Sweet Dew Incantation for Communicating with Perfection**.
Circling the altar, the Master sprinkles water with a willow branch and vessel.

The Six Palaces of the Northern Emperor shroud the unilluminated essence of the intestines; the Nine Prisons of the Northern Darkness house the dwelling of sinful souls. Without the majestic radiance of the Supreme Sages, none may open the living path of the Yellow Springs. Today, on behalf of the Great Register Retreat’s sponsor, [Name], we dedicate merit to the departed soul [Name], conducting the Dao according to ritual and kindling lamps as prescribed.

Inscribed in the Jade Clarity Register, the path of ascent and promotion is duly assembled; recorded in the Yellow Register, the grace of deliverance is thereby manifested. All suffering souls adrift shall find refuge in the true Dao. Reverently relying on the vast and towering model of the Great Way, may they all transcend to the distant and boundless immortal source. Every sentient being receives the moisture of the Dharma. Grace extends to family and state, blessings reach both the living and the dead. Bowing in reverence, we take refuge in the Boundless Great Dao.

For the supreme karmic conditions, we invoke the Most High Sovereign of Salvation, the Most High Sovereign of Deliverance from the Nine Hells, the Most High Sovereign of the Vermilion Mound, the Most High Sovereign of Rebirth According to Wish, and the Most High Sovereign of Carefree Bliss—immeasurable and inconceivable merit.

**Ritual of the Five Sufferings’ Radiant Wheel Lamp**
First, at the Earth Gate, kindle the lamps according to the prescribed form. The Dao assembly arranges itself at the lamp station, recites the *Hymn of Radiant Flight*, and circumambulates the lamp once. The Dharma Master, together with the retreat officers, offers incense and prostrations.

**Proclamation**
The wondrous Dao opens the way, establishing positions in square and round. Clarifying the lofty and pure to form the canopy of Heaven, condensing the turbid and yellow to shape the chariot of Earth. The Three Luminaries are arrayed, the myriad transformations spread forth. Above, it reaches the summit of existence; beside, it extends to the boundless. All within its illumination are nurtured and sheltered.

Yet the good and evil of human hearts diverge in intent, thus the retributions of karmic paths differ in course. If the Three Karmas remain uneliminated, how can one escape the trials of the Three Realms? If the Five Aggregates are not extinguished, how can one halt the wheel of the Five Sufferings? Having fallen into the gates of darkness, none may transcend the realm of the living. In the desolate northern wastes, the Yellow Springs’ winding paths, Fengdu’s thirty-six springs, twenty-four prisons—sinful souls are bound, destitute spirits confined. Deprived of light, they have no means of liberation.

Thus, the Primordial Sovereign pitied them, the Most High took compassion. He bequeathed the ritual of kindling lamps to dispel darkness, established the forms of repentance to absolve sins and transfer spirits. The wheel’s turning takes its image from the chariot hub; its square and round apply the method of Heaven and Earth. This merciful radiance is bestowed to extinguish all suffering and darkness.

Today, the Great Register Retreat’s sponsor, [Name], humbly dedicates merit to the departed soul [Name] and all sinful souls, solemnly establishing the supreme Great Register Retreat. Reverently following the ritual codes, we kindle one altar of the Radiant Wheel Lamp. We repent and eradicate the roots of sin, transferring and ascending the departed souls.

May the three dawns’ radiance revolve, illuminating the lands of the eight directions; may the Five Paths’ light open, forever ending the sufferings of the Nine Hells. Through the grace of wisdom and compassion, may they attain the gate of liberation. Respectfully proceeding according to the profound ritual, we perform the Dharma rites.

**Precious Radiance of the Nine Nights, Most High Sovereign**
Next, the officers circumambulate to the west of the wheel lamp and stand facing east.

The first turning path of the wheel is named the *Gate of Suffering from the Burden of Form*. All sentient beings, driven by lustful hearts, indulge their passions and desires. After the body perishes, they endure the sufferings of the Mount Tai Earth Prison. Today, the Great Register Retreat’s sponsor, [Name], following the ritual codes, kindles the repentance lamp. We dedicate it to the departed soul [Name] and all sinful souls, to eradicate the roots of the burden of form and release the sufferings of the mind and spirit.

May the Nine Clarities witness and reflect, may the Three Treasures turn their light. Humbly beseeching the mercy of pardon, may they descend to relieve the trials of the Mount Tai Earth Prison.

**Wheel-Turning Sage King, Most High Sovereign**
The Dharma Master forms the Jade Clarity mudra with the left hand and holds the ritual staff with the right, proceeding with the practice. Reciting the hidden words, he burns the banner at the lamp and sprinkles purified water with a willow branch.

The mysterious lamp illuminates the highest void,
The Nine Heavens blaze with radiance.
Within the vast golden tower,
The Brahma-voices chant the cave scriptures.
The dragon chariots of all heavens descend,
Comforting the multitude of spirits.
The demon lords hold the talismanic commands,
Ascending to report at the court of the Supreme Emperor.
Inconceivable merit.

The officers circumambulate to the north of the wheel and stand facing south.

The Second Wheel of Rebirth is called the Gate of Love’s Burdensome Affliction of the Spirit. All sentient beings drift upon the River of Love, tossed by the waves of the Sea of Desire. After the body perishes, they endure the torments of the Wind-Blade Hell.

Now, the Great Offering Master of the Yellow Register, so-and-so, in accordance with the ritual codes, kindles the lamp of repentance. On behalf of the departed spirit so-and-so and all sinful souls, may the roots of love’s burdens be extinguished, and the sufferings of spirit and form be released. We humbly pray that the Most Sacred Ones of the Jade Capital and the August Worthies of the Golden Portal may deign to bestow their merciful deliverance, relieving the trials of the Wind-Blade Hell.

**Wheel-Turning Sage King, Most High Sovereign**
The Dharma Master proceeds with the practice as before.

The mysterious lamp illumines the Great Void,
Its radiance piercing the highest emptiness.
Within the profound halls of the long night,
A hundred knots unravel and dissolve.
The sufferings of ten thousand kalpas are released in an instant,
The Nine Mysteries ascend to the heavenly abodes.
The feathered riders swiftly turn their wheels,
Journeying to the court of the Supreme Emperor.
Inconceivable merit.

The officers circumambulate to the east of the wheel and stand facing west.

The Third Wheel of Rebirth is called the Gate of Greed’s Burdensome Affliction of the Form. All sentient beings, coveting fame and pursuing profit, deplete their qi and harm their forms. After the body perishes, they endure the torments of the Mountain-Carrying and Stone-Bearing Hell.

Now, the Great Offering Master of the Yellow Register, so-and-so, in accordance with the ritual codes, kindles the lamp of repentance. On behalf of the departed spirit so-and-so and all sinful souls, may the roots of greed’s burdens be extinguished, and the sufferings of form and spirit be released. We humbly pray that the True Emperors of the Great Net and the Primordial Worthies of the Vast Kalpas may deign to bestow their merciful deliverance, relieving the trials of the Mountain-Carrying and Stone-Bearing Hell.

**Wheel-Turning Sage King, Most High Sovereign**
The Dharma Master proceeds with the practice as before.

The mysterious lamp suffuses the Nine Perfected,
Transcending the Supreme Palace of the Infinite.
Resonant and clear, the scriptures are recited,
Their jade-like voices piercing the great void.
Feet tread the steps of Heaven’s Unity,
Gaze flowing to observe the ten directions.
The Golden Tiger inscribes the register of destiny,
Abiding forever in the halls of the Supreme Emperor.
Inconceivable merit.

The officers circumambulate to the south of the wheel and stand facing north.

The Fourth Wheel of Rebirth is called the Gate of Florid Striving and Bitter Refinement. All sentient beings, coveting and contending for fleeting glory, dissipate their true qi. After the body perishes, they endure the sufferings of the River-Filling and Earth-Excavating Hell. We pray that the Supreme Sages of the Mysterious Capital and the Lofty Perfected of the Purple Palace may deign to bestow their great mercy of forgiveness, relieving the trials of the River-Filling and Earth-Excavating Hell.

**Wheel-Turning Sage King, Most High Sovereign**
The Dharma Master proceeds with the practice as before.

The mysterious lamp illumines the darkest night,
Its radiance suddenly revealing a luminous countenance.
Joyfully, the seven ancestors are liberated,
Forever freed from the Eight Difficulties.
Bathed in orchid-scented waters,
They form bonds with the towering pines.
Lifting the Ten Heavenly Perfected,
Ever to dwell with the Supreme Emperor.
Inconceivable merit.

The officers circumambulate to the northeast of the wheel and stand facing southwest.

The Fifth Wheel of Rebirth is called the Gate of Corporeal Burden and Suffering Spirits. All sentient beings, deluded by illusory realms, exhaust their spirit-souls through toil. After the body perishes, they endure the sufferings of the Fire-Swallowing, Coal-Eating, and Cauldron-Boiling Hell. Now, the Great Register-Holder of the Yellow Register Retreat, so-and-so, in accordance with the ritual statutes, kindles the divine lamp of repentance. We pray for the departed spirit so-and-so and all sin-laden souls, that the roots of corporeal burden may be extinguished and the sufferings of the spirit-souls dissolved. We pray that the True Sages of the Ten Directions and the Compassionate Worthies of the Three Realms may deign to bestow their deliverance, relieving the trials of the Fire, Coal, and Cauldron-Boiling Hell.

**Wheel-Turning Sage King, Most High Sovereign**
The Dharma Master proceeds with the practice as before.

The mysterious lamp pierces the Nine Heavens,
As if igniting the opening of the Nine Netherworlds.
Gently, the nine ancestors are liberated,
Reborn upon the jade steps.
With minds serene, they return to the Cavernous Void,
Neither thirsting nor hungering.
Within the Five-Colored Canopy of Mysterious Yellow,
Their bodies grow garments of feathers.
Inconceivable merit.

The officers return to their original positions.

The Purple Sages bestow their compassion, manifesting the luminous standard of descending radiance; the Pure and True unfold their transformations, enacting the rite of spirit-deliverance and sin-removal. Universally for those sunk in delusion, they illuminate the darkest depths. Above, their light shines upon the Nine Heavens, augmenting the splendor of the Three Mornings; below, it gleams upon the Nine Earths, stilling the bitterness of the myriad hells. The blessings pour like wine into the Yellow Springs, grace moistening the Six Paths. In the Northern Darkness’ Night Bureau, the suffering souls at the end of their punishment behold this lamp’s glow and forever depart the evil destinies.

Throughout the ten directions’ Dharma-realms, all sentient beings—from the one arising to the five, revolving in birth and return—find the Six Directions unbound and afflictions stilled. All ascend to freedom, abiding long in light.

For these supreme causes, we invoke the Great Sage Primordial Heavenly Worthy, the Most High Great Dao Lord, the Most High Lord Lao, the Heavenly Worthy of Grand Salvation, the Heavenly Worthy of Deliverance from the Nine Netherworlds, and the Heavenly Worthy of the Vermilion Mound who Liberates Lives.

Inconceivable merit.

The five incantations above derive from the Celestial Master Lu’s *Rite of Lamp-Lighting and Invocation*, titled *The Nine Netherworlds’ Five Directions Lamps*. Here ends Scroll Twenty-Four of the *Perfect Rites of the Supreme Yellow Register Great Fast*.

Scroll Twenty-Five of the *Perfect Rites of the Supreme Yellow Register Great Fast* begins.

The Most High Enforcer of the Dao, Immortal Officer Jiang Shuyu, arranges the *Ritual Gate* and the *Banner-Raising Rite*. First, at the banner-raising site, a single incense table is set. The Dharma Master and the Fast Officers offer incense together. The invocation reads:

Your humble servant in the Dharma rank, [Name], respectfully invokes the Most High Boundless Dao, the Perfect and Supreme Thirty-Six Divisions of the Venerable Scriptures, the Treasured True Writs and Talismans; the Three Supreme Ones of the Most High; the Hosts of Sages of the Ten Directions; the Heavenly Compassionate Ones of the Eastern Ultimate Heavenly Palace, the Ever-Joyful Abode; the Responsive and Attending Most High Lord of Grand Salvation; the Jade Treasure August Heavenly Worthy of the East; the Mysterious Perfected Heavenly Worthy of Myriad Blessings of the South; the Supreme and Most Wondrous Heavenly Worthy of the West; the Mysterious August Jade Dawn Heavenly Worthy of the North; the Heavenly Worthy of Transcendent Salvation of the Northeast; the Heavenly Worthy of Life-Nurturing Deliverance of the Southeast; the Supreme Numinous Void August Heavenly Worthy of the Southwest; the Boundless Grand Florescence Heavenly Worthy of the Northwest; the Jade Void Luminous August Heavenly Worthy of the Upper Realm; the True August Cavern Spirit Heavenly Worthy of the Lower Realm; the Vermilion Mound Heavenly Worthy who Liberates Lives; the Heavenly Worthy of the Wheel-Turning Sage King; the Heavenly Worthy of Transcendence and Ascension; the Great Compassionate and Great Merciful Perfected of Salvation; the Great Compassionate and Great Merciful Perfected of Great Benevolence; the Great Compassionate and Great Merciful Perfected of Sin-Removal; the Great Compassionate and Great Merciful Perfected of Deliverance; the Imperial Lord of the Radiant Yang; the August Monarch of the Consolidated Yin; the Nine August Lords of the Central Northern Dipper; the Great Dharma Master of the Mysterious Center; the officials and attendants of the Three Realms; and all majestic numina.

Your servant has heard that the Primordial August One established the teachings to condescend to all sentient beings, while the Yellow Register bestowed its ordinances to universally deliver the suffering destinies of the Nine Netherworlds.

Establishing the fast is the foundation of reverent cultivation, while raising the banner precedes the offering of lamentation. As we prepare to inaugurate the sacred altar, it is fitting to proclaim the precious titles.

Now, with due reverence, we, the officials of such-and-such rank and name, on behalf of the departed soul of so-and-so, and for the universal salvation of all assembled spirits, hereby initiate the Supreme Yellow Register Grand Fast to aid in deliverance and inaugurate the sacred cloister. We humbly unfurl the resplendent banner, longing for the distant arrival of the Perfected’s celestial chariot and beseeching the descent of merciful radiance. May the luminous glory turn back, illuminating all with divine splendor. At the first hearing of the sacred name, the Three Wretched Realms shall, by its sound, escape suffering; by the pointing of the final grace, the Eight Directions shall be shaded and ascend. We, your servants, perform our devotions in due season, offering sincerity as though in the presence of the divine. Fearing the turbidity of the mortal realm and the sluggishness of the celestial path, we look up in reliance on supreme benevolence and bow in pity for our humble offerings.

Now, with the banner of deliverance and the divine spell of absolution, we reverently proclaim:
*The Yellow Register opens the path to salvation; the Three Realms and Ten Directions, the Four Kinds of Birth and Six Paths of Existence, all arrive at the Dao altar. May the spirits of the living be reborn and the souls of the dead be transformed, never forgotten through ten thousand kalpas.*
The banner’s essence follows the wind in flight; where the wind reaches, each turns toward its proper direction. In the courts of deepest yin, the lands of ninefold night, the hells, hungry ghosts, and boundless beings of suffering—all shall attain liberation and ascend to the heavens.
*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the Ordinance of the Most High for the Salvation of the Living.*

Next, the banner is raised and the invocation made:
*Banner of Absolution, Heavenly Worthy of Deliverance.*
The boundless merit of raising the banner is hereby universally dedicated. To the Ten Directions, Three Realms, Six Paths, and Four Kinds of Birth, may all together realize the mysterious merit and jointly attain the fruit of the Dao.

For the supreme karmic connection, we invoke the Great Sage Primordial Heavenly Worthy, the Most High Lord of the Great Dao, the Most High Lord Lao, the Heavenly Worthy of Great Compassion and Salvation, and the Heavenly Worthies of Salvation in the Ten Directions. Inconceivable merit!

**Initiating the Scripture-Recitation Rite**
The Dao assembly gathers at the scripture hall, facing the Three Treasures before the Celestial Throne, and stands in order.

**The Opening Hall Hymn**
The Dharma Master offers incense and makes the invocation:

Your servant, of such-and-such Dharma rank, burns incense and reverently invokes:
The Wondrously Non-Ultimate Celestial Worthy, the Spontaneous Primordial Heavenly Worthy; the Supreme Dao Treasure, the Wondrously Ultimate Celestial Emperor; the Jade Capital of the Empty Sovereign, the Great Dao Lord; the Supreme Scripture Treasure, the Perfectly Real Great Emperor; the Myriad-Transformed Chaos, the Mysterious Primordial Lord Lao; the Supreme Master Treasure, the Jade Emperor of the Vast Heaven; the Purple Tenuity Heavenly August Emperor; the Purple Tenuity Northern Culmen Great Emperor; the Great Emperor of Longevity at the Southern Culmen of Grand Tenuity; the Heavenly Worthy of Great Compassion and Salvation at the Eastern Culmen; the Heavenly Worthies of Salvation in the Ten Directions Who Respond to Cries; the Flying Perfected of the Ten Directions, the Great Saints of the Jade Capital, Mysterious Metropolis, and Purple Tenuity Upper Palace; the Nine Celestial Emperors; the Five Elder Emperors; the Thirty-Two Heavenly Lords; the Solar Emperor of the Sun Palace; the Lunar Sovereign of the Moon Palace; the Perfected Lords of the Five Stars and Five Powers; the Six Lords of the Southern Dipper; the Seven Primes of the Northern Dipper; the Twenty-Eight Lunar Lodges and the Star Lords of the Circumpolar Degrees; the True Rulers of the Heavenly Bureaus of the Nine Heavens; the Three Officials and Great Emperors; the Five Masters and Perfected Lords; the Venerable Scriptures of the Thirty-Six Sections, the Mighty Spirits of the Three Caverns; the Heavenly Perfected and August Persons, the Perfected of Wondrous Conduct; the Flying Celestial Kings of the Ten Directions, the Great Saints of Boundless Salvation; the True Officials of the Three Caverns, Four Supplements, and Attendant Scriptures for the Salvation of the Limitless; the Jade Lads and Jade Maidens; the Perfected of the Ten Palaces of the Dark Capital of the Northern Yin; the Great Emperor of Fusang, the Divine King of the Sun Valley; the Water Emperors of the Three Rivers, Four Seas, and Nine Yangtze; the Transcendent Officials governing the Grotto-Heavens and Blessed Lands; the Sacred Emperors of the Five Marchmounts; the Local Earth Gods; the Overseers of the Void; the Directing Talismans and Attending Spirits; all responsive numina of the Three Realms, and every majestic spirit—we universally offer our worship together.

The incense is jade blossoms scattering radiance, the ninefold qi congealing into fragrant smoke. The dense clouds of incense weave a net, piercing straight through the Nine Heavens. May the Golden Lad who attends the incense and the Jade Maiden who transmits words convey your servant’s invocation and bring it before the Celestial Throne. May all that your servant has invoked be granted as petitioned.

Your servant has heard that the jade scripts and golden writings unfold the transformation of the Double Mystery; the precious chapters and sacred models give rise to patterns before the Void and Cavern. They safeguard and secure the state and household, transcending all ranks and kinds. Their divine efficacy is unfathomable, their profound meaning inexhaustible.

Today, on behalf of the Ritual Officer So-and-so, I solemnly offer this for the deceased kin So-and-so Yi, and universally for all the souls assembled here, having established the Supreme Yellow Register Grand Fast. In prayer for their ascent and deliverance, on this very day, we turn and recite the true scriptures of the Most High in all their departments, their resonant titles inscribed upon jade tablets. Reverently relying upon the power of the Dao, we universally deliver those sunk in darkness. Looking up, I implore your gracious radiance; looking down, I beseech your witnessing presence.

Your servant’s heart is filled with utmost sincerity, devotion, and reverence. Having heard the scriptural petition, I now respectfully proclaim it.

[The proclamation of the scriptural petition is concluded; it is then burned.]

All officials proceed to their positions.
The Three Refuges ritual hymn is intoned.
All in the ritual arena, holding tablets before their hearts, sit properly as prescribed.
The hymns of praise are chanted as prescribed.
The *Host of Past Lives* hymn is sung.
Incense is carried; hands are purified with water.
The scriptures are unfurled.
The *Silent Recollection* is recited as prescribed.
The Dharma Master recites the *Mystic Store* mantra.
The scriptures are opened.

At the dawn of kalpas vast, the cloud-script filled the void.
Now distant, now near—now sinking, now floating.
Five directions circling, beyond a zhang’s reach.
The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign took brush in hand and wrote,
Expounding the profound chapters, inscribing next the numinous talismans.

The Primordial Beginning bestowed the True Writ,
Spreading its radiance in the manifest, its mystery in the hidden.
Those afflicted by unseen ills may heal themselves of dust.
The weary and drowned may float free;
the lost in darkness shall rise, by this means ascending to the Immortal Capital.

Today, on behalf of the chief patron of the Yellow Register Grand Fast, the official [Name], hailing from [Place], we reverently offer this for the deceased kin [Name] as principal dedication, and for the living as universal blessing—adjusting the intent of the fast as announced on the [Day] of this month, having pre-notified the Three Heavens and filed records across the Three Realms.

We now gather the pure assembly before us to open and recite the various true scriptures of the *Most High Cavernous Mystery, Numinous Treasure*, dedicating them to the Three Treasures, the August Thearch, the Ten Poles’ Lofty Perfected, the Three Origins and Three Realms, the Mountain, Earth, and Water Bureaus, the altar’s assembled deities of the jiao, and the mourned departed spirits, the ten directions’ sin-laden souls.

The sacred titles of the true scriptures, their merit complete, are proclaimed in a separate memorial.
May the sagely insight return in brilliance; may the thearch’s compassion grant protection.
Sever the earthly roots at death’s gate, stilling karmic retribution;
Refine the yin souls at life’s portal, elevating form and spirit.
May the eight directions know purity and peace; may the nine nights shine resplendent.
May all sentient beings attain the wondrous fruit of non-action.

For this supreme cause, we invoke:
The Great Sage Primordial Heavenly Worthy,
The Most High Great Dao Lord,
The Most High Lord Lao,
The Heavenly Worthy of Great Compassion Who Saves from Suffering,
The Heavenly Worthy Who Delivers from the Nine Hells,
The Heavenly Worthy Who Crosses to the Vermilion Mound,
The Heavenly Worthy of the Great Bridge of Salvation,
The Heavenly Worthy of the Cinnabar Realm of Fire,
The Heavenly Worthy of the Wheel-Turning Sacred King,
The Heavenly Worthy Who Grants Rebirth According to Wishes,
The Heavenly Worthy of Carefree Bliss,
The Heavenly Worthy of Lofty Perfection’s Wondrous Fruit,
The Heavenly Worthies of the Numinous Treasure of the Ten Directions—
their inconceivable merit and virtue.

*Opening the Scriptures Hymn*
The rotation of recitation proceeds as prescribed; the methods of visualization and recollection are found in the *Ritual for Ascending the Altar and Reciting Scriptures*.

**Rite of the Divine Tiger Announcing the Jade Tablet**

First arrange pure tea, wine, and fruit offerings. The Daoist assembly stands in order, while the Dharma Master performs the visualization as prescribed.

**Prayer of Incense**
By the power of sincere devotion, the myriad sages descend from afar.
With crimson sincerity ascending, the thousand perfected gather in full.
Relying on the divine spirits to convey our heartfelt pleas,
borrowing the precious incense to transmit our minds.
Reverently we burn this sacred incense,
offering it to the Three Clarities and Supreme Saints,
the Ten Poles of Lofty Perfected,
the Seven Primordials of the Northern Dipper,
the Dark and Mysterious Great Unity Lady of the Northern Dipper,
the Heavenly Unity Divine Tiger of Northern Blessing,
the Great Unity Purple Prime Jade Tablet Lady,
the Male Left Jade Minister Xuanbo,
the Female Right Martial Luan Master Clerk,
the Envoys of the Three Bureaus Who Pursue Souls,
the Three Direct Seal Spirits,
the Seven Primordial Jade Maidens,
the Officials and Soldiers Who Seize and Capture Hun and Po,
the Great Gods of the Five Paths,
the True Officials of Earth and Local Domains,
and the Void-Space Overseers—
all numinous and responsive powers.
By this true incense, we make universal offering.

The incense is jade blossoms scattering radiance, ninefold qi congealing in mist.
The fragrant clouds densely woven, piercing the nine heavens.
The Golden Lad Who Attends the Incense and the Jade Maiden Who Transmits Words
ascend to report before the Celestial Emperor,
so that all our petitions may be granted as spoken.

Now, in accordance with the intent of entering the fast:
We submit that yang gives life while yin brings death,
illuminating good and evil with impartiality;
earth is turbid while heaven is pure,
determining ascent and descent by their own nature.
The Northern Kuei establishes the bureau of pursuit and seizure,
while the Southern Chang maintains the office of refinement and deliverance.
This may be called the great compassion of the supreme Dao,
the universal deliverance of the luminous perfected.
Today, on behalf of so-and-so,
we beseech the performance of this fast and rite,
bestowing blessings upon both the hidden and the manifest.
Respectfully following the golden precepts,
we proclaim and enact the Jade Tablet.
May the nine springs open the way to deliverance,
and the six paths receive grace.
May all sentient beings
attain the wondrous fruit.
The officiating assembly, pure and clear,
purifies the altar as prescribed.

**Purification by Sprinkling**   *Prayer repeated*

The dead cannot be revived, yet the Most High possesses the method of returning the soul;
the Dao transforms through non-action, as the Primordial Perfection bestows the ordinance of universal deliverance.
To restore the lingering departed to life, one must first summon their ethereal consciousness.
With my utmost concentration, I align with their numinous presence,
hoping to disperse the accumulated gloom of yin’s miasma,
that it may not offend the harmonious yang qi.

We humbly beseech the Divine Tiger Great Sage and the Lords of Pursuit and Seizure,
to remember the teachings and precepts of the Primordial Beginning,
and to regard with favor the sincere supplications of the fast’s sponsor.
Hearing the call, respond with compassion.
The Dao assembly, in utmost devotion, wholeheartedly invokes:

We beseech the Divine Tiger Host of Sages.
The Dharma Master forms the mudra, intones the secret incantation,
and presents the Jade Tablet of the Dark Heaven and the talismanic script of the Divine Tiger.
Primal Unity converges qi, the Supreme One and the Mysterious Dark.
Pursue the soul, seize the spirit, open the yang, and awaken the yin.
Let all spirits heed and attend—how dare they not receive our summons?

Divine Tiger Jade Maidens, Divine Tiger Great Sage,
Messengers of Soul-Pursuit, Officers of Spirit-Seizure:
Come swiftly at the first call, without delay or hesitation.
Receive the talismanic command and proclaim it to the cold courts.
Pursue the soul, seize the spirit, manifest shadow and form.
Come to this Dharma assembly, and may your merit be reported to the Jade Emperor.

Burn the talisman.
Visualize the offering of supreme incense,
present tea and wine in three libations,
and conduct the ritual as prescribed.

Proclamation:
Issuing talismans and conferring registers, all follow the ordinances of the Most High;
seizing spirits and summoning souls, all adhere to the decrees of the Primordial Master.
May cloud-borne chariots traverse every realm,
reaching even the gates of the Yellow Springs.
Guide the soul’s procession to attend this Dharma assembly.
The altar’s proclamation is now solemnly recited.

Recitation of the Jade Tablet Proclamation:
The preceding altar proclamation has been fully recited.
We humbly invoke the Two Great Sages of the Divine Tiger,
the Messengers of the Three Departments, the Seven Jade Maidens,
to bear the Hidden Writ of the Mysterious Dark and the Jade Tablet of Primal Unity,
ascending to the Ninefold Purity, descending to the Ninefold Underworld,
and extending to the ten directions, three realms,
the Northern Yin of Fengdu, the Ninefold Dark Prisons, the grotto palaces of immortals—
opening barriers and clearing paths,
to pursue and retrieve the soul of the departed so-and-so,
along with all wandering spirits and lingering souls across the nine provinces,
the six paths, the four modes of birth,
that they may swiftly depart their stations and come to this numinous altar.
Attend the audience of the Most High, approach the living kin.
Go everywhere, reach everywhere.
In accordance with the mysterious ordinances and the jade statutes, act without delay,
lest the work of deliverance be hindered.

Burn the talismanic proclamation as prescribed.

The Dharma Master paces the Dipper, enters the Dipper’s realm,
holding the Water Sword, facing east and standing to the south, intones:
"Supreme One, Purple Primordial Sovereign,
Celestial One of the Northern Charge,
Divine Tiger soars on the halberd,
wielding the Dipper’s sway—
wherever the Jade Tablet reaches,
gather the radiant essence of the ten directions in a single breath.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command!"

The Dharma Master draws qi from the southeast, infuses it into the water,
and sprays a mouthful, intoning:
"Generals He and Qiao,
Messengers of the Three Departments for Soul-Pursuit,
hasten to the realm of the living and the abode of the dead,
to pursue and retrieve the soul of the departed so-and-so.
Swiftly attend this Dharma assembly,
to receive the merit of the Numinous Treasure’s ascension and deliverance."

Visualize the officers departing to pursue the departed soul.
Recite the *Nian Shan San* as prescribed.

*Concluding the Twenty-Fifth Scroll of the* Supreme Yellow Register Great Fast *Established Rites*
*Beginning the Twenty-Sixth Scroll of the* Supreme Yellow Register Great Fast *Established Rites*
Compiled by the Celestial Enforcer of the Most High, Immortal Jiang Shuyu
*Section on Rituals: Rite of Summoning the Departed*

First prepare an incense-and-flower altar, placing it before the Ghost Gate, with the soul-summoning banner set before the altar. Invite the fast’s patron to offer incense, while the Daoist assembly lines up in order and intones the *Universal Offering Hymn*. The Dharma Master then offers incense and makes the following declaration:

*"In this duly ordained ritual office, your servant [Name] now kindles incense and respectfully memorializes the Three Clarities and Three Realms, the Ten Poles and Ten Radiant Realms, the Compassionate Venerables of the Great Dao, the Great Saints of all Heavens, the Palaces of Sun and Moon, the Northern Dipper and Southern Asterisms, the Five Planets and Three Terraces, the Earthly Waters and Sacred Mountains, the Rivers and Marshes, and all responsive numina of the Ten Directions and Three Realms. By this true incense, we make universal offering. This incense is jade blossoms scattering radiance, ninefold qi congealing as mist—its fragrant clouds densely woven, ascending straight to the Nine Heavens. May the Golden Lads who attend the incense and the Jade Maidens who transmit words hear this above before the Celestial Emperor, so that what your servant now petitions may be granted as spoken."*

*"Your servant now humbly acts on behalf of the fast’s patron [Name], who, in this grand offering of the Supreme Yellow Register Great Fast—observed for three days and three nights—solemnly dedicates it to the departed kin [Name] and universally to all souls present. Having already submitted the memorial to the Celestial Bureaus, entreated the Preceptor, memorialized the Ten Directions, and sealed the covenant with the Three Realms, we now inaugurate this fast’s altar with the established rites. We reverently beseech your compassion to bestow deliverance, to issue decrees commanding the numinous authorities, summoning and gathering the departed souls to attend this Dharma assembly, receive the fruits of merit, and ascend to the realm of rebirth. Your servant now purifies thought and darkens the heart, reverently invoking true response."*

The Dharma Master visualizes the transformation step upon the Divine Tiger’s Stellar Diagram and summons the spirits:

*"We solemnly summon the Northern Kui and Mysterious Model Bureau; the Divine Tigers who seize souls and capture hun-po; the Jade Maidens of the Inverted Life Office; the Male Left Jade Court’s Mysterious Elder; the Female Right Martial Phoenix’s Chief Scribe; the Upper, Middle, and Lower Departments’ Soul-Pursuit Messengers; the Great Spirits of Cloud and Auxiliary Essence; the Sevenfold Merit Officers; those who call and breathe forth hun-po; the Luminous Essence Clerks and Soldiers; the Community Deities and City Gods; the Five Roads’ Earth Deities; and all guiding spirits of good. Hear this urgent summons and hasten to this altar!"*

*"On behalf of the fast’s patron [Official Title and Name], who has inaugurated this Supreme Yellow Register Great Fast to universally dedicate it to the departed kin [Name] and all souls present, we seek to dissolve karmic burdens and enable transcendence to the realm of rebirth. Having already memorialized all Heavens and sealed the covenant with the Ten Poles, we now require the dedicated souls—hun of the departed and po of the kin—to come before this altar and reverently receive the fast’s merit. Today, at this hour of the [Day] day of the [Month], we dispatch the Great Unity Primal Divine Tiger’s Jade Edict, to proceed in advance to the realm of the living and the abode of the dead, executing the preliminary pursuit and capture. Now, in reverent compliance with the Jade Statutes and in observance of this precious fast, we require the aforementioned departed souls to come before this numinous altar and undergo deliverance according to the rites. We humbly entreat the Two Great Saints of the Divine Tigers, the Three Departments’ Soul-Pursuit Messengers, the Seven Jade Maidens, and all others to urgently traverse the Three Realms and Ten Directions, to every office where myriad true numina fulfill their duties, to pursue and seize the soul of [Name], bringing it before the soul-summoning banner to attend the true ones, hear the Dharma, receive transformation, and attain rebirth. Let none delay or obstruct this deliverance. If universally dedicating, proclaim the list of names and statuses here."*

The Dharma Master burns the *Great General’s Soul-Summoning Talisman* and silently recites the incantation.

The *Lingbao* Talismanic Command delivers and liberates the departed souls of [Name] and others, releasing them from hell and forever parting from eternal night. Let the Five Sufferings and Three Paths no longer detain them. Let them break free from the pressing throng of ghosts and sever the bonds of death’s register. Swiftly, swiftly, as the Statutes of the Great Emperor of Longevity decree!

The invocation is repeated:
I act as Heaven’s agent to transform, delivering the dead and aiding the living. Relying on your numinous efficacy, assist my true Dharma. All departed souls—whether dwelling in the heavens or among humans, whether fallen into ghostly realms, detained for interrogation, or bound in dark yin—are hereby summoned in accordance with the talismanic command of the Supreme Mystery, the jade writ of celestial script. Pursue and seize their souls, hastening them to this altar. Reveal their forms in clarity, reconnect them with their yang kin. Thus shall the great teaching be proclaimed, and all beings find faith. This is executed strictly in accordance with the statutes of the Mysterious Canon and jade ordinances; none may delay or obstruct.

Next, the Pure Yang Youth is directed to hold the banner,
while the officiating Daoist performs the summons according to ritual.
The *Talismans of the Two Great Saints* are burned, and the Master silently intones:
Left, the Mysterious Elder of the Jade Bureau; right, the Martial Mistress of the Phoenix Office. I now summon the departed souls of [Name] and others to swiftly come before the soul-summoning banner, without delay. He Chang, Qiao Xun—aid my spirit. What I command must be swiftly obeyed. Swiftly, swiftly!

During the summoning, the Dharma Master transforms into the Most High Heavenly Worthy. From the *Hand Seal of the Original Master*, passing through the *Two Principles and Jia Signs*, to the *Hand Seal of Returning to the Supreme Emperor*, the seal is pressed upon the departed one’s life destiny. Drawing qi from the Ghost Gate, he blows it onto the banner. With focused intent, he invokes the Three Yuan Attendants, Divine Tiger General, Seizer of Souls Official, and Pursuer of Spirits. May they descend without delay, swiftly arrive at the ritual altar, and guide the departed soul to manifest clearly in response.

With focused intent, he summons the departed soul of [Name], praying that the spirit remain undimmed, as if still living. This very night, at this very hour, may it come before the Dharma assembly to receive this Yellow Register and partake in the merit of liberation.

**Hymn of the Dipper:**
The cycles of yin and yang shift as kalpas turn,
Life and death flow in ceaseless return—who is wise, who is foolish?
The wheel of rebirth knows no end, shaped by the Upper Yuan’s creation,
Yet those who have not transcended the Three Realms remain bound by divine transformation.
□□ the Eastern Dipper, □□ the Western turn,
□□ the Southern Dipper, □□ the Northern face.
Yin spirits drift in obscurity, lost in the void,
Yang souls wander in restless gloom, unseen and unheard.
When heaven and earth are still, myriad ghosts lie hidden;
When heaven and earth stir, myriad ghosts awaken.
As yin and yang revolve, ghosts and spirits receive their due—
Why, then, does the summoning of the Great One linger?
First or last to arrive, the law remains constant:
Hear this call, hasten to my altar,
And be granted the sacred writ to ascend to the Highest Clarity.

The Dharma Master forms the *Hand Seal for Seizing Souls* and silently recites the secret incantation (as recorded in the *Secret Instructions for Practice*):
*Xingsheng, Duli, Kehan, Gongdu, Juhun, Duihun she.*
He then intones:
May the soul’s spirit be pure and upright,
May the myriad qi endure forever.
Spared from suffering and torment,
May the body radiate light.
Restore the original form,
Revive the original spirit.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Law of the Great Emperor of Eternal Life.

Three times repeated, he draws northern qi and blows it onto the banner, visualizing the arrival.

The Dharma Master recites aloud:
*Taiguang, Youjing, Shuangling*—the Three Hun—
Return to emptiness, return to truth,
To the primordial qi of heaven and earth.
Once more, gather your form and spirit.
This is the true work of the Five Agents’ creation,
No hiding, no evasion, no escape.
At a single call, swiftly transform into a true spirit.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the law commands.

The officiating Daoist summons again:
With focused intent, he invokes the Three Yuan Attendants, Divine Tiger General, Seizer of Souls Official, and Pursuer of Spirits. May they descend without delay, swiftly arrive at the ritual altar, and guide the departed soul to manifest clearly in response.

With focused intent, he summons the departed soul of [Name], praying that the spirit remain undimmed, as if still living. This very night, at this very hour, may it come before the Dharma assembly to receive this Yellow Register and partake in the merit of liberation.

**Hymn of the Yellow Return:**
The Banner of the Yellow Return from the Grand Tenuity,
The Luminous Command of the Peerless One.
Summoning from the Palace of Endless Night,
Liberating and receiving the souls of the reborn.
Such inconceivable merit!

The Dharma Master recites aloud:
The Three Officials of the Northern Feng,
Inspecting the ghostly encampments.
No concealment permitted,
The golden horse relays the decree.
Proclaimed universally,
All spirits heed the call.
The Five Emperors of the Three Realms,
Declare it to the Highest Clarity.

The Dharma Master burns the *Talisman of the Merit Official for Healing Illness* and the *Talisman for Summoning the Five Spirits to Merge*, praying:
Incense is offered to petition the Azure Emperor, Lord Protector of the Hun;
The White Emperor, Attendant of the Po;
The Vermilion Emperor, Nourisher of Qi;
The Black Emperor, Conveyor of Blood;
The Yellow Emperor, Central Sovereign;
The Heavenly Physician, Great Sage of the Six Offices;
The Divine Healers of the Two Bureaus;
The Life-Forming Doctors;
The Merit Officials for Healing;
The Generals Who Gather Poisons;
The Dispensers of Medicinal Spirits;
The Stone-Needle Attendants;
The Officials of Bian Que;
The Immortal Medicine Youths;
The Great Generals of Life-Transformation Who Restrain Hun and Po;
And all spirit authorities.
May they all, in compassion, descend to this altar,
And on behalf of the souls now present to receive liberation,
Draw down true qi to heal their afflictions,
Revive their hun and po,
Restore their forms and spirits,
In accordance with the statutes of the Most High.

The Dharma Master, conducting the affairs of the Five Bureaus, silently recites the true names of the Five Emperors and performs the ritual.

The Dharma Master prays:
On behalf of the ritual sponsor [Name], I now universally deliver the departed kin [Name] and all assembled souls, establishing this Supreme Yellow Register Grand Ritual.
Thus, I summon and gather the departed souls of the sponsor’s entire household—
Those being delivered, along with the nine generations of ancestors, the seven lineages of descent,
Parents, spouses, children,
Brothers, sisters,
Nephews, grandchildren,
Close and distant kin,
Inner clan and outer relatives,
All named dependents,
And those bound by marriage ties—
Those who owe life, owe wealth,
Owe gratitude, owe virtue,
Whether deceased before or after,
And all karmic adversaries.

All shall arrive at the Dao altar to universally receive deliverance and enlightenment.
By the power of the Dao, I enable you all to rejoice and be at ease.
Come forth to the Dao altar; you should quietly focus your thoughts and cast aside all fear.
This ritual fast is called the Rite of Equality.
If the Three Poisons remain unremoved, still clouding the Six Perceptions,
if enmity and kinship, self and others, are falsely distinguished,
then there can be no true equality.

Those who come in male form shall array themselves to the left;
those who come in female form shall array themselves to the right.
Each shall take the hand of another and follow the ritual banners to approach.
Bathe, change garments, and attend the altar to hear the Dharma.
The pure assembly, with reverent sincerity, shall recite hidden invocations to guide the way.

The spirit script leads the departed souls to the bathing place,
where one attendant sprinkles purified water along the path with a willow branch to cleanse defilements.

**Ritual for Bathing the Departed Spirits**
First, within the bathing chamber, prepare two fragrant-water baths with meticulous purity.
All necessary bathing implements shall be fully provided.
A clean wooden bucket filled with purified water shall be placed before the main path.

The Dharma Master leads the Dao assembly to the incense table,
where they offer incense and stand in proper order.
The Dharma Master makes the invocation to request the water:

*"In my ritual position, your servant [Name] burns incense and respectfully invokes the Three Treasures, Venerable Masters,
the Ten Directions’ Great Sages, the Five Ancient Lords, the Thirty-Two Heavenly Emperors,
the Lords of the Sun, Moon, and Five Planets, the Star Lord of the Eastern Well,
and all assembled deities of the Yellow Register, whose majestic numen responds to invocation.
I have heard that departed souls undergoing refinement must rely on the true key of enlightenment;
that defiled qi, scattered and profuse, requires the cleansing power of Dharma-water for purification.
To achieve deliverance, I now humbly present this petition.
On behalf of the ritual sponsor [Name], I have established this Supreme Yellow Register Grand Ritual
to properly deliver the departed kin [Name] and universally deliver all assembled souls.
In strict accordance with ritual protocol, I have summoned and gathered the spirits.
First, I shall cleanse their forms and spirits, then guide them to attend the altar.
May their karmic transgressions and impurities be repented, allowing them to transcend and attain rebirth.
I pray for your compassion, that you deign to hear and deliver them.
Send forth true qi and bestow the radiance of celestial light,
that all souls receiving deliverance may bathe in the profound blessings of the Mysterious and the Primordial.
I offer this prayer with utmost reverence."*

Next, the water is stirred with a ladle, beginning from the lunar station.
The assembly recites the hidden invocations in unison, stirring thirty-two times in accordance with the sound.

**The Master’s Dedication**
*"O majestic and virtuous One, whose merit and practice are complete,
descend to receive and guide, as the Treasure of the Master accompanies.
With compassion, bestow the Dharma-water to wash away delusion,
forever delivering them from the shores of the Three Wretched Realms,
eternally parting from the mire of the Five Defilements.
All the boundless meritorious causes from the invocation of this water
shall now cleanse the departed spirit [Name] of all karmic roots,
universally purifying them for the above-stated purpose."*

Recite the names of the Great Sage, the Primordial Heavenly Worthy,
the Most High Lord of the Dao, the Most High Lord Lao,
and the Ten Directions’ Savior from Suffering, the Heavenly Worthies.
*Inconceivable merit and virtue.*

The Heavenly Worthy of the Celestial River’s Purifying Bath leads them to the bathing chamber,
where the invoked water is divided between the male and female bathing areas.
Boil the Five Fragrances decoction and mix it with the water, ensuring it is warm and suitable.

The officiating Daoist performs the ritual.

The Three Wretched Realms’ scorching afflictions
are cooled by the grace of the Dharma’s moisture;
the Five Entanglements’ binding coils
are washed and scoured by the numinous stream.
Thus does our Heavenly Worthy, moved by compassion,
the Great Dao’s merciful kindness,
sprinkle and shower all beings,
delivering them from every suffering.
He reveals the wondrous canon of perfumed cultivation,
bestows the luminous rite of bathing and refinement,
enabling them to bathe in the Flower Pool,
attaining carefree ease upon the Dao’s shore.
Thereafter, form and spirit both become wondrous,
blessings and felicity arise of themselves.

We now reverently invite the departed spirit to approach the bath with devotion.

Recite the *Eastern Well Hymn*, with the assembly responding in harmony.
The Dharma Master visualizes the chamber filled with five-colored clouds of qi,
the qi of the Thirty-Two Heavens, the sun, moon, and Five Stars,
intermingling within the water.

The Celestial River pours into the Eastern Well,
the essence of the Stone Mirror Water Mother.
A halo of radiance brushes the spirit’s brilliance,
mysterious luminance gleaming in lofty clarity.
The Primordial Beginning parts the heavy night,
heavenly beings follow the moon’s birth.
Bathed upon the Orchid Pool,
dragons bear the Long Geng vase.
Golden Lads scatter fragrant flowers,
Jade Maidens stream the Five Stars.
Crown and sash are laved in jade fluid,
refining and transmuting the Five Immortals’ forms.
The body’s fragrance summons myriad spirits to descend,
riding the light to ascend the heights of purity.

Though the long night’s luminosity
derives from the talisman’s deliverance from suffering,
the fullness of meritorious deeds
still relies on fragrant water to refine the essence.
May this corporeal form of the Five Aggregates
receive the profound teachings of the Double Mystery.

Let all the Dharma assembly now cultivate pure minds,
and on behalf of the departed spirit, recite the *Three Primes’ Sincere Bathing and Purification Spell*:

Heaven’s qi is serene and clear,
five colors resplendent in lofty brightness.
Sun and moon emit their radiance,
tempering and refining the body’s form.
The spirit’s fluid washes within,
fragrant waters refine the essence.
Light and brilliance shine through,
illuminating the Highest Clarity.
Qi admits no dust,
the Five Palaces receive the numinous.
Sins vanish from the Three Wretched Realms,
calamities disperse from the Nine Darknesses.
The body receives liberation,
ascending into the Imperial Court.
Purifying form and refining substance,
the name is inscribed in the Purple Register;
delivering life and returning to birth,
the character is listed upon the Jade Clarity.
To render the soul-spirit limpid and upright,
all karmic filth must be dissolved.

Let all the Dharma assembly now cultivate minds of beneficence,
and on behalf of the departed spirit, recite the *Nine Perfected Ones’ Bathing and Refinement Spell*:

The Most High Perfected Ones,
essences of the Nine Numinous.
They cause souls to fly as immortals,
ascending to the Purple Court.
Bathed in the Flower Pool,
the spirit-body becomes limpid and clear.
Essence penetrates the Great Void,
myriad qi arise of themselves.
Invoking the Venerable One of the Eastern Ultimate,
universally delivering the living and aiding the dead;
stirring the Cinnabar Flower’s waters,
thoroughly removing defilement and dispersing yin.
May they forever uphold the Orthodox Perfected,
and constantly practice purity and stillness.

Let all the Dharma assembly now cultivate vast and expansive minds,
and on behalf of the departed spirit, recite the *Great Spell of Bathing, Cinnabar Yang, and Refinement*:

The Dragon Han is vast and boundless,
formless and nameless.
Across countless kalpas,
the August Dao opens in clarity.
The spirit lamp shines brightly,
the Nine Souls emit their essence.
Jade Void gleams with radiance,
Great Auroras resplendent in lofty brightness.
The Primordial Beginning initiates transformation,
all heavens unite in numinosity.
The Three Primes guide and nurture,
the Two Images gather and give life.
Those already delivered are delivered,
those unformed are formed.
The dead are transformed,
the withered flourish.
All creatures that wriggle and fly,
every dark spirit.
Those with child and those pregnant,
all receive life.
The departed spirit transcends fate,
the soul returns to the Three Clarities.
The po receives refinement and transmutation,
the Southern Palace transforms the form.
Today is most auspicious,
all attain luminosity.
The Five Emperors witness and reflect,
universally proclaiming to the myriad spirits.
Heavenly and earthly deities,
and all river sources.
The Five Peaks and Four Waterways,
and all renowned mountains.
Caverns of Mystery, Caverns of Void,
Caverns of Emptiness, Caverns of Immortals.
The Boundless Great Sage,
the Most Perfect Honored Spirits.
Without limit or end,
universally overseeing the deliverance of beings.
The roots of earth are severed,
names are recorded in the Mystic Capital.
All spirits shine together,
all heed this command.
Upon the Nine Clarities’ Jade Throne,
the grace of the August Emperor extends;
within the Three Caverns’ Golden Writ,
the compassionate Honored One’s Dharma words unfold.
How could this be aspired to by the dust-bound and ordinary?
Such is not for the defiled and impure to hear.

Having purified body and form,
attire must be made solemn.
Let all the Dharma assembly now cultivate minds of dignity,
and on behalf of the departed spirit, recite the *Three Primes’ Sincere Crown and Sash Spell*:

The Five Turbidities are now clear,
the Eight Effulgences now bright.
Today, receiving refinement,
sins vanish and blessings arise.
Forever equal with the Five Emperors,
joining the Perfected Ones of the Upper Numinous.

Burn the *True Robe of the Morning Audience* and the like.

The Six Palaces and Five Offices
internally purge the multitude of delusions;
the nine orifices and hundred bones
externally cleanse all impurities.
Thus may they approach the altar to hear the Dharma,
repent sins and remove transgressions.
Receive the prohibitions to sever evil roots,
attain the majestic light to know past lives.
Drawn forth from the earth’s gate,
ascend to be born in heaven.

On behalf of the departed spirit, we now reverently submit and await.

The Dharma rite guides the spirit back to its place.

Before the spirit’s seat, first perform the *Spell-Food Rite*,
arranging pure water, fragrant flowers, and offerings as prescribed.

Offer incense, and make the proclamation:

Golden grains and jade nectar,
those who partake ascend to the Nine Clarities’ realm.

Fire-pear and flame-date,
those who partake depart the Five Nights’ realm.
Without the power of the Dao as their aid,
how could they cross the Dharma-bridge?

The departed spirit of [Name],
suddenly swept away by flowing waters,
has fleetingly traversed the stream of time.
As the season of renewal approaches,
we reverently prepare pure and fragrant offerings.
Relying on the assembly of the pure,
we follow the subtle rites in due order.
Recite the precious gāthā to empower,
chant the spirit’s verses to confer prophecy.

We humbly pray the soul may remain undimmed,
as if still living.
May it partake of this fast’s merit
and perfect the wondrous Dao.

**Ten Directions Savior from Suffering Heavenly Worthy**
Form the Five Peaks Mudrā, make the proclamation:

On behalf of the departed spirit, we dedicate this to aid rebirth in the celestial realms.
Recite the *Jade Clarity Wisdom-Life Summons Spell*:

Bow to the Dark Wisdom, Void-and-Subtle Worthy,
bow in homage to the Profound Mystery Lord.
Fashioning heaven and earth without boasting virtue,
you become the refuge for all beings.
Compassionately deliver the souls of the Five Paths’ turning wheel,
pity and rescue the three souls from hell’s torments.
Homage to the Golden Portal Heavenly Worthy,
homage to the Six Perfections’ Merciful Father,
homage to the Jade Clarity Supreme Perfected.
Thus may they escape birth and death, everlastingly.
Emerging from existence, entering the void without reliance,
you transform the withered and decayed into immortals.
Once in a thousand kalpas, once in ten thousand kalpas—rarely encountered—
for the multitudes you broadly expound the causes of karma.
Reviving the corpse, raising the dead to eternal life,
you ensure their form and spirit remain unchanged.

*From the Jade Clarity Scripture.*

**Great Unity Savior from Suffering Heavenly Worthy**
All respond three times (hereafter the same).

We have heard that Fengdu’s depths are distant,
hell’s darkness profound.
The departed soul seeks to borrow our offerings,
so the precious gāthā must first be chanted in praise.

Now we recite the *Fengdu-Purifying, Hell-Shattering Dharma Words*:

For the departed spirit, we dedicate this to aid rebirth in the celestial realms.
Recite the *Fengdu-Purifying, Hell-Shattering Spell*:

Vast and boundless is Fengdu’s midst,
layer upon layer of Vajra Mountains.
The Limitless Light of the Numinous Treasure
illuminates the scorching pools’ afflictions.
The seven ancestors and all hidden souls,
their bodies follow the incense-cloud banners.
With the samādhi blue lotus,
they ascend to the divine, eternally at peace.

**Nine Dark Realms Deliverer from Sin Heavenly Worthy**

Now that hell’s gates are opened,
Fengdu’s judgments cease.
Wherever transformation is entrusted,
they emerge from the dark yin.

Now we recite the *Jade Clarity Brahma-Chant, Life-Soul Nurturing Dharma Words*:

For the departed spirit, we dedicate this to aid rebirth in the celestial realms.
Recite the *Jade Clarity Cloud Palace Brahma-Chant, Life-Soul Nurturing Spell*:

Rootless magic mushrooms,
the source of all transformations.
Within, the seven pò cohere;
above, the three hún conjoin.
The Twenty-Four Perfected,
entering and exiting without gate.
In the dim and distant,
flickering with primordial essence.
Surviving kalpas or perishing,
born following qi.
Externally, the undifferentiated is congealed;
internally, the seven meridians are nourished.
The five spirits plant blossoms,
the Three Terraces spread glory.
The Purple Palace and White Youth
return the form to infancy.
Ascending clouds, riding mists aloft,
amidst them the Jade Perfected,
named Divine Lord.
To the left, embracing Non-Shadow;
to the right, guarded by White Origin.
The Dark Beast blocks behind,
the Vermilion Phoenix escorts ahead.
Above floats the emerald canopy,
below surges the golden lotus.
Fragrant clouds condense in the void,
sweet dew without end.
Used without exhaustion,
tracing the source without end.

*From the Jade Clarity Scripture.*

**Vermilion Mound Life-Conveying Heavenly Worthy**

Now that the hún and pò are revived,
they must transcend the celestial path.
Refine and transform their form,
cleanse and purify their majesty.
Come to the Dharma assembly,
receive these offerings.

Yet we fear their throat and gullet remain obstructed,
with various hindrances.
Now we recite the *Sweet Dew Communicating with the Perfected Dharma Words*:

For the departed spirit, we dedicate this to aid rebirth in the celestial realms.
Recite the *Sweet Dew Communicating with the Perfected Dharma-Food Spell*:

The merit’s golden radiance,
faintly opens the dark barrier.
The Flower Pool flows with true fragrance,
lotus canopies follow clouds afloat.
A thousand spirits, doubly harmonized,
ever dwell in the Twelve Towers.
Hastily proclaim the Numinous Treasure’s decree,
roam freely in the celestial paradise.

The Heavenly Worthy declares: This divine spell,
if the deceased has long been confined in hell,
unable to achieve liberation,
upon hearing this spell,
their throat and gullet will open,
without obstruction.
Naturally joyful,
food and drink sweet and fragrant.
Their mind turns toward rebirth,
cutting off afflictions and karma.

**Carefree and Joyful Heavenly Worthy**

The Primordial Beginning unfolded the chart,
the true scriptures expounded the teachings,
bestowing grace without limit,
universally delivering without end.
For their ability to broadly nourish beings,
they are named *Sweet Dew*.
For their power to break through karmic hindrances,
they are called *Dharma Words*.

Now at the spirit’s feast,
receive the imbued Dharma-food.
The light of compassion shines,
the dew of wisdom moistens.
The apertures now opened and perceptive,
their spirit and consciousness will naturally become clear.
Transcend the Five Sufferings,
directly ascend the Nine Clarities.

Again relying on the true incantations,
eternally fill the deliverance.

Now we recite the *Jade Clarity Three Lights Supreme Dharma Words*:

For the departed spirit, we dedicate this to aid rebirth in the celestial realms.
Recite the *Jade Clarity Sweet Dew Dharma-Food Spell*:

Bow to the Round Net of Heaven,
salute the radiant spirit’s brilliance.
Restrain the hún, govern the seven pò,
contemplate and settle the center.
Walking, standing, bowing to the void,
resting, dwelling in the mysterious chamber.
Hunger is sated with yellow coptis blossoms,
thirst quenched with jade-root nectar.
The spirit’s banner commands the great demons,
the body refined with true light.
Reflecting and illuminating the Great Non-Being,
ever roaming the void.
Perfect communion, wave-subduing deliverance,
true transformation without delay.
Subtle and wondrous, without beginning or end,
practitioners must clearly know.
Silent and serene, forgetting doctrine and teaching,
responding to the times, unfolding the grand rule.
The descending Dao does not reveal itself,
it must first be applied.
Converging in the non-dual place,
following the mind, naturally uniting or parting.

*From the Jade Clarity Scripture.*
Inconceivable merit.

All respond three times (hereafter the same).

For the departed spirit, we dedicate this to aid rebirth in the celestial realms.
Recite the *Three Lights Qi Dharma-Food Spell* (the following four spells are from the *Scripture of Guiding and Leading the Three Lights’ Nine Transformations*):

Vast and crystalline, the Dharma-qi arises,
misty and dense, congealing in the mysterious.
The two luminaries together clarify,
the five wefts interpenetrate.
The Three Lights shine resplendent,
the precious qi fills the Three Palaces.
The imperial realm gathers the Nine Elders,
swallowing and serving, the hundred bones flourish.
Golden blossoms illuminate the radiance,
the body becomes one with the sun and moon.

Before the Most High Sage of the Dao, through ten thousand kalpas, life knows no end.

For the departed spirit, we dedicate this to aid rebirth in the celestial realms.
Recite the *Three Lights Flowing Essence Dharma-Food Spell*:

The wondrous Dao divides the primal qi,
within qi, yin and yang part ways.
Congealing into sun, moon, and stars,
brilliant, the Three Lights flow.
Nine blossoms merge with nine Dao-paths,
eight hues delight the eight directions.
Resplendent, they illumine the true body,
flowing essence returns to the Great Vast.
Below, born in the Abyssal Spring Palace,
above, arrayed in the Realm of No-Where.
The body soars, traces take flight,
suddenly all is forgotten.
Seven treasures stream with pure essence,
chaos mingles with blossoming radiance.
Swallowing the nine-clouds’ scattering,
this joy knows no end.

For the departed spirit, we dedicate this to aid rebirth in the celestial realms.
Recite the *Three Lights Nurturing Infant Dharma-Food Spell*:

Within the profound and boundless nine qi,
the nurturing infant arises from the Great Non-Being.
The radiant sun gleams in the Bright Valley,
the resplendent moon shines on Heaven’s Thoroughfare.
Five stars stream with precious light,
the Dipper and Pole revolve the celestial pivot.
Flying qi billows and scatters,
swallowing and partaking, one lingers in hesitation.
Transcending traces on the Heavenly Treasure Stair,
refining zhi herbs, partaking of blossoming petals.
Qi spreads, the ten thousand spirits complete,
the body ascends into the Great Void.

For the departed spirit, we dedicate this to aid rebirth in the celestial realms.
Recite the *Three Lights Yang Jade Dharma-Food Spell*:

Yang jade, the true and upright qi,
the wondrous true divides the Three Luminaries.
The Mysterious Harmony chants the numinous sound,
the Eight Assemblies unfold jade scriptures.
The Five Elders feast in the cinnabar abode,
floating, they ride the luminous clouds.
The Great Sages and hosts of heaven,
mount dragons and drink jade nectar.
The Three and Five determine the register of life,
playing as guests of the Most High.
Radiant light shines boundless,
hand in hand, they attend the imperial throne.

For the departed spirit, we dedicate this to aid rebirth in the celestial realms.
Recite the *Nine Dark Realms Rebirth Spell*:

The Cold Court holds much sorrow and suffering,
turning the heart, one pays homage to the Primal Sovereign.
The talisman of the Divine Treasure of Lady Green,
the true scripture of the Central Mountain’s Divine Emperor.
In a single thought, ascend to the Great Clarity,
silently reciting, contemplate the Great Non-Being.
Merit returns to the Nine Dark Realms below,
spiraling, one is born in the Purple Reed Marsh.
According to the vow, rebirth in the celestial realms, Heavenly Worthy.

For the departed spirit, we dedicate this to aid rebirth in the celestial realms.
Recite the *Departing Suffering, Ascending Heaven Spell*:

Inconceivable merit,
the practitioner reaps blessed reward.
Offering Dharma-food,
eternal life in the peaceful and joyous Dao.
Vast salvation, boundless Heavenly Worthy.

Having recited these sacred verses and empowered the Dharma-food,
these are the secret instructions of the Jade Clarity,
the sweet dew of Dharma speech.
For the departed spirit, we pursue purification of the celestial realms.
Through these virtuous benefits,
all adornments are made complete.
We humbly pray that names be recorded on the cinnabar terrace,
sins erased from the dark registers.
Forever ending the retributions of the Three Ways,
directly ascending to the abode of the Nine Elders.
Swallowing vast qi in the Primal Chamber,
drinking jade nectar in the cinnabar abode.
Joy flows through the ancestral gates,
blessings shade the clan’s branches.
Above, reaching the utmost light,
below, penetrating the deepest obscurity.
Together attaining the myriad wonders,
jointly realizing the non-action.
Bowing in reverence, we take refuge in the
Boundless Great Dao.

Dedication of merit.

As for the worldly rituals—five kinds of fragrant incense, six kinds of precious fruits, seven kinds of treasure nectars, five kinds of treasure flowers, and four kinds of fragrant rice—though derived from the Jade Clarity Scripture, their use is meaningless, serving only as adornment. With the night’s time limited, they are now all omitted.

*Concluding the Twenty-Sixth Scroll of the* Instantly Completed Rites of the Supreme Yellow Register Great Fast.
*Beginning the Twenty-Seventh Scroll of the* Instantly Completed Rites of the Supreme Yellow Register Great Fast.

The Most High Enforcer of the Dao, Immortal Officer Jiang Shuyu, arranges the
*Ritual Gate for Refining and Delivering the Deceased—Invitation to Descend for the Water-Fire Offering Rite*

First, place a square vessel in the northwest of the altar, with a placard inscribed:
**Pool of the Supreme Yin Water-Refining of the Southern Palace.**
Then, place a round vessel in the southeast of the altar, with a placard inscribed:
**Pool of the Supreme Yang Fire-Refining of the Southern Palace.**
Prepare in advance a vessel of yellow-flower divine water and charcoal fire of willow wood beneath the altar.

At the time of refining and delivering, arrange the offering mats in thirty-six divisions—or twenty-four divisions—setting them in proper order as prescribed. The Daoist assembly leads the Ritual Master and the Fast Officer to stand in sequence, inviting the Fast Officer to present incense.

**Purification**
*Burning Incense Hymn*
The Ritual Master presents incense,
**Invocation of the Incense**
**Petition**

Your subordinate, [Name], in full ritual position, reverently petitions:
The Marvelously Non-Existent Supreme Lord, the Self-So Originator Heavenly Worthy of Primordial Beginning;
The Marvelously Existent Supreme Lord, the Jade Clarity Great Dao Lord of the Empty Sovereign;
The Perfectly True Supreme Lord, the Venerable Lord of the Myriad Transformations and Primordial Chaos;
The Great Emperor of the Purple Tenuity Central Heaven and Northern Culmen;
The Great Emperor of the Supreme Subtlety Southern Culmen and Eternal Life;
The Heavenly Worthy of Great Compassion and Salvation, the Great Emperor of Cinnabar Heaven and Vermilion Mound;
The Nine Heavens’ Self-So Life-Generating Supreme Lord;
The Five Numinous and Five Venerable Supreme Lords;
The Lords of the Thirty-Two Heavens;
The Lord of the Eastern Florescence, Lord of the Azure Lad and Wooden Duke;
The Primordial Lady of the Western Numen, Golden Mother;

The Great Emperor of Eternal Life of the Upper Southern Palace;
The Great Spirit Sima of the Deliverance Office, the Life-Cherishing Lord Han the Venerable;
The True Lord of the Upper Southern Office, the Life-Recording and Longevity-Increasing Lord who Delivers from Calamity and Bestows Rebirth;
The Great Spirit who Oversees Resurrection and Revives the Dead, the True Lord who Delivers Lives and Perfects Immortality;
The Five Lords of the Numinous Treasure;
