The True Governors of the Vermilion Mound Fire Office;
The True Governors of the Yellow Register Court;
The Numinous Powers of the Yellow Register Refining and Delivering, the Responsive and Convergent Might of the Three Realms.

We humbly submit:
From the Cavernous Mystery descended transformation, unfolding the eight gates of life-delivering rites;
From the Numinous Treasure were transmitted the statutes, revealing the nine refinements of life-restoring secrets.

Ascending beyond the ethereal and luminous, delivering and protecting the hidden and manifest;
Grace abounds in the ten directions, mercy pervades the Three Realms.

Your servants now, on behalf of the patron of this retreat, so-and-so, and for the universal salvation of the departed kin, so-and-by, and all assembled souls, solemnly establish the Supreme Yellow Register Grand Retreat, lasting three days and three nights.
Reverently we pray for benevolent blessings, universally delivering those in the hidden paths;
Refining and delivering the departed spirits, raising them to realms of bliss.
We humbly present this modest offering, earnestly invoking the presence of the True Standards.
May our ant-like sincerity, though slight as floating duckweed, be met with grace.
We look up in hope to your boundless compassion, deigning to witness our utmost devotion.
Bestow your luminous favor, overseeing the refining and deliverance.

Your servants, together with the retreat officers, so-and-so, prostrate in earnest supplication, gazing upward for the advent of your merciful radiance.

With reverence, we bow twice and burn incense.
We invite the sacred presences to the Refining and Deliverance Hall.

**Initial Offering – Flower-Scattering Rites**
Your servants humbly invoke the Ten Directions’ True and Perfect Three Treasures, the Supreme Venerable Masters;
The Northern Culmen’s Purple Tenuity Great Emperor;
The Southern Culmen’s Longevity Great Emperor;
The Great Unity Savior from Suffering Heavenly Worthy;
The Upper Southern Palace’s Southern Prosperity Office, the Vermilion Mound Fire Office, the Refining and Deliverance Supreme Sages and Lofty Perfected;
The Responsive and Convergent Might of the Three Realms, all numinous powers.

We have heard: In the primordial undifferentiated chaos, none were sundered from their ancestral roots;
When the True Writs shone forth, all divine spirits were universally established.
The Three Origins were ordained, governing all transformations.
Born into the human realm, they bathed their forms in the Great Yang.
Departing from their original true nature, they brought upon themselves decay and death.
The Five Phases scattered, drifting for kalpas uncounted.
O Great Sages, Greatly Compassionate, universally saving, universally delivering—
Bridges for all beings, manifold expedient means.
You open the courtyard of the Yang-Refining Crucible, transcending the consciousness blown by the currents of the sea of desire.
Refining the embryo to return to the root, verifying ranks and ascending to rest.

Now, in accordance with the canonical rites, we proclaim and perform the refining and deliverance.
We beseech your radiant majesty to turn and bestow celestial light.
Command the true spirits of the Three Realms and the officers and generals of the Great Law.
Transform their forms and descend their qi, assuming their offices and dividing their duties.
Assist your humble servants in proclaiming and issuing the talismanic decrees.
May all the departed souls thus offered be bathed in yellow blossoms, their forms refined in flowing fire.
Severing the roots of evil, ending the wheel of suffering’s transmigration;
Filling with the qi of the Dao, attaining the purity and lightness of the Hall of Blessings.

Your servants, in utmost reverence and supplication, now present the memorial for the refining and deliverance.

**Proclamation of the Memorial – Burning of Incense**

**Secondary Offering**
We invoke the Refining and Deliverance Officers, Lords, Generals, and Clerks;
The Responsive and Convergent Might, all numinous powers.

We have heard: When the Primordial Beginning unfolded the chart, the true wind spread afar.
When the August Void expounded the teachings, the Great Law flourished.
Jade scripts and golden writs, numinous talismans and secret seals—
Delivering the dead souls from the Black Bureau, polishing the living spirits in the Vermilion Palace.
Lofty and majestic, vast and boundless in virtue.
Granting that all may follow and uphold them, to deliver the hidden and dark.

The bureaus of the Law, the offices of immortals, the generals and clerks—
All preside over their domains, each observing the proper rites.
May they together exalt the mysterious wind, swiftly manifesting the divine transformations.
Dutifully following the Dao’s decree, opening the deliverance for the departed souls.
The six destinies and three paths, erased from the death registers of the Nether Bureau;
The three transformations and nine refinements, inscribed in the life rosters of the Heavenly Court.

Our rites, though humble, lodge our sincerity; our offerings, though meager, fall short of what is due.
May the gods graciously accept, fulfilling our earnest prayers.
In utmost reverence and supplication.

**Burning of Incense – Final Offering**

**Proclamation of the Petition**
The sincerity of our hearts has been fully expressed.
We humbly trust that your true wisdom will surely grant its luminous witness.
In the dusty and clamorous world, our offerings may be flawed and coarse.
Undeterred by our lowly and insignificant station, we beg for your compassion and forgiveness.
We pray that your boundless grace may abundantly bestow celestial favor,
Verifying the deliverance of the departed souls, perfecting their good fruits.
Above, manifesting the virtue of the Great Dao’s love for life;
Below, fulfilling the sincerity of your disciples’ return to the command.

Respectfully submitted.

Burning of paper money and horses together with the memorial, transmuting them.

**Dedication of Merits – Recitation of Good Deeds**

Establishing the Water and Fire Pools, the assembly performs the rites.
The Dharma Master is led to the Water and Fire Pools, invoking the descent of true water and true fire.

The Master performs the Fire Pool Rite, pacing the Southern Dipper Fire Bell Mantra, arriving at the Fire Pool.
The assembly recites the hidden incantations.

The Master reaches the Fire Pool, encircling the twelve positions.
Using the Opening and Flowing Communication Rite, reciting the "Contending with Heaven and Earth" incantation once, spraying water from the mouth into the pool.

After completing the rites according to the method, reciting the Fire Pool Establishment Incantation:

By the Supreme’s decree, sins are pardoned and lives delivered.
The six destinies and three paths all behold the light.
Establishing the Fire Pool, ascending in due order.
Each according to their karmic retribution, all attain transcendence.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Emperor commands.

Visualizing the Vermilion Mound’s raging fire flowing with molten gold, entering from the southeast corner of the Fire Pool.
Fiery golden flames blaze forth; drawing three breaths of the noon qi, blowing them into the pool.

Holding the True Fire Unification Talisman, forming the True Fire Descent Mudra.
From *yin* to *wu*, silently reciting the incantation...

Flame Spirits, Flame Spirits, the Vermilion Bird soars aloft.
With one divine fire descending, press upon *bing* and *ding*.
Fiery divine maidens, bearing the Emperor’s bell.
Samādhi true fire, swiftly descend to the Vermilion Mound.
By the command of the Supreme Emperor of Longevity of the Southern Pole.

Draw the noon *qi*, blow upon the talisman, and burn it in the Fire Pool.

Recite the secret incantation again:
Southern Yan’s floating cavern, courtyard of flowing fire.
Jade eyes gleaming, essence of flowing fire.
Sharp as the blade, profound as the Dharma, divine youths of *Bhagini*.
Substance of flowing fire, true visage of jade eyes.
Ascend into the Hall of Blessings, the Palace of Primordial Yang.

The master then faces east, draws the true *qi* of the sun of the day, and blows it forth.
Next, command the Fire Pool Attendants, the Refinement and Salvation Officials, the Divine Youths, and the Solar Essence of Midday to swiftly descend into the pool and await, guiding the departed souls into the Fire Pool to refine their forms according to the method.
Swiftly, swiftly.

Visualize the divine courtyard of flowing fire, boundless in expanse.
Above lies the Vermilion Mound’s Fire Bureau, its towers and pavilions resplendent.
Within the courtyard, fire and golden hues blaze, their flames crowned with fire bells.

The master performs the Water Pool Rite, pacing the Mystic Pivot of the Northern Dipper to reach the Water Pool.
All recite the hidden words.

The master circumambulates the Water Pool’s twelve positions.
Using the Opening and Flowing Method, silently recite the Heaven and Earth Purification Incantation once, spray water from the mouth, and blow it into the pool.
After completing the rites according to the method, recite the Water Pool Establishment Incantation:

By the Supreme’s decree, sins are pardoned and lives delivered.
The six destinies and three paths all behold the light.
Establishing the Water Pool, ascending in due order.
Each according to their karmic retribution, all attain transcendence.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Emperor commands.

Visualize the waters of the Celestial River and Eastern Well flowing in from the northwest corner of the Water Pool, limpid and clear.
Draw one breath of the northwest *qi* and blow it into the pool.

Holding the True Water Unification Talisman, forming the True Water Descent Mudra.
From *shen* to *zi*.

Silently recite the incantation...

Great Yin, Great Yin, essence of the Dark Warrior.
With one descent of divine water, press upon *gui* and *ren* above.
Celestial true jade liquid, Upper Clarity’s radiant chamber.
Original Beginning Elder Lord, Life-Loving Lord Han.
Spirit-root true water, swiftly descend to the Pivot Mansion.
I invoke the Purple Tenuity Emperor of the Northern Culmen by decree.

Draw the northern *qi* and blow upon the talisman, then sink it into the Water Pool.

Recite the secret incantation:
Immaculate pool, mirrorless abyss of divine dragons.
Convey the radiance of the Eastern Well to cleanse the hidden souls.
Gather this flowing countenance, the harmonious ford of Great Harmony.
Mystic Harmony Jade Maidens pour it upon the spirits.
Soul and spirit clarified and rectified, the Dao’s *qi* endures forever.

The master faces west, draws the true *qi* of the day’s Great Yin, and blows it.
Then command the Water Pool Attendants, the Form-Purifying Officials, the Lads and Clerks of the Bureau, and the Yellow Blossom Spirit-Root of the Moon to swiftly descend into the pool and await, guiding the deceased souls into the Water Pool to bathe their forms and purify their essences according to the method.
Swiftly, swiftly.

Visualize the Celestial River and Eastern Well, boundless in expanse.
Its waters limpid and luminous, above lies the Celestial Palace, its towers and pavilions resplendent.

Proceed with the rites to the Refinement and Salvation site.

**Upper Clarity Southern Palace Water-Fire Refinement and Salvation Rite**
The Daoist assembly lines up at the Refinement and Salvation site.
The Dharma Master approaches the seat and offers incense.

Incense of returning life, its rising smoke forms talismanic script.
All heavens and all earths, suffused with pervasive fragrance.
Gathering *qi* to amass merit, the deceased souls receive refinement.
All sentient beings together ascend the Dao’s shore.

Your servant, in proper ritual position, so-and-so, burns incense and petitions the Three Clarities, Three Realms, Ten Poles, Ten Blossoms, Most High Sovereign of Salvation, Nine Heavens Life-Generating Emperor, True Lords of the Three Ministries and Five Bureaus, Pivot Mansion of the Southern Mound, Vermilion Numinous Fire Mansion, Upper Palace of Southern Prosperity, the Refinement and Salvation Assembly of Numinous Treasure, and the divine immortals of the Three Realms within and beyond.

I have heard that the Great Dao flows through forms, originating in the division of the primordial *qi*;
True yang unfolds transformation, universally planting it among the ten thousand spirits.
Its grace extends to the hidden and manifest, its kindness equalizes life and death.
Yet by the retribution of karmic conditions, the spirit’s radiance sinks into perdition.
Without relying on true merit, none transcend the realm of rebirth.
Great Sage of the Jade Palace, Mysterious Honored One of the Golden Tower,
Open the gates of refinement and forging, establish the ranks of spirit-transference.
Enable all to follow and uphold, rescuing and delivering the lost and deluded.

I, your servant, humbly perform this Supreme Yellow Register Great Offering for the deceased relative so-and-so of the official so-and-so, and all souls present.
I beseech the application of the profound method to proclaim and conduct the refinement and salvation.

May the cloud-borne chariots descend to oversee, the heavenly hosts arrive in solemn procession.
Summon the numinous bureaus, proclaim the talismanic commands,
Revive the bones from death, supervise the true and deliver the living.
May all deceased souls receiving refinement be bathed in the profound grace of the Double Mystery.

I, your servant, am utterly sincere in this prayer.

Proceed with the chanting of the rites.

The Dharma Master seated at the altar concentrates spirit, visualizing the Gate of Heaven.
Auspicious smoke and propitious *qi*, clouds and rosy light dazzle the eyes and heart.
The Three Treasures’ Compassionate Honored Ones, the Azure Emperor, and all celestial sages of refinement and salvation descend in majestic radiance.

The Dharma Master summons the spirits:
Solemnly summon the divine officials, functionaries, golden lads, jade maidens, and true immortals of refinement within the Numinous Treasure Great Dharma Bureau;
The Water Pool and Fire Pool Attendants;
The Great Generals of the Left and Right Guardians of the Cinnabar Heaven;
The Fire Bell Divine Lads, Nine Radiance Lads, Yellow Blossom Jade Maidens;
The Eastern Well Jade Maidens, the Salvation Chief Clerks, the Soul-Gathering Functionaries, the Spirit-Seizing Generals;
The Refinement and Salvation Attendants, the Twelve *Qi* Transformation Generals of Primordial Unity;
The Flying Primordial Spirit-Gathering Spirit-Summoning Envoys;
The Generals of the Six Dings and Six Jias;
The Golden Lads and Jade Maidens;
The Refinement-Receiving Directing Day Spirit Generals and Functionaries;
The Yellow Register Bureau Functionaries;
The Fire Mansion Divine Soldiers;
The Community Deities of the Five Paths of Mount Tai;
The City Gods and Earth Gods;
And all other spirits, to come to this altar site.

I now act by the Dao’s decree to refine and deliver the deceased souls.
May you, with your numinous power, swiftly and reverently comply with the primordial teaching,
Summon and gather the deceased relative so-and-so and all souls present at this assembly to the numinous altar,
Reverently receive refinement and salvation.
Each assume your respective duties to gather *qi*, harmonize form and spirit,
Refine the essence and congeal the true, ascend as immortals and awaken to the Dao,
All in accordance with the Fire Flowing Law.

Visualize the aforementioned officials and clerks, majestic and solemn, arrayed to left and right.
The souls receiving salvation all stand below the altar.

**Celestial Honored One Who Pervades the Three Realms**

Proceed with the Fire Refinement.
Hold the True Fire Unification Talisman, recite the True Fire Descent Incantation, and form the *wu* mudra:

Spirit of the center of heaven, sun and moon dwell in communion.
By the decree of *jia* and *yi* *qi*, the five phases flourish and overcome.
Jade tones of the Eight Effulgences guard the form and rectify the talisman.
Summon the numinous and induce the true, the talismanic envoys who seize souls.
Hear my call and swiftly descend in communion.
Bear the talisman and obey the decree, act without delay.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Emperor of Longevity commands.

Draw the *qi* of *wu* and blow upon the talisman, then burn it in the Fire Pool.

Recite the secret incantation:
Southern Yan’s floating cavern, courtyard of flowing fire.
The king’s eyes gleam brightly, the flowing fire’s essence.
Blade-edge wisdom, the divine lads of *pāṇi*.
The flowing fire’s essence, the true countenance of jade eyes.
Ascend into the blessed courtyard, the cavernous yang palace.

Draw the *qi* of the day’s Great Yang and blow it.

Solemnly invite the True Person of Refinement and Salvation, the Nine Radiance Lads, the Fire Bell Divine Lads, and the assembly of refinement immortals to guide the soul of so-and-so to the Fire Pool to receive refinement.
Visualize the transformation as before.

**Celestial Honored One of the Cinnabar Realm**

Hold the Fire Mansion Hidden Script, recite the Great Fire Refinement Incantation, and form the Wind-Fire Mudra:

Lord of the southern quarter, essence of the Red Emperor.
Envoys of Mars, Generals of *bing* and *ding*.
Vermilion Phoenix, fiery spirit, blazing yang essence.
The five phases engender transformation, the ten thousand things arise.
By the Emperor’s decree, the envoys must heed.
Summon the deceased souls, call their names.
Refine and deliver their true forms.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Emperor of Longevity commands.

Blow upon the talisman with the fire of *li*, recite the talismanic script, then burn it in the Fire Pool.

Hold the Fire Refinement Talisman and pray:
Solemnly invite the Great General of Fire, Zhao Zhongming, and the Fire Pool Attendants to swiftly descend with true fire and refine the hidden souls.

Swiftly, swiftly.
Draw three breaths of southern fire *qi*, circulate three streams of one’s own fire *qi*, and blow them together into the talisman, then burn it in the Fire Pool.

**Jade Eyes Refine the Essence, Heavenly Worthy**

Next, the Dharma Master, on behalf of the deceased soul, summons and transforms the twelve *qi* of rebirth.
Hold the Talisman of the First *Qi* Great General and pray:
Solemnly summon the Lord of Longevity, Emperor Jun, the First *Qi* Sixfold Yang-Transforming-Yin Great General Yang Yuanguang, and his attending talisman officials, to descend for the deceased soul and draw down the *qi* of the Kidney Water, Lesser Yin.
Burn the talisman, and visualize the breath entering the refined soul.

Next, hold the Life-Kidney Talisman and pray:
Solemnly invite the Kidney Spirit, Lord Xuanming, styled Yu Ying, who governs the black.
Blow upon the talisman with the northern *qi* of *zi*, then burn it, and blow upon the refined deceased soul.

Hold the Talisman of the Second *Qi* Great General and pray:
Solemnly summon the Lord of Longevity, Emperor Jun, the Second *Qi* Sevenfold Radiant Transformation Great General Ding Zhong, and his attending talisman officials, to descend for the deceased soul and draw down the *qi* of the Heart Fire, Lesser Yin.

Solemnly summon the Lord of Longevity, Emperor Jun, the Third *Qi* Eightfold Cyclic Union Great General Ding Qianshan, and his attending talisman officials, to descend for the deceased soul and draw down the *qi* of the Liver Wood, Reverting Yin.

Solemnly summon the Large Intestine Spirit, Lord Taichong, styled Zhihe, who governs the green.

Hold the Talisman of the Tenth *Qi* Great General and pray:

Hold the Talisman of the Eleventh *Qi* Great General and pray:

Solemnly summon the Lord of Longevity, Emperor Jun, the Twelfth *Qi* Seventeenfold Yin-Yang Convergence Great General Zheng Ming, and his attending talisman officials, to descend for the deceased soul and draw down the *qi* of the Pericardium, Reverting Yin.

Solemnly summon the Pericardium Spirit, Lord Chizhu, styled Lingyun, who governs the green.

Next, pray:
By the numinous power of the talismans, refine and transform the deceased soul.
The five viscera and six bowels, the roots of the pericardium.
Essential radiance spreads throughout, suspended and irrigating the cinnabar field.
Jade tones draw in *qi*, numinous winds gather mist.
The Three Radiant Ones penetrate, the ten thousand spirits ascend as immortals.
Ninefold light blazes, infusing transformation by nature.
A thousand harmonies, ten thousand unions, ascend to the Jade Heaven.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Lord of Longevity, Emperor of Longevity, commands.

**Heavenly Worthy of Supreme Clarity’s Numinous Transformation**

Hold the Talisman of the Five Emperors’ Jade *Qi* and pray:
By the Emperor’s decree, solemnly summon the Azure Emperor’s Direct Talisman Officer Qu Gengsheng, the Vermilion Emperor’s Direct Talisman Officer Zhu Changzhong, the Yellow Emperor’s Direct Talisman Officer Yu Zhen, the White Emperor’s Direct Talisman Officer Ru Quzheng, and the Black Emperor’s Direct Talisman Officer Yin Feng.

For the departed soul, invoke and descend:
The Azure Tooth’s *qi* of the Treasure Grove of Peace,
The Vermilion Yang’s *qi* of the Dharma Treasure’s Prosperity,
The Yellow Court’s *qi* of the Jade Treasure’s Void Mystery,
The Bright Stone’s *qi* of the Seven Treasures’ Golden Gate,
The Dark Nourishment’s *qi* of the Northern Solitude’s Profound Depths.
Follow the ritual code to refine and transform, tempering the substance into immortality.

Silently recite the Five Emperors’ secret names,
draw the *qi* of the five directions to blow upon the talisman,
and burn it in the Fire Pool.
Knock the teeth five times and pray:

Within the Yellow Center, *qi* is governed,
the Primal Life arises of itself, august.
The hidden passages of the viscera open,
the embryonic womb is preserved and enduring.
White Prime Lord, Peach Prosperity, guard the spirit.
Nurture the Vermilion Cinnabar,
become an immortal of long life.
Attain with the Great Emperor
to ascend and soar through the Nine Heavens.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Lord of Longevity commands.

Draw the *qi* of the five directions and blow upon the soul to be delivered.

**Heavenly Worthy of the Vermilion Mound’s Deliverance of Lives**
Hold the Fire-Refining Transformation Talisman and recite the Great Fire-Refining Incantation of the Cinnabar Heaven:

The two spirits of Flaming Essence,
the Three Terraces streaming with light,
refine the embryo and alter the substance,
temper the *po* and renew the *hun*.
Impure *qi* falls away,
riding the mist in flight.
Yin *qi* dissolves and disperses,
Yang *qi* blends in harmony.
The spirit and essence grow ever stronger,
penetrating the Fire Realm.
Merged with the Nine *Qi*,
the Primordial *Qi* of the Void Sovereign.
The August Heaven decrees,
molten gold flows in radiant splendor.
The Nine Mysteries shine forth,
steadfast and boundlessly efficacious.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Lord of Longevity commands.

**Heavenly Worthy of Fire-Refined Perfection**
Hold the Perfected Lord’s Talisman of Body Refinement and recite the incantation:

*Qi* transforms into human form,
the corpse changes and enters the Mystery.
Three transformations, five refinements,
ascend into the Nine Heavens.
Through the kalpas of the Nine Heavens,
deliver the *hun* and *shen* anew.
Receiving transformation and rebirth,
attain the state of Perfected One.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Lord of Longevity commands.

Draw the *qi* of the five directions and blow upon the talisman,
burn it in the Fire Pool.

**Heavenly Worthy of Limitless Deliverance of People**
Hold the Talisman of the Great General of Form-Uniting Transformation and pray, forming the Summoning Mudra:

Reverently summon the Lord of Longevity, the Great Emperor,
the Great General of Spirit-Uniting Transformation, Ling Fei,
the Great General of Soaring Flight and Spirit-Transforming Form, Jiang Zhen,
the Great General of Spirit-Delivering Form-Perfection, Tian Shiwen,
and their attendant officers and generals.
Fly, transform, and change,
assist my true numen.
Gather and descend the *qi* of life,
for the departed soul,
to perfect form and nurture substance.

Draw the Ancestral *Qi* and blow upon the talisman,
burn it in the Fire Pool.

Recite again the incantation:
*Mo Zhen, Wa La, Hong Xing, Mo Hei, Ling Bao,*
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Lord of Longevity commands.

Draw the *qi* of the five directions and blow upon the soul to be delivered:
*Xing Sheng, Du Li, Ke Han, Gong Du, Ju Hun,*
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Lord of Longevity commands.

Draw the *qi* of the Chen, Mao, and Yin directions and blow upon the soul to be delivered.

Next, follow the precious scripture’s practice,
recite the Great Brahma’s Hidden Words,
draw the *qi* of the four directions and blow upon the soul to be delivered,
visualize the departed soul emerging from the Fire Pool,
its countenance like an infant’s,
its body suffused with yang light,
illuminating all before it.

Fire Pool Attendants and Generals,
Officers and Clerks in Service,
hasten to escort the refined soul
to the Water Refinement Altar.
Respond to karmic conditions and summon the Heavenly Worthy thrice.

**Next, Water Refinement**
Hold the Talisman of True Water’s Union and proclaim the True Water Incantation:

Of the Supreme Mystery’s One,
the Eight Effulgences share numinosity.
The Five Elders’ secret names,
the sun and moon revolve in brightness.
The Jade Armillary turns,
the Ten Stems and Five Phases.
The Eight Scribes commune with the numinous,
summon spirits and call forth the perfected.
Open my invocation,
descend swiftly in majesty.
Bear the talisman and obey the command,
let none dare delay.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Lord of Longevity commands.

Draw the *qi* of Kan and blow upon the talisman,
burn it in the Water Pool.

Recite again the secret incantation:
The Pool of Radiance, mirrorless,
the abyss of the divine dragon.
Draw from the Eastern Well’s essence
to cleanse the hidden soul.
Gather this welcoming countenance,
the Ford of Supreme Harmony.
The Jade Maiden of Mystic Harmony
pours upon the spirit.
The *hun* and *shen* become clear and upright,
the Dao’s *qi* endures forever.

Draw the *qi* of the day’s Great Yin and blow upon it.

Reverently summon the Perfected of Refinement and Deliverance,
the Jade Maiden of Yellow Splendor,
the Jade Maiden of the Eastern Well,
the host of Refinement Bureau immortals,
to guide the soul of so-and-so
to the Water Pool for refinement.
Visualize the transformation as prescribed.

**Heavenly Worthy of Pure Deliverance of Souls**

Hold the Talisman of Vermilion Yang for Refinement and Deliverance, proclaim the Great Incantation of Vermilion Yang for Refinement and the Mudra for Purifying the Form:

In the Dragon Han, vast and boundless,
formless and nameless.
Across countless kalpas,
the imperial Dao emerges in clarity.
The divine lamp shines brightly,
the nine *hun* souls emit their essence.
The Jade Void gleams with radiance,
the Supreme Rosy Clouds rise in brilliance.
The Primordial Beginning initiates transformation,
all heavens descend in unison.
The Three Origins guide and nurture,
the Two Images gather and sustain life.
Those already delivered shall deliver others,
the unformed shall be perfected.
The dead shall be transformed,
the withered shall flourish.
All crawling and flying creatures,
every spirit in darkness—
those carrying embryos, those with child,
all shall receive their forms.
The departed whose fate is spent,
their souls return to the Three Clarities.
Their *po* souls undergo refinement,
transformed in the Southern Palace.
Today is most auspicious,
all attain luminosity.
The Five Thearchs reflect and witness,
universally proclaiming to the myriad spirits.
Deities of heaven and earth,
and all river sources,
the Five Marchmounts and Four Waterways,
together with all renowned mountains—
Cavernous Mystery, Cavernous Void,
Cavernous Emptiness, Cavernous Immortality,
the Great Sage of the Boundless,
the Perfected and Venerable Divinities—
infinite and inexhaustible,
universally oversee the deliverance of life.
The roots of earth are severed,
names recorded in the Dark Capital.
All deities shine forth together,
all things heed this decree.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Great Thearch of Eternal Life.

Draw the *qi* of the Northern Kǎn and blow upon the talisman,
then submerge it in the Water Pool.

Hold the Water Refinement Talisman and invoke:
Reverently summon the Great General Wang □, Master of Waters,
the Attendant of the Water Pool,
to swiftly descend with true water
and refine the departed soul.
Draw five breaths of the Northern Water *qi*,
and five streams of one’s own kidney *qi*,
intermingle and blow them into the Water Pool.

**Heavenly Worthy of Vermilion Yang’s Purification of Form**

Take the Talisman for Gathering Spirits by Flying Essence and the Talisman of Ninefold Yang True *Qi*, and invoke...

Reverently summon the Lord Emperor of Eternal Life, the Flying Essence Attendant for Gathering Spirits and Summoning Divine Transcendents Yang Xinzhi, the Flying Essence Attendant Wang Rong, the Flying Cloud Attendant Zhang Qi, the Flying Soul Attendant Fu Gongbi, the Flying Corporeal Soul Attendant Ding Feng, the Flying Radiance Attendant Chen Pu, the Direct Transcendent Attendant Shi Shen, the Direct Perfected Attendant Huang Jian, the Direct Numinous Attendant Lu Xian, and their subordinate talisman officials and flying clerks, who traverse and transform in flight.

On behalf of the departed soul, draw down the *qi* of the Highest Jade Clarity Heaven, the *qi* of the Vast Dark and Resonant Brilliance, the *qi* of the Purple Tenuity’s flourishing splendor, the *qi* of the Jade Basket Phoenix Chariot, the *qi* of the Central Maiden’s Apotropaic Might, the *qi* of the Grand August’s Subtle Extension, the *qi* of the Transformed Perfected White Salmon, the *qi* of the Crimson Fruit’s Radiance, the *qi* of the Heavenly Perfected’s Life-Endowing Transcendents, and the *qi* of the Grand August’s Silent Mystery.

In accordance with the ritual statutes, refine and deliver the soul, restoring its spirit to life.

Draw the ancestral *qi* and blow upon the talisman. Once the talisman’s text is recited, burn it in the Water Pool.

Invoke:
The Three Heavens nurture the embryo,
the Nine *Qi* coalesce the spirit.
Above, transform the Mysterious Elixir;
below, revolve and become transcendent.
The Two Images descend in confluence
to complete your form.
The six viscera blossom with jade splendor,
the nine palaces receive the Perfected.
The twelve knotted joints
are each and all severed at the root.
Expel the defiled *qi*,
and the Five Numinous Ones array themselves.
The Mysterious Woman exhales her essence,
refining and transforming you to radiant brilliance.
The Golden Transcendent wings your spirit,
the Jade Florescence composes your register.
Your name is recorded in the Azure Palace,
that you may long abide in the Imperial Divine Court.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Lord Emperor of Eternal Life.

**Heavenly Worthy of Life-Nurturing Deliverance**

Hold the Talisman of the Nine Refinements from the Numinous Treasure and invoke:
By the Emperor’s decree, reverently summon the Bureau for Swiftly Erasing Sin Records, the Bureau for Severing Earthly Pursuits, the Bureau for Delivering to the Southern Palace, the Bureau for Flying through the Five Portals of Space, the Bureau for Receiving Refinement and Renewed Life, the Bureau for Transcendent Transformation into Human Form, the Bureau for Crossing the Three Realms, the Bureau for Ascending to the Great Void, and the Bureau for Universal and Boundless Deliverance—all their numinous officials and transcendent clerks.

On behalf of the departed soul, beseech the descent of the *qi* of the First Heaven’s Primordial Womb-Life, the *qi* of the One and Yellow Evolution; the *qi* of the Second Heaven’s Womb-Life, the *qi* of the Cavernous Dark Purple Portal; the *qi* of the Third Heaven’s Soul-Life, the *qi* of the Enduring Numinous Bright Transcendent; the *qi* of the Fourth Heaven’s *Yi*-Life, the *qi* of the Vast Corpse’s Dark Evolution; the *qi* of the Fifth Heaven’s Viscera-Life, the *qi* of the Five Transcendents’ Central Numinosity; the *qi* of the Sixth Heaven’s Numinous Palace-Life, the *qi* of the Lofty Perfected’s Thorough Fusion; the *qi* of the Seventh Heaven’s Primordial Palace-Life, the *qi* of the Lofty Transcendent’s Cavernous Vigorous Brilliance; the *qi* of the Eighth Heaven’s Flourishing Palace-Life, the *qi* of the Perfected Numinous’ Transformative Coagulation; and the *qi* of the Ninth Heaven’s Mountain Palace-Life, the *qi* of the Spontaneous and Mysterious Illumination.

In accordance with the ritual statutes, refine and deliver the soul, that it may ascend to Perfection.

Silently recite the Emperor’s secret name, draw the ancestral *qi* and blow upon the talisman, then burn it in the Water Pool. Strike the teeth nine times.

Invoke:
In the Joyous Pure Land, the numinous coalesces;
in the Meditative Goodness, the spirit is preserved.
The Brahmā-monitor congeals the *qi*,
the Proud and Joyous convene with the Perfected.
Serenely and silently, abide in concealment;
the Brahmā-treasure generates the fluid.
Transform and respond to the flowing radiance,
the lofty void illumines the spirit.
Without entanglement, without attachment,
your name is listed in the Imperial Register.
Yin and yang unite with the spirit,
thirty-six thousand in number.
The Two *Qi* intermingle and reflect,
internally preserving the Three Fields.
Attain the sacred ranks,
and endure coeval with the kalpas.
The cloud-borne jade chariot
comes to attend the Imperial Chariot.
Spurring the dragon, cursing the radiance,
ascend on high to the Nine Heavens.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Lord Emperor of Eternal Life.

Draw the ancestral *qi* and blow upon the talisman. Recite the text of the Nine Refinements Talisman and burn it in the Water Pool. Draw the ancestral *qi* and blow upon the departed soul to be delivered.

**Heavenly Worthy of the Nine Heavens’ Rejoicing**

Hold the Talisman of the Stone Radiance Water Mother and Jade Essence. Recite the Great Incantation of the Eastern Well:
Eastern Well’s yellow splendor,
Stone Radiance and Jade Essence.
Flying Mystery Water Mother,
golden body and jade fluid.
Flowing ceaselessly, source upon source,
inexhaustible in the pool’s pavilion.
Nine dragons pour the refinement,
the Three Luminaries bestow their essence.
Transcendents exhale their moisture,
refining and delivering the soul.
Internally and externally luminous and clear,
within and without thoroughly purified.
The hundred joints and nine apertures
are nourished and flourishing with primordial *qi*.
The five viscera and six palaces
generate the myriad spirits of their own accord.
The fetal womb’s knotted joints
open and unlock with the water.
The dead *qi* is severed and extinguished,
the evil roots sink and perish.
I now refine and transform,
the dead skeleton into a living soul.
Return to the original and alter the countenance,
jade body and golden visage.
Transform and refine the defilements,
ascend in flight to the Purple Court.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Lord Emperor of Eternal Life.

Draw the *qi* of Kǎn and blow upon the talisman, then submerge it in the Water Pool.

**Heavenly Worthy of the Lofty Perfected’s Wondrous Fruit**

Hold the Talisman for Refining the Body through the Numinous Palaces and invoke:
That which was withered revives,
that which was extinguished lives again.
Attain birth in the heavens above,
and receive anew the Grand Numinosity.
Through the kalpas of the Nine Heavens,
the embryo and infant revolve and return.
The accumulated defilements are scoured away,
the white corpse is reborn.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Lord Emperor of Eternal Life.

Draw the *qi* of the Five Directions and blow upon the talisman, then burn it in the Water Pool.

**Heavenly Worthy of the Golden Portal’s Transformative Body**

Hold the Talisman of the Golden Fluid’s Body Refinement and invoke:
The Golden Fluid refines the body,
uniting with the Dao in Perfection.
The Three Radiant Ones are revealed,
this is called the Heavenly Root.
Without darkness, without extremity,
without beginning, without end.
The Primordial August’s Nine Shameful Ones,
the numinous demons descend to their palaces.
Purple clouds fly to heaven,
the body rides the six dragons.
Fire above, water below,
flowing into the Three Palaces.
The spirit dwells in the Yang Brilliance,
the Great Dao is naturally traversed.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Lord Emperor of Eternal Life.

Draw the Mysterious *qi* and blow upon the talisman, then burn it in the Water Pool.

**Heavenly Worthy, the Wheel-Turning Sagely King**

Hold the Talisman of the Great Generals for Dividing, Refining, and Nurturing the Body and invoke:
Reverently summon the Lord Emperor of Eternal Life, the Great General of Cinnabar Numinosity for Dividing the Body Sun Geng, the Great General of the Lofty Numinous for Refining the Body Fu Sheng, the Great General of the Purple Numinous for Nurturing the Body Zhang Gaozhen, and their subordinate talisman officials and flying clerks of true numinosity and transformative flight. Draw down the *qi* of life.

On behalf of the departed soul, receive transformation and renewed life.

Draw the ancestral *qi* and blow upon the talisman, then burn it in the Water Pool.

Invoke again:
Mo Hei, Wa La, Ling Bao, Hong Xing, Mo Zhen.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Lord Emperor of Eternal Life.

Draw the *qi* of the Five Directions and blow upon the departed soul to be delivered.
Xing Sheng, Du Li, Ke Han, Gong Du, Ju Hun.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Lord Emperor of Eternal Life.

Draw the *qi* of the three directions—Yín, Mǎo, and Chén—and blow upon the departed soul to be delivered.

**Heavenly Worthy of Following Wishes to Rebirth**

Burn the Numinous Treasure Talisman for Ascending to Perfection, Delivering Life, and Departing from Birth and Death.

The incantation speaks:

Red Script of Jade Purity,
Ascending to the Purple Court on high.
Heaven’s mercy grants absolution,
To the numinous spirits of the Three Realms.
In the ten directions’ worlds,
The sinful souls of the Nine Darks,
The myriad ancestors of countless generations,
Wandering spirits in bitter suffering—
Erase their names from the ledgers of sin,
Sever the roots of evil.
Hasten to the realm of rebirth,
Where *qi* and consciousness find tranquil repose.
Ascend to the Heavenly Halls,
Refine the essence and temper the spirit.
Transcend the Five Sufferings,
The true heart radiant and clear.
Sweep away the shadows of the yin,
Enter the Dao and ascend to perfection.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Lord Emperor of Eternal Life.

Burn the talisman, draw the ancestral *qi*, and blow it into the pool.
Envision the departed soul,
Body suffused with jade light,
Luminous and pure,
Form dignified and solemn,
Adorned in beloved immortal robes.

**Heavenly Worthy of Perfect Radiance and Rounded Treasure**

The master silently recites the deliverance incantation:
*Xing Sheng, Du Li, Ke Han, Gong Du, Bao Hun, Ying Hun She.*

Next, the Dharma Master burns the talisman to summon the Ding and Jia Generals, the Golden Lads and Jade Maidens, and the Great Generals.
The refinement and deliverance just performed are now complete.
Reverently summon the Six Ding and Six Jia Great Generals, the Golden Lads and Jade Maidens,
To swiftly escort the refined departed soul,
Each to compose their form and demeanor,
And reverently approach the presence of the August Emperor.
Give thanks for Heaven’s grace,
Receive the precepts and transmit the talismans,
Ascend to perfection and attain deliverance.

The assembly, with utmost sincerity, requests the procession of welcome and guidance.
Next, the assembly chants the hidden verses to lead the soul in audience.

Next, descend from the seat.

**The Twenty-Seventh Scroll of the** *Wu Shang Huang Lu Da Zhai Li Cheng Yi* **concludes.**

**The Twenty-Eighth Scroll of the** *Wu Shang Huang Lu Da Zhai Li Cheng Yi*
**Compiled by the Supreme Enforcer of the Dao, Immortal Officer Jiang Shuyu**

**Section on Rituals**
**Rite of the** *Ling Shi Da Zhai* **for Transmitting Precepts, Talismans, and Delivering the Departed Soul**

First, the ritual master instructs the family to part from the spirit. Next, the officiating Daoist invokes and summons the spirit, leading the banner to the place where the precepts are proclaimed. The assembly arranges itself in order. The Dharma Master approaches the seat, offers incense, and recites the incense prayer:

*"One stick of Dao-virtue incense,
May it penetrate the paths of the Three Realms.
May the Heavenly Worthy, in great compassion,
Proclaim the secret and wondrous words.
Deliver all departed souls,
That they may swiftly cross the Dharma Bridge.
May the nine depths’ wandering spirits,
Together escape the sufferings of the Three Wretched Paths."*

Today, the Dao altar is pure and serene. The assembly, with unified sincerity, dedicates this rite to the ritual sponsor, their countless ancestors, and the departed souls to be delivered. With wholehearted devotion, they reverently invoke the Three Treasures’ Imperial Master of the Jade Capital and Golden Towers—the Supreme, Boundless, Utmost True Great Dao—as well as the Ten Poles, Nine Heavens, and all the Great Saints of the celestial realms; the Three Origins, Four Beginnings, Four Offices, and Five Emperors of the sun, moon, stars, and celestial pivots; the deities of the divine realms, dark mountains, Yellow Springs, and the netherworld courts; the spirit officials and clerks of the Three Realms; and all responsive and efficacious numinous powers. May they bestow compassion, condescend to witness this rite, and affirm the merit of transmitting precepts and talismans, that the souls sunk in nine nights of darkness may attain the true fruit of the Three Vehicles.

The assembly recites the *Third Wisdom Hymn*. The Dharma Master expounds from the seat:

The wondrous precepts of the Cavernous Mystery, the numinous talismans of the Numinous Treasure—above, they safeguard the nation’s prosperity in peace; below, they deliver suffering souls from the kalpas of tribulation. Their prohibitions are most solemn, their divine power beyond thought. Today, before the Dao, we transmit them according to the ritual codes. Yet we fear the departed souls, long deluded by the true Dao, remain bound in the cycle of rebirth. First, we must broadly proclaim the Dharma’s teachings to illumine their inherent nature, that they may awaken, comprehend, and escape the dark paths.

As the scriptures state: All beings in the Three Realms are originally without transmigration. They are purely of the Dao’s qi, initially without birth or extinction, without enlightenment or delusion. The nature that hears and knows has never been divided. It has no beginning in coming, no end in going. All is the vast Brahma, without inside or outside. Yet all sentient beings, from the moment they take form and gain awareness, bind their senses to phenomena: forms to the eyes, sounds to the ears, fragrances to the nose, flavors to the tongue, perceptions to the mind, and desires to the body. Hunger drives them to eat, thirst to drink, cold to clothe themselves, heat to bare their skin. They fall into the snares of circumstances, drown in the dust of the senses, toil in cravings, and are fettered by clinging thoughts. Day by day, month by month, their evil roots remain unexhausted. The great wheel of birth and death never ceases for even a moment. Some are born in heaven, some among humans, some cast into hell, enduring all manner of suffering. After countless transformations, they have yet to attain liberation. They know not whence comes the superior condition of the Dao, nor from what the spirit, qi, essence, and blood arise. The arising and ceasing of life and nature—from where do they ultimately come? Even if one becomes a heavenly being with a lifespan of billions, without understanding the root of the Dao or recognizing the Utmost Truth, one’s long life is but fleeting, and one will again fall into decline. For this reason, the Lofty Perfected Kings of old revealed the pure, luminous, and supreme Dharma treasure, establishing the great teaching to universally deliver heavenly and human beings. Today, we proclaim it—listen carefully.

*Strike the chime once.*

In the past, our Primordial Heavenly Worthy, with his singular Dharma-body, nurtured the embryo of the Dao. Thereafter, the primordial vastness formed the void. After the void endured, existence arose, and thus all living beings suddenly came into being. Life originally had no substance; it arose from emptiness to form images. From images, shapes took form, and luminous consciousness came to dwell within. Falsely conceiving the notion of birth, once the idea of birth was established, they clung to delusion as the self. Turning away from awakening, they took clarity as their nature, and clarity became the opposite of darkness. As clarity and darkness contended, the forms of water and fire appeared. Thereupon, they divided into the Five Agents, assuming the five forms. They encroached upon and seized one another, flowing and transforming in turn. Wood became benevolence and love, fire became clarity and discernment, earth became sincerity and thickness, metal became resoluteness and decisiveness, and water became wisdom and calculation. Internally, they transformed into the five forms, becoming the five viscera. Externally, they solidified into the five views, collectively forming the six senses. Emotions and circumstances intertwined, layering into pairs. They lost the Primordial Chaos’ Scarlet Writ of the Utmost Supreme True and Wondrous Dao, mistaking the guest for the host, generating emotions that harmed their nature, and using knowledge to confuse the mind. Binding love as the root, binding thoughts as karma, they thus experienced manifold births, manifold extinctions, manifold karmic retributions, manifold causes and conditions, manifold heavenly joys, and manifold netherworld sufferings. In such delusion, they remained unaware. Birth and death, coming and going—endless kalpas passed without cease.

*Strike the chime once.*

Seated assembly, delivered souls—observe the worlds within heaven and earth, boundless and immeasurable. Heaven turns left, earth turns right, revolving south and north—who governs this motion? Without the Utmost Spirit, none could alter it. The spirit has no fixed form; it manifests in phenomena. Just as within the human body, the nature and life are concealed: when the corpse lies still, it seems lifeless. Yet when it rises to walk, speaks, or makes sounds, one knows the spirit’s transformations and the life’s nature, hidden yet revealed in movement. The Utmost Spirit is likewise. If the spirit did not exist, how could there be life and nature? Life and nature are but other names for the spirit. Within the human body, what is it, and what form does it take? If one identifies movement and activity as the spirit, then the dead should have no spirit. Yet the deceased may become malevolent spirits, their forms appearing as light and shadows. Or, years after death, they may suddenly possess the living—relatives or old acquaintances—recalling past events as if in life. Clearly, this spirit endures, never perishing. The spirit of life is unborn, and thus undying. It is one with the Dao, originating in transformation. It may dwell in heaven or enter hell. Though it may enjoy the two paths or suffer in hell—boiling cauldrons, blazing fires, endless kalpas of darkness, boundless torment—only the karmic consciousness, the sinful soul, and the corpse’s hun-soul and po-soul endure this retribution.

As for your primordial spirit, what glory or decay could it know?

Thus should you understand: The Supreme Primordial Origin, the Central Yellow True Dao, divided heaven and earth, established the laws of ruler and minister, and enfolded the numinous within the Great Void, where spirit transforms and gives birth. The vast emptiness bears no form, its nature unseen. Yet within it dwells the supreme spirit, alone directing its divine transformations. Though spirit admits no gaps, qi flows through myriad paths—rising and descending, parting into darkness and light. Once the two halves are formed, yin and yang are fixed. Yin and yang unite in virtue, and thus the root of life is established. The root flourishes, branches multiply, begetting offspring as seeds, each transforming in succession, none knowing the other. Should you seek to know it, understanding eludes you. To know is not the Dao; the Dao transcends all knowing.

Within the Three Realms, all that has life has not yet transcended yin and yang, nor severed the cycle of birth and death. Generation upon generation, change follows nature’s course. To seek the Dao through knowledge is to distance oneself from it ever further. Behold these boundless transformations of birth—all arise from the divine qi of the Great Void, wondrously generating and transforming. Observe your own body: it receives this primordial mandate, passing from kalpa to kalpa, shedding form after form, countless in number. Though life changes ten thousand times, that which makes you *you* has never truly shifted. It endures unbroken, from ancient times to the present, its Dao ceaseless.

Thus in my teaching, we recognize that emptiness is not mere inert void, but inwardly refines spirit and transformation. The Dao of life is unbroken—this is the root of the Way. Cultivate this to nurture life, and life shall know no end; apply this to all things, and all things shall know no limit in their harmonious stillness.

Disciples who receive the precepts, if you awaken to this profound truth, you shall perceive the true Dao, sever the roots of karma, and escape the path of rebirth. If you have not yet grasped this, I shall grant you the Three Refuges and expound the Nine True Precepts, to serve as your ladder and bridge.

Now, let this be proclaimed and revered. Let each chant with reverence:

We announce to the departed soul: First, take refuge in the unsurpassed Treasure of the Dao—the Three Supreme Ones of the Ten Directions, who deliver beings across kalpas and expound the teachings of primordial heaven. With boundless compassion, they universally save all living beings. Their jade countenances and golden visages manifest in myriad transformations, their shadows responding to echoes, their benevolent responses inexhaustible. In this life and all lives to come, hold them in faith and reverence.

*Chant the Hymn of the Dao-Treasure:*
Bow and take refuge in the Dao, the Primordial Lord of the Great Heaven.
May this Dao’s power open the way and deliver this departed soul.
*Together: Ascend to the realm of divine immortals.*

We announce to the departed soul: Second, take refuge in the unsurpassed Treasure of the Scriptures—the sacred texts of the Ten Directions, treasures of numinous writ, jade characters and golden script, dragon seals and phoenix glyphs, thirty-six divisions and eighteen thousand scrolls. They guide the lost to transcendence, erase transgressions and extinguish sins, enabling attainment of the Dao and perfection of the true. In this life and all lives to come, hold them in faith and reverence.

*Chant the Hymn of the Scripture-Treasure:*
Bow and take refuge in the Scriptures, the dragon-sealed phoenix-glyph texts.
May this Dharma’s power awaken and liberate this departed soul.
*Together: Ascend to the realm of divine immortals.*

We announce to the departed soul: Third, take refuge in the unsurpassed Treasure of the Masters—the Three Supreme Masters of the Numinous Treasure, the Orthodox Unity Perfected Ones, the Lords of the Three Heavens, the divine immortals of the Ten Directions who have attained the Dao. They transmit the Dharma and bestow the scriptures, opening the way for all beings. They are true parents, great physicians of the soul. In this life and all lives to come, hold them in faith and reverence.

*Chant the Hymn of the Master-Treasure:*
Bow and take refuge in the Masters, the compassionate ones of the Numinous Treasure.
May this spiritual power uplift and deliver this departed soul.
*Together: Ascend to the realm of divine immortals.*

All departed souls, having taken refuge in the unsurpassed, true Three Treasures, shall now be expounded the Nine Wondrous Precepts, to dissolve all suffering and ascend to the Nine Heavens. Listen and receive with single-minded devotion.

The Merciful Heavenly Worthy expounds the precepts:

First precept: Reverence and deference, filial piety and care for parents.
Second precept: Diligence and loyalty to one’s lord and sovereign.
Third precept: No killing; compassion and salvation for all beings.
Fourth precept: No licentiousness; rectify the body and conduct among all things.
Fifth precept: No theft; extend righteousness and diminish the self.
Sixth precept: No wrath; no cruelty or oppression of others.
Seventh precept: No deceit; no flattery or harm to the good.
Eighth precept: No arrogance; no contempt for the utmost truth.
Ninth precept: No duality; uphold the precepts with singular devotion.

These wondrous precepts were expounded by the Heavenly Worthy of Primordial Beginning from his golden mouth, universally eradicating the roots of all evil. Now, in accordance with the mysterious rites, they are transmitted before the sacred assembly. By the power of these Nine True Precepts, may you forever depart the calamities of the Five Sufferings, ascend to the Vermilion Palace, and transcend to the Purple Court.

We pray that the jade maidens attending the scriptures, the spirit youths guarding the precepts, the flying heavenly kings, and the mighty heavenly warriors descend throughout the boundless worlds of the Ten Directions and the Nine Dark Hells. May the Twenty-Four Bureaus and Thirty-Six Courts erase the name of the departed one, [so-and-so], from the black ledgers, dissolve the sins of the yin barriers, unlock the gates of eternal night, and point the way to the path of non-action. Within the Nine Empyrean Palaces, may they ever roam in feasting; amid the Eight Limitless Heavens, may they dwell in realms of carefree ease.

All golden registers and jade writs, sacred talismans and precious charms, are reverently presented before the Dao and proclaimed in due order.

Proclaim to the Master of the Talismans of Longevity at the Gate of Heaven’s Abode: may auspicious light burst forth, and propitious radiance dazzle the eyes.

Before the heart and gaze rise the Three Treasures Sovereigns of the Jade Capital and Golden Towers, enthroned in majesty, attended by an august retinue.

The Sovereigns command the Golden Lads and Jade Maidens to bear the talismans and writs, ride upon beams of golden light, descend from the Gate of Heaven, strike the writs against their teeth thrice, recite the dispersal incantation according to ritual, draw qi, and blow upon the talismans to seal them. Then, having proclaimed the texts in full, the writs are sealed.

**Ode to the Writ of Transcendence**
**Proclamation of the Precious Declarations of the Nine Heavens**
**Proclamation of the Golden Register of Longevity and Transcendence**

The master intones the prayer:
May the departed soul, upon receiving and upholding these, sever the bonds of earthly servitude, endure refinement, and be reborn. May they forever transcend the Three Wretched Paths, the Five Sufferings, and the Eight Perils; ascend beyond the Three Realms; and roam carefree in the Upper Clarity.

The incantation complete, the banner is raised.

After proclaiming the **Writ of Ascension to Heaven**, the master divides the writ in two. The right half is tied to the banner’s base, while the left half is sealed in an envelope according to ritual. The Merit Officer of the day is summoned to dispatch it.

The **Petition of Merit** is issued according to ritual, summoning the Flying Heavenly Kings of the Ten Directions. The master visualizes them as they depart, then intones:

We humbly recall that the Great Sage of Longevity, the Flying Heavenly Kings, heed the inner resonance of the Numinous Treasure and bear the charge of the Primordial Beginning. Heaven and humanity converge in assembly at the Upper Realm of the First Azure; mountains and peaks swallow mists in the initial kalpa of Crimson Clarity. Turning their light and wheeling their chariots, they oversee the deliverance of the true and the salvation of the living. We pray for your compassion, that you deign to descend and witness this rite. Bearing the Primordial Beginning’s writ of command, absolve the sinful souls of the Northern Capital. May the departed spirit [so-and-so] ascend and transcend in due time, be delivered by the reckoning of days, avoid the hells, and be clothed in radiance. May they wander freely beyond the Terrace of Kalpic Blades and forever dwell in the realm of blessed halls. We offer our most devout supplication.

In due order, the **Petition of Merit** is proclaimed, universally notifying the Three Realms and passing through the gates of all heavens. The earthly deities are commanded by the writ of the Primordial Beginning.

Upon completing the proclamation, a gold paper offering is burned.

The master intones:
We reverently invoke the Flying Heavenly Kings, the Flying Heavenly Envoys, and their divine hosts, just as in days of old, in the Celestial Assembly of Floating Radiance within the First Azure Heaven, they did not forget the teachings and admonitions of the Primordial Beginning. Look down upon the pious devotion of the ritual’s sponsor. May the departed spirit [so-and-so], their soul refined in death, be transformed into an immortal being. May their living form receive deliverance and endure through kalpas unending. May blessings extend to their descendants and grace their household. May all sentient beings together ascend the shore of the Dao.

**The Venerable One Who Delivers the Immeasurable**
The true scriptures and wondrous precepts, the jade writs and precious talismans, are the secret essences of the Three Caverns, expounding the supreme models of the Nine Heavens. They guide the lost to awakening and enable the realization of the Dao and attainment of perfection. Yet, fearing there may be no reliance or assurance to prevent hindrance to transcendence, we now, on behalf of the departed soul, invoke the assembly of sages in solemn covenant. We issue a **Certificate of Merit**, to be carried and cherished as a treasure of the self.

**Proclamation of the Certificate of Merit**
The proclamation complete, the master intones:
May the departed soul, holding this certificate as proof, forever erase their name from the ledgers of earthly tribunals, and may the nether courts no longer detain them. Between heaven and earth, may they transcend and transform according to their karma.

**Ode to the Northern Emperor**

All the preceding transmissions of precepts and talismans, and the manifold merits, are now complete. We humbly pray that, upon receiving and upholding these, the departed soul’s name be inscribed in the Purple Register and their rank elevated in the Vermilion Palace. May they don the Precious Declarations to pay homage to the Perfected, and bow before the August Sovereign to receive their destiny. May they attain the fruits of divine transcendence and reach the Land of Bliss.

Now, once more for the departed soul, we sever the Three Corpses and deliver the Five Households. May their form and spirit together attain perfection, merge with the Dao in truth, and ascend in due time. Let all take heed and cherish this.

The master performs the ritual, summoning the deities:
We solemnly summon the resplendent immortal hosts of the Jade Clarity and Numinous Treasure, the divine officials who eradicate the hells and the evil paths of the lower ghosts, the divine officials who eradicate the evil paths of beasts, the divine officials who deliver the Household of Form-Attachment, the Household of Love-Attachment, the Household of Greed-Attachment, the Household of Emotion-Attachment, and the Household of Desire-Attachment. We beseech you to attend before the Dao and reverently receive the writ of command. On behalf of the departed soul [so-and-so], in accordance with the statutes of the Supreme Perfected, sever the roots of the corpse. May the Three Evil Paths be extinguished, the burdens of karma delivered, the Five Paths opened, and the blades of the wind transcended. May they ascend to the Heavenly Courts, their form dissolved and transformed, their luminous essence flowing into the Upper Clarity. The jade writ of the Primordial Beginning shall now be proclaimed.

**Proclamation of the Writ of Command for the Three Wretched Paths and Five Sufferings**
After each writ is proclaimed, paper money is burned beneath the banner.

May the roots of evil be severed, sparing them from drifting and sinking in the Five Paths. May the burdens of suffering be dispelled, enabling them to transcend the purity of the Six Dusts.

The Demon Kings shall supervise and escort, unhindered at the Gates of Heaven. Once more, the Immortal Lads are invoked to jointly guide and lead.

**Inviting the Five Directional Lads**
We reverently invite the Azure Spirit Dao-Opening Lad of the East, who holds a blue lotus, to receive and guide this departed soul, harmonizing their rebirth in the Immortal Realm.

We reverently invite the Vermilion Spirit Dao-Opening Lad of the South, who holds a red lotus, to receive and guide this departed soul, harmonizing their rebirth in the Immortal Realm.

We reverently invite the Primordial Spirit Dao-Opening Lad of the Center, who holds a yellow lotus, to receive and guide this departed soul, harmonizing their rebirth in the Immortal Realm.

We reverently invite the Radiant Spirit Dao-Opening Lad of the West, who holds a white lotus, to receive and guide this departed soul, harmonizing their rebirth in the Immortal Realm.

We reverently invite the Mystic Spirit Dao-Opening Lad of the North, who holds a jade lotus, to receive and guide this departed soul, harmonizing their rebirth in the Immortal Realm.

The Ten Poles’ divine realm shall swiftly expunge their name from the ledger of sins; the Five Spirit Lads shall ensure their immortal journey knows no delay. They shall roam the azure heavens, repose in halls of purity, personally attend the Primordial Beginning, and chant the hymns of the Grottoes. Never to fall into the cycle of rebirth, they shall forever follow the mysterious and wondrous Dao.

Let all be reverent and solemn, giving thanks for Heaven’s grace. Bowing in devotion, they take refuge in the Boundless Great Dao.

The Carefree and Joyous Heavenly Worthy leads the soul before the Great Dao, where the Dharma Master guides the departed to give thanks together.

In life, they endured the suffering of form and the retribution of rebirth. By the radiant grace of the Sagely Ones, compassion and expedient means were bestowed. Through the measured postures of dignity, the souls lost in the darkest night are delivered.

The departed soul [so-and-so], by virtue of this offering of the fast, gains access to the altar’s steps, hears the scriptures, and listens to the Dharma, thereby washing away sins and erasing transgressions. Their essence has already been cleansed in the Yellow Flower, their form refined in the Flowing Fire. They receive talismans and precepts, transformed and reborn anew. By the diligent descent of the True Chariots, even the dead shall be delivered.

The great virtue of Heaven and Earth—who can repay such boundless grace? Though the sincerity of an ant is small, it must recognize the source of life’s blessings. The departed soul [so-and-so] bows in gratitude to Heaven’s grace, prostrating twice in reverence.

The Register of Souls is raised, and the soul is led to the burning site. The Dharma Master performs the *huixiang*, giving thanks for the deliverance.

Your servant reverently establishes the jade altar and proclaims the precious rites. Humbly beseeching the True Creation, may the departed soul be delivered.

With this rite’s merit now complete and the affairs of the living and the dead concluded, I fear my ignorance of the statutes and any breach of dignity. Should I be examined by the Three Officials and my transgressions recorded in the Nine Bureaus, I dare to hope for your grace and pardon. May the cloud chariots return to the Jade Capital, the feathered canopies ascend once more to the Crimson Palace. My heart races toward the Pure Han, my thoughts fixed upon the layered heavens. I further implore your vast kindness to bestow wondrous blessings. May all directions know peace, and the Great Dao flourish. May all sentient beings attain the wondrous fruit.

Your servant, unable to contain his longing gaze toward the Sagely and True, offers this plea for forgiveness and grace.

The Dharma Master performs three bows and exits, proceeding to the burning site to conduct the rites. He summons the Golden Dragon Courier Officers, reads the *guanzi*, and issues the Talisman of Longevity.

The Heavenly Worthy of the Great Crossing leads the soul across the bridge.

**Proclamation of the Dharani for Ascending the Dharma Bridge**
By the wisdom of the Heavenly Worthies and the compassion of the Great Dao, the ninefold yang *qi* transforms into a curved rainbow. A thousand *zhang* of long rainbows, myriad layers of gold and jade. Below, it enters the Realm of Opening Light; above, it ascends the Crimson Mound. The Dharma Bridge delivers all, universally saving the boundless. From the earth, they ascend to the heavens, proceeding directly to the Gates of Heaven. Let each refine their form and dignity, step upon the bridge, and ascend into the void. Their old intentions washed away, they shall endure for eternal kalpas.

The soul is sent forth as the *Three Clarities* hymn is chanted, and the talismans, registers, scriptures, banners, and spirit money are burned.

**Recitation of the Burning Register Hymn and Performance of the Deliverance Rite**
The Dharma Master silently intones:
May the soul’s spirit be pure and upright, their *qi* enduring forever. Unafflicted by suffering, their body radiant with light. Merit complete and virtue perfected, they roam carefree in the Upper Clarity.

After the incantation, he silently recites the Transformation and Rebirth Dharani:
*Xingsheng, Dulì, Kehán, Jùhún, Gōngdū, Jùhún. Swiftly, as the Emperor commands!*

**Silent Recitation of the Transformation Register Dharani**
The fire bells blaze fiercely in the eight directions. Myriad spirits stand guard, forever severing misfortune. Swiftly, as the Cinnabar Heaven Fire Bells command!

He visualizes the fire bells filling the earth, blazing like the sun, spanning heaven and earth. The delivered soul rides the golden light and ascends to heaven.

**Proclamation of the Universal Deliverance and Offering Dharani**
By the merit of the Numinous Treasure, the boundless deliverance of beings. The Primordial Beginning’s writ of command releases and pardons the roots of sin. Longevity returns to the corpse, the ninefold refinement revives the form. The wondrous precepts guard against wrongdoing, transcending the Three Realms. Through kalpas of turning, they roam carefree in the Upper Clarity. Merit complete and fruit fulfilled, they ascend to attend the Emperor Lord. Blessings flow to descendants, joy extends to the household.

Go well, go well! Do not forget the grace of the Dao.

The Heavenly Worthy of the Perfect Lotus concludes the deliverance. The immeasurable merit of the preceding rites is now complete.

Relying upon the pure assembly, for the sake of the superior conditions, we recite the great sagely Primordial Heavenly Worthy, the Most High Lord of the Great Dao, the Most High Lord Lao, the Heavenly Worthy of Great Compassion and Salvation, the Heavenly Worthies of Salvation in the Ten Directions, the Heavenly Worthy of Deliverance from the Nine Dark Realms, the Heavenly Worthy of the Crimson Mound’s Life-Deliverance, the Heavenly Worthy of the Great Crossing Dharma Bridge, the Heavenly Worthy of the Cinnabar Realm’s Fire Refinement, the Heavenly Worthy of the Golden Palace’s Transformation, the Heavenly Worthy of the Wheel-Turning Sagely King, the Heavenly Worthy of Rebirth According to Wish, the Carefree and Joyous Heavenly Worthy, the True Person of Great Compassion and Salvation, the True Person of Great Compassion and Great Wisdom, the True Person of Great Compassion and Sin-Deliverance, the True Person of Great Compassion and Deliverance—unfathomable merit.

For the sake of the fast’s patron, merit complete and virtue perfected. Gathering blessings and dispelling calamities, we recite the Heavenly Worthy of Purple Clarity’s Blessings, the Heavenly Worthy of Disaster-Dispelling and Misfortune-Resolving, the Heavenly Worthy of Longevity and Life-Extension, the Heavenly Worthy of Boundless Blessings, the Heavenly Worthy of the Eight Trigrams’ Protection, the Heavenly Worthy of the Nine Palaces’ Calamity-Aversion, the Heavenly Worthy of the Perfect Lotus—unfathomable merit.

The rites for delivering souls in this world include the *Rite of Severing the Three Corpses* and the *Rite of Crossing the Five Gates of Suffering*, as originally recorded in the *Primordial Registers of the Supreme Clarity Grotto-Real Department* from the *Jade Instructions of the Supreme Perfected*.

Those who study the supreme methods must first dispel all desires. Eradicating the roots of evil, the Dao naturally descends, and immortality naturally manifests. When inscribing the transforming luminous talismans, let the jade script of flowing radiance be employed according to the text. The talisman for delivering beings from the Three Wretched Realms and Five Sufferings is the Upper Corpse Talisman, inscribed in azure on dark silk. The Middle Corpse Talisman is inscribed in yellow on white silk. The Lower Corpse Talisman is inscribed in white on white silk. The talisman for the Gate of Color-Entanglement is inscribed in black on white silk. The Gate of Love-Entanglement is inscribed in white on white silk. The Gate of Greed-Entanglement is inscribed in red on white silk. The Gate of Florid Competition is inscribed in azure on white silk. The Gate of Bodily Entanglement is inscribed in yellow on white silk.

When severing the Upper Corpse Talisman, the disciple places it upon the head; the Middle Corpse Talisman upon the heart; and the Lower Corpse Talisman along with the Five Sufferings Talismans upon both feet. At the threshold of the Three Evil Gates, facing north, the disciple holds a blade in the mouth and presents a cup of pure water, bowing the face over it. The master stands behind the disciple, strikes the teeth nine times, and recites the incantation. In the worldly rites, these are the three incantations for the Upper Corpse’s Azure Desire, the Middle Corpse’s Peng Zhi, and the Lower Corpse’s Peng Jiao. For each gate delivered, the master takes the blade held in the disciple’s mouth and circles the disciple’s head nine times. The master then takes the rolled jade talisman, buries it beneath the gate, pours water over it, and departs. The Five Sufferings Gates follow the same procedure as the original scripture, without incantations.

Now, in receiving the Supreme Clarity Precious Register at the ancestral altar, this becomes the Most High Talismanic Method. Though it is said that spiritual transformation is boundless and that salvation in life may also deliver the dead, the incantations for severing the Three Corpses, when applied to the deceased, may yet encounter obstacles. Moreover, the ritual texts are exceedingly vulgar, and so they have been excised here. The eradication of the Three Evils and the aerial deliverance of the Five Household Spirit-Officials belong to the Great Rites of Jade Clarity and Numinous Treasure, to be summoned and descended according to the oral instructions. If the present purpose is to transmit talismanic commands and deliver the souls of the dead, then such practices are theoretically permissible.

Furthermore, the worldly rites’ Five Suffering Hells do not align with the scriptural names. Often, following the *Scripture on the Three Wretched Realms and Five Sufferings*, they describe the Five Sufferings as the Mountain of Swords, the Forest of Blades, the Bronze Pillars, the Cauldrons of Boiling Oil, and the Endless Tides of the Dark Sea—terms forcibly adapted into the rites. However, since the Three Evil Gates, Five Paths Gates, and Flowing Radiance Jade Talismans derive from the *Jade Instructions of the Supreme Perfected*, they ought to be performed strictly according to the scriptural texts to achieve perfection. The Five Sufferings Wheel Lamps follow the same principle.

Here ends Scroll Twenty-Eight of the *Complete Rites for the Supreme Yellow Register Great Retreat*.
Beginning Scroll Twenty-Nine of the *Complete Rites for the Supreme Yellow Register Great Retreat*.

The *Ritual for Refining and Delivering the Suffering Souls with Offerings*, compiled by the Celestial Enforcer of the Most High, Immortal Jiang Shuyu.

First, at the site of refinement or before the Great Dao, arrange the ritual banquet in thirty-six or twenty-four divisions. Once all is prepared, the Daoist assembly and officiants invite the Dharma Master to proceed.

**Purification**
**Offering of Incense**
**Hymn of Burning Incense**

The Dharma Master addresses the deities, declaring:

*"Your subordinate, [Name], in full ritual vestments, now kindles incense and reverently petitions the Jade Clarity of the Great Luo, the Boundless and Supreme Perfected Great Dao, the Celestial Venerable of Primordial Beginning; the Most High Lord of the Great Dao; the Most High Lord Lao; the Great Emperor of the Purple Tenuity of the North Pole; the Great Emperor of Longevity of the South Pole; the Great Emperor of the Vermilion Mound; the Heavenly Venerable of Salvation through the Great Unity; the Great Emperor of the Nine Heavens Who Gives Birth to the Spirits; the Twenty-Two Heavenly Lords; Lord Donghua of the East and Queen Mother of the West; the True Lords Who Protect the Hun and Attend the Po, Nourish the Qi and Circulate the Blood, and Govern the Central Five Emperors; the Lords of the Sun and Moon; the Seven Primordial Lords of the Northern Dipper; the Six Administrative Lords of the Southern Dipper; the Five Master Lords of the Numinous Treasure; the True Governors of the Three Ministries and Five Bureaus; the Great Lord of Longevity of the Southern Prosperity Upper Palace, Lord Han Jun Sima; the Lord Who Restores the Body and Raises the Dead; the Lord Who Delivers the Innumerable; the True Lord Who Delivers Lives and Perfects Immortality; the Nine Perfected of the Southern Pole; the Dharma Master of the Primordial Beginning of Jade Clarity; the Left Immortal Duke of the Great Ultimate; the True Lords Who Govern the Five Marchmounts; the True Governors of the Southern Prosperity Pivot Bureau, the Vermilion Mound Fire Bureau, and the Yellow Register of the Southern Prosperity Upper Palace; the Immortal Officials of the Numinous Treasure, the Lords and Officers of Pursuit, Seizure, and Refinement; the Great Emperor of Fengdu of the Northern Darkness; the Sage Emperors of the Five Marchmounts; the Great Emperor of Fusang of the Water Palace; the Venerable Deity of the Year’s Virtue; the Earth God and City God; the Earth Gods of the Five Paths; and all the numinous powers responsive to the Three Realms.*

*I have heard that the teachings unfold from the Purple Clarity, opening the Eight Gates to deliver and save; the scriptures transmit from the Azure Empyrean, proclaiming the Nine Refinements to restore life."*

For all those sunk in suffering, to relieve every affliction.
To wash away the filth of sin, to refine and transform the realms of rebirth.

This humble servant, unworthy and dull, has presumptuously received the transmission of the supreme Dharma. Though my person has been carelessly entrusted with the office of deliverance, my duty dares not falter in proclamation and transcription. Now, on behalf of the patron of this retreat, [Name], who properly dedicates this offering for the departed kin [Name], and universally dedicates it for all assembled souls, we establish the Supreme Yellow Register Great Retreat for three days and nights. Universally we set forth the Pure and Unobstructed Night Retreat for the Nine Springs and Six Paths, to protect and deliver the numinous forms, and to ascend them to the realms of the Dao.

Here we prepare the offerings of water-plants and fern, though our sincerity falls short of the otter’s sacrifice. We humbly beseech the Perfected Sages to oversee, the Immortal Spirits to descend in presence. May your radiant chariots turn back, and the great bounty of Heaven’s grace be abundantly bestowed. Deign to bestow your majestic light, to oversee and refine. This servant and the retreat officers [Names] cannot but reverently entreat, gazing upward in hope of your gracious illumination.

With reverence, we bow twice and offer incense to summon the Perfected.

This servant, occupying the dharma-position, [Name], with awe and trepidation, bows twice in reverence. We respectfully invite the Supreme Perfected Three Treasures, the Highest Divinity; the Northern Culmen, the Great Emperor of Purple Tenuity; the Southern Culmen, the Great Emperor of Longevity; the Great Emperor of Vermilion Mound; the Heavenly Worthy of Great Unity Who Saves from Suffering.

We humbly hope for the compassion of Heaven, that it may respond and divide its radiance, bestowing mercy and descending to witness.

We respectfully invite the Nine Heavens’ Spontaneously Generated Life-Spirit Highest Divinities; the Five Venerables and Five Emperor Lords; the Thirty-Two Heavenly Emperor Lords; the Lord of Wood and the Queen Mother of Metal; the Lords of the Sun and Moon; the Seven Primordial Star Lords of the Northern Dipper; the Six Bureau Star Lords of the Southern Dipper; the Five Masters of the Numinous Treasure; the Four Sage Perfected Lords; the Perfected Lords of the Three Ministries and Five Bureaus; the Dharma Master of the Primordial Beginning; the Left Immortal Duke of the Supreme Ultimate; the Great Lord of Longevity of the Southern Prosperity Upper Palace; the Lord of the Vermilion Mound Fire Bureau; the Lord Who Delivers Life of the Southern Palace; the Controller of Horses, Lord Han; the Perfected Lord of Refinement and Immortal Transcendence; the Ninefold Florescence Perfected of the Southern Culmen; the Great Divinity Who Oversees the Resurrection of the Dead; the Flying Heavenly Immortals; the Perfected Lords Who Govern the Five Marchmounts; the True Governors of the Southern Prosperity Pivot Bureau, the Vermilion Mound Fire Bureau, and the Yellow Register of the Southern Prosperity Upper Palace; the Great Emperor of the Northern Darkness of Fengdu; the Sage Emperors of the Five Marchmounts; the Great Emperor of Fusang of the Water Palace.

We humbly hope for the sagely compassion to bestow your light and descend.
