We respectfully invite the Perfected Lord of the Numinous Treasure, the Spontaneously Generated and Perfectly True, Who Universally Delivers Beings; the Great Generals of the Left and Right of the Cinnabar Heaven; the Heavenly Generals and Great Divinities of the Numinous Treasure’s Radiant and Majestic Immortal Bureaus; the Perfected Officials and Immortal Clerks of the Nine Refinements; the Great Generals of the Twelve Qi Transformations of the Primordial Unity; the Attendants of the Southern Prosperity’s Water and Fire Pools; the Great Generals Who Govern Water and Fire; the Various Attendants Who Gather the Flying Primordials; the Great Generals of the Six Jia and Six Ding; the Golden Lads and Jade Maidens; the Fire Bell Immortal Lads; the Nine Radiance Lads; the Yellow Flower Jade Maidens; the Jade Maidens of the Eastern Well; the Perfected of Refinement; the Attendants of Refinement; the Divine Generals of Refinement; the Merit Officers of Refinement; the Presiding and Executive Officials of the Refinement Assembly; the Three Divisions of Divine Tiger Great Sage Jade Maidens and Pursuit Attendants; the Clerks and Soldiers of Pursuit and Seizure; the Great Sage Heavenly Physicians; the Six Bureau Governance Officials and Generals; the Merit Officers, Presiding Officers, and Dharma Register Governance Perfected Officials and Their Retinues; the Venerable Deity of the Year’s Virtue; the Direct Attendants of the Three Realms; the Seven Path Merit Officers; the Earth God and City God; the Earth Gods of the Five Paths; the Lads Who Open the Dao; the Divine Lords of Prohibitions; the Officers of Earth and Water; the Officials Who Guide the Good; the Void-Space Overseers; and all the numinous powers.

We humbly hope for the sagely compassion that all the officials may descend in full attendance.

We offer incense and make the initial presentation.

This servant respectfully addresses the Three Clarities, the Highest Divinities; the Compassionate Honored One of Great Unity; and the host of sages of the Three Realms and Ten Directions.

We have heard that when the primordial qi first divided, yin and yang established their positions. The Three Origins guided nurturance, and the myriad beings took form. All who dwell within the sheltering and nourishing cosmos rely upon the virtue of generation and completion. Habits lead to differing fruits, and karmic retribution follows distinct paths. Until the illusory dust is eradicated, one continues to revolve in the path of suffering. Without cultivating contemplative practice, it is difficult to escape the mechanisms of transformation. The lofty and numinous sagely beings, in their compassion, reach out to creatures. They expound the subtle and wondrous Dharma, opening the gates of skillful means. They cleanse the yin impurities with yellow blossoms and refine the yang essence in flowing fire. Thus may all attain the marvels of the Dao, forever securing the root of life.

Now, the patron of this retreat, [Name], has reverently performed the retreat rites to deliver the departed spirits. Universally, for those sunk in darkness, we proclaim and perform the refinements. We humbly beseech the descent of Heaven’s light and the widespread flow of its beneficent moisture. May the Perfected Spirits be commanded to follow the talismanic decrees. May they divide their forms and descend their qi, refining the luminous and seizing life. Thus may the delivered souls, boundless and clear, be received. May the five spirits merge and harmonize, cutting off the roots of the five afflictions; may the one nature long endure, attaining the true fruit of the one vehicle. May they be enabled to reach the shore of non-action and forever purify the conditions of defilement.

We cannot but earnestly pray to this effect.

We offer incense and make the second presentation.

We address the officials, generals, and clerks of the Numinous Treasure Refinement; all those who assemble in response; and all the numinous powers.

We have heard that the Primordial Beginning opened the chart and divided his body to descend and transform. The August Jade Emperor governed the course and established the Dharma to deliver beings. In their kindness, they aid those sunk in suffering, providing a bridge across life and death. The direct attendants and guardian clerks serve the numinous scriptures. The Dharma bureaus and immortal offices assist in propagating the victorious models. They should together expand the wondrous transformations, greatly illuminating the imperial Dao. Charged with the mandate to proclaim grace, they act in accordance with the rites. Above, they follow the decrees of the Dao; below, they deliver the sunken souls. They accomplish the work of refining the embryo and returning to the root, manifesting the virtue of the Perfected who oversee and deliver life. May evil conditions be severed forever, and the long night’s icy pools be left behind; may the true qi fill and flourish, ascending directly to the realms of cinnabar blossoms and fire bells.

May the divinities graciously accept and respond to our sincere prayers.

The Three Divisions of Divine Tiger Pursuit Attendants, the Merit Officers of the Heavenly, Human, Earthly, Immortal, Ghostly, and Karmic Paths, are invited to arrive before the Dao and receive the written decree.

We offer incense and make the final presentation.

We proclaim the writ and present the memorial.

The sincerity of our supplications has now been fully expressed. We humbly gauge the true wisdom of the Perfected and trust that it penetrates all with clear discernment. Though the dusty world is defiled and impure, and our offerings flawed and meager, we pray that our humble and insignificant efforts not be faulted, but rather graciously pardoned.

May the refining and delivering immortal officials, the pursuing and seizing divine lords, the revered deities of the Great Year, and the city gods and local earth spirits each adhere to the great teachings and widely spread the winds of compassion. May they open the gates of darkness, summon the hidden souls, and at the time of the universal summons before this altar, marshal and guard all spirits to receive deliverance according to the rites. We await their manifest response and urgently command their compliance.

**Return and Offering** – Burn and consume according to the ritual.

**Rite of the Five Upper Clarity Bureaus for Summoning Hidden Souls, Restoring Their Complete Forms, Ascending Through Deliverance, and Returning to Spirit to Recover Their Nature**

First, face the Ghost Gate and arrange the incense table. Next, the ritual master performs the **Breaking Darkness and Opening the Path** method: he burns incense, stands upright, recites the **Purification of Heaven and Earth Mantra** once, and blows toward the four directions. He visualizes the **True Official of the Nine Phoenixes for Breaking Defilement**—crimson-robed, wearing a black headscarf, riding a nine-headed vermilion phoenix—who spews fire before him, flames blazing across his body.

Next, he paces the **Nine Phoenixes Breaking Defilement Stance**, circling his body three times. He visualizes himself within the flames, transforming into the **Nine Radiance Perfected**, the fire stretching between heaven and earth, its light illuminating the ten directions. After a long while, he envisions the **Celestial Worthy of Original Beginning** leading the great sages, supreme perfected, and boundless celestial true ones of the ten directions, seated at the center of a circular halo, bowing nine times.

**Secret Mantra:**
*The Celestial Worthy of Original Beginning summons the great celestial deities, the supreme perfected, and the wonderfully accomplished true ones. They turn their radiance and return their chariots to oversee the deliverance of life.*

He bows three times in his heart.

**The Ritual Master’s Incense Prayer:**
Your subordinate, [Name], humbly burns incense and respectfully memorializes the Three Clarities and Three Realms, the August Ones of the Golden Towers, the Celestial Worthy of Great Compassion of the Eastern Ultimate Palace who responds to cries and attends to suffering, the Heavenly Worthies of Numinous Treasure of the Ten Directions, the true administrators of the Three Realms, and the sovereigns of the Ten Directions.

By virtue of past causes, I have presumptuously transmitted the supreme methods. My merits fall short by the slightest measure, while my transgressions accumulate like mountains. I tread the earth in trembling fear and gaze upon heaven with quaking awe. I hope to broadly proclaim the wondrous teachings and thereby universally deliver those sunk in darkness. Having pledged my devotion, I dare not fail to make this declaration.

For the present rite, I, the humble sponsor [Name], now universally offer the supreme Yellow Register Grand Fast on behalf of the departed kin [Name] and all souls gathered in assembly—extending also to the six destinies and four births, the orphaned spirits and stagnant souls. In accordance with the true statutes, I proclaim and perform the refining and deliverance.

Having already memorialized the intent of the fast and notified the true administrators, summoned the numinous attendants to descend and attend the Dharma assembly, I yet fear that those in darkness and light, separated by different paths, may remain sunk in oblivion, unable to behold the radiant light or partake in liberation. I humbly beseech that a special Dao decree be issued, commanding the Lord of the Southern Cinnabar Heaven Fire Mansion to illuminate with yang brilliance, open the obstructed roads, dispel the shadows of yin, and guide them to the Mysterious Altar.

Dare I not purify my thoughts and settle my mind, reverently praying for response?

The Dharma Master strikes his teeth three times and bows thrice in his heart.
Holding the *Talisman for Opening the Roads*, he recites the esoteric incantation:

*"The Primordial Beginning summons and guides,
The great gods of heaven and true perfected ones.
August and exalted, the perfected of wondrous conduct.
The boundless ten directions, the supreme true gods.
Turn your radiance and return your carriage,
Oversee the true and deliver the living.
The chancellors of all heavens, the Southern Palace of Supreme Prosperity.
Han, the registrar and overseer of life, the great god of monitoring existence.
Holding the registers and grasping the records, all assemble before the Emperor.
As each is to be delivered, strictly examine the heavens.
Universally proclaim to the Three Realms and the boundless divine lands.
The subterranean courts, the Northern Capital of Fengdu.
The Three Offices and Nine Bureaus, the Twelve River Sources.
Liberate ancestors and parents through countless kalpas.
Swiftly erase the ledgers of transgressions, eradicate the roots of evil.
Do not detain or coerce them into ghostly throngs.
By the Primordial Beginning’s talismanic command, ascend without delay at this very moment.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes of the Great Emperor of Longevity decree!"*

Recited thrice, he draws a breath of qi from the Gate of Heaven and blows it upon the talisman.
With mudras formed and fingers pressed, he burns the *Talisman for Opening the Roads* at the Ghost Gate.
He then recites:

*"By the Primordial Beginning’s talismanic command, ascend without delay at this very moment.
The cold pools of the Northern Capital, the guardians of form and soul.
Subdue demons and protect the summoned, deliver them to the Southern Palace.
Let the dead souls undergo refinement and be transformed into immortals.
Let the living receive deliverance and endure through kalpas.
Through cycles of kalpas, their years shall equal heaven’s.
Forever delivered from the three paths and the five sufferings, eight hardships.
Transcending the Three Realms, they wander freely in the Supreme Clarity."*

The Dharma Master offers incense and prays again:

*"Now, as I burn this incense, I reverently invite the Lords of the Han Mansion, the Duli Mansion, the Xingsheng Mansion, the Gongdu Mansion, the Juhun Mansion, the Registrars of Life and Destiny, the Administrators of Merit and Execution, and all divine lords.
I now execute the talismanic command for refinement and deliverance, summoning the six destinies, four births, orphaned spirits, and stagnant souls. Having already notified the true administrators and secured this moment, I compel them to hasten here and attend the altar for deliverance. Yet I fear the underworld paths may remain obstructed, preventing full illumination. By the Emperor’s decree, I summon the Great General of the Southern Dipper’s Fire Chime to swiftly fly the fire chime, illuminating all directions without bound, penetrating the deepest darkness—all as commanded. Step the Fire Chime Pace, execute the Fire Chime Mudra, and visualize six Fire Chimes taking flight."*

He burns the *Flying Talisman of the Great One* and prays:

*"Before the wondrous Dao, all was undifferentiated and formless.
The Three Names divided, giving rise to the Nine Qi;
The One Primordial separated, initiating the Three Powers.
The pure ascended and the turbid congealed—thus heaven and earth took their places.
The minute and vast dispersed and differentiated—thus the myriad beings were complete.
Qi’s origin is without form, yet humans are the most numinous.
Good and evil first arise in the one mind; retribution thus cycles through the six destinies.
Some are born in the heavenly path, some among humans,
Some dwell in the gates of the spirit path, some endure the sufferings of hell,
Some incur the retribution of hungry ghosts, some abide among beasts.
Once fallen into the wheel of rebirth, escape is not easily won.
Even to the farthest reaches of the empty void, the accumulated darkness of the cold realms,
The orphaned souls without offerings, the stagnant souls unable to ascend,
Constantly burning with the fires of hunger, forever cut off from yang’s light.
Before their evil roots are eradicated, they merely drift upon the sea of suffering.
Yet the Most High, deeply moved by compassion,
Deems all sentient beings to share the ancestral qi of the Primordial Beginning.
Thus, in boundless vastness, he plants the great virtue of cherishing life.
Broadly proclaiming essential methods, he makes boats for humanity.
Universally delivering sentient beings, he constructs ladders for the Dharma.
Manifesting a hundred thousand auspicious marks, he opens the twelve gates of vows.
Here he spreads the statutes for delivering the dead, using them to open the path to transcendence.
Let the dead souls undergo refinement and be transformed into immortals.
Erase transgressions, remove faults, rescue from hardship, and relieve suffering.
Gather all good benefits—beyond conception.
Today, I reverently initiate the jade statutes, proclaiming the precious models.
I set forth the Dharma food, chanting the cavernous hymns.
Auspiciously opening the five gates to transfer the spirits,
I earnestly invite the assembled perfected to oversee the deliverance.
Relying on the power of the Dao, may they come to the numinous altar,
Receive the causes of all wondrous blessings, and forever escape the sufferings of rebirth.
Having long entrusted this to the divine generals, I now notify all relevant bureaus.
Let none remain sunk in darkness—come forth and follow the guidance!"*

He reverently invites the Divine Tiger Envoys, the Generals for Summoning and Seizing Souls, the Three Yuan Generals, the Venerable Deities of the Year’s Virtue, the Seven Dao Merit Officers, and the Six Jia Envoys to swiftly assemble in accordance with the statutes and escort them to the numinous altar.
Having prepared the official proclamation, he now solemnly declares it.

He recites the *Universal Summons* and burns it.
The Dharma Master performs the rites, burning the *Talisman of the Great General for Summoning Souls*.
He recites the esoteric incantation:

*"By the Numinous Treasure’s talismanic command,
Deliver the six destinies, four births, orphaned spirits, and stagnant souls.
Escape the hells, forever part from eternal night.
The five sufferings and three paths—do not detain them.
Coerce them no longer into ghostly throngs, sever their dead names.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes of the Great Emperor of Longevity decree!"*

Drawing qi from the Gate of Heaven, he blows it upon the talisman and burns it.

**Summoning the Generals and Officers for Pursuit and Seizure**

He reverently summons:
The Great Dharma Bureau of Numinous Treasure,
The Southern Palace of Supreme Prosperity,
The Southern Mausoleum Pivot Mansion,
The Vermilion Mound Fire Mansion,
The Immortal Officers and Heavenly Generals of the Refining and Deliverance,
The Divine Tiger Envoys of the Three Departments for Pursuing Souls,
The Merit Officers of Heaven, Earth, Immortals, Humans, Ghosts, and the Karmic Path,
The Administrators of Earth and Water,
The City Gods and Earth Lords,
The Attendant Officers and Guardians,
The Underworld’s Chief Officers of Wandering Souls.

*"Hear now this summons! Swiftly take charge and escort the six destinies, four births, orphaned spirits, and stagnant souls to the altar for transfer!"*

**Further Commanding the Restraint of Wayward Spirits**

It is further decreed: restrain the raving souls and frenzied spirits, rectify their forms and spirits, and conduct yourselves with virtue at the altar precincts. You shall not, on account of this occasion, seek vengeance or redress grievances, nor encroach upon the living. The dark statutes shine forth—all must comply. Should any dare transgress, their offenses shall not be pardoned.

The officiating Daoist, holding the banner, summons and gathers:
With wholehearted devotion, we invoke and beseech the boundless realms of the ten directions, the farthest reaches of the mysterious void, the suffering multitudes of the limitless, all the sunken and obscured, the six destinies and four births, the orphaned spirits and stagnant souls. May they, by the power of the Three Treasures, arrive this very night, this very hour, to attend the Dharma assembly and partake in these deliverance merits.

*Chanting the Yellow Chapter*
The Great Tenuous Banner of the Supreme Yellow,
The Numinous Pennant of the Peerless commands.
Summoning the long-night abode,
Delivering and receiving the reborn souls.
*And the inconceivable merits.*

The master forms the mudra of summoning and restraint, silently reciting the true secret names. Following the names, the mudras are formed, and the master recites the invocation aloud:

*"Radiant Womb, Obscure Essence, the Three Hun of the Luminous Spirit—return to emptiness, return to truth. The true qi of Heaven and Earth, gather once more to reconstitute your form and spirit. This is the true work of the Five Agents’ transformation—nowhere to hide, nowhere to flee, nowhere to escape your form!"*
*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the Emperor’s decree!*

*Further invocation:*
*"The Three Officials of the Northern Feng, inspecting the ghost encampments—no concealment shall be tolerated; report at the Golden Horse Post. Proclaimed universally, all spirits heed: the Five Emperors of the Three Realms shall present their accounts on high!"*
*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the Emperor’s decree!*

The master draws qi from the northeast, blows it upon the banner’s left eye three times, and visualizes the assembly of millions of ghostly souls beneath the altar.

*Next incantation:*
*"Spirits, clarify and rectify! May the ten thousand qi endure forever. Spare them from suffering and affliction; let their bodies shine with light. Restore their original forms, restore their original spirits!"*
*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the Decree of the Great Emperor of Longevity!*

The incantation is silently recited three times, and qi from the east is drawn and blown upon them.

The Dharma Master ascends the seat, and the Daoist assembly chants the central liturgy, guiding the wandering souls to prostrate before the seat.

The Dharma Master intones...

Now, by the supreme power of the Dao, the supreme power of the scriptures, and the supreme power of the Dharma—encompassing all heavenly realms, all human realms, all divine realms, all hellish realms, all hungry ghost realms, all animal realms, and all wandering souls and lingering spirits who have gathered in this sacred precinct—we acknowledge that in your earthly lives, you may have suffered from thunder and lightning, flood and fire, execution and warfare, muteness and lameness, deafness and blindness, curses and poisons, miscarriage and falls, wounds from beasts and insects, untimely and violent deaths, lingering illness and unjust demise, causing your souls to scatter and your spirits to drift, your forms incomplete and your limbs unwhole. What afflicted you in the yang world afflicts you still in the yin realm. Though you have come before this Dharma assembly, you remain entangled in suffering.

Today, in accordance with the sacred teachings, we summon the spirits of the numinous offices, enact the great ritual, and gather the true qi to heal your ailments, uproot your suffering, restore your forms, and revive your spirits. Only then shall we purge the filth and impurity, refine and liberate you. Cultivate reverence and solemnity, lest you forfeit the fruits of this sacred practice.

*Next, the incense is offered, and the invocation begins:*
With reverence, we kindle incense and supplicate:
Green Emperor, Guardian of Souls;
White Emperor, Attendant of Spirits;
Red Emperor, Nurturer of Qi;
Black Emperor, Conductor of Blood;
Yellow Emperor, Central Sovereign;
True Lord of the Vermilion Mound Fire Palace;
True Lord of the Southern Prosperity Upper Palace;
True Lord of Refinement and Transcendence;
Divine Physicians of the Numinous Treasure;
Healing Merit-Officials;
Refining Perfected Ones;
Divine Marshals and Immortal Hosts—
all mighty and numinous beings.
May you bestow compassion and descend with true qi,
universally healing the ailments of these male and female souls,
restoring their forms and reviving their spirits.
*As decreed by the Most High!*

The Venerable Master visualizes the descent of the celestial officials, arrayed to his left and right, guarding before and behind.

*Next invocation:*
Supreme Lord of Jade Purity, Primordial Origin,
command the Divine Physicians to descend.
Restore the withered and decayed bones,
universally deliver and save all beings.
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Primordial Origin’s Boundless Salvation of Humanity!*

*Next, the Five Palaces ritual is performed. The true names of the Five Emperors are silently recited:*
Mo Hei Zi, Wa La Wu, Ling Bao Zhong, Hong Xing Mao, Mo Zhen You.
*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the Decree of the Great Emperor of Longevity!*

The Master draws the qi of the Five Peaks and blows it forth.
Holding the talisman of the Healing Merit-Officials, he silently intones:
All beings of the four births and six destinies,
the ten kinds of sentient life,
all who suffer in the myriad transformations—
may the celestial light seize them,
and the talisman’s command prevail!
*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the Decree of the Great Emperor of Longevity!*

He draws the ancestral qi, blows it upon the talisman, and burns it. Silently reciting the true name for delivering souls:
Xing Sheng Chen, Du Li Mao, Ke Han Yin, Gong Du Da Zhi Jia Xia, Ju Hun Dui Hun She.
*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the Decree of the Great Emperor of Longevity!*

He draws the qi of the Three Paths and Five Peaks, blowing it upon the wandering souls to be delivered.

The Dharma Master takes his seat and intones:
Those whose bones have returned to life and the dead revived
have reverted to their original state;
those whose qi is gathered and forms restored
are sustained by the power of generation and transformation.
May their souls be clarified and rectified,
their bodies radiant with light.
By the jade talismans of the Great Cavern,
the precious true names of the Highest Clarity,
we enact the ritual as prescribed,
refining you for ascension.

Holding the Eighteen Jade Talismans of the Great Cavern, he invokes:
By the Emperor’s decree, commanded by the Primordial Lady of the Great Ultimate,
we solemnly summon:
Brain Spirit: Crimson Script of the Nine Muddy Vapors, Master of the Primal Roar, You;
Left Eye Spirit: Master of Penetrating Light and Mystic Truth, Li;
Right Eye Spirit: Master of the Morning Infant and Yin Essence, Li;
Tongue Spirit: Master of Ascending Yang and Upright Life, Chen;
Heart Spirit: Master of the Mystic Pearl and Profound Mystery, Chen;
Liver Spirit: Green Emperor, Meng Guang, three fingers and one joint;
Spleen Spirit: Master of the Purple Court and Prolonged Years, Zi;
Lung Spirit: Master of the Luminous Cavern and Seasonal Completion, Xu;
Kidney Spirit: Master of the Great Abyss and Seeker of Capitals, four fingers and one joint;
Yin Spirit: Master of Life-Continuing Strength, Bo Qiang, Kun;
Bladder Spirit: Master of the Primal Constancy, Qiu Fu, Mao;
Womb Spirit: Master of Embracing Life, Yin He, Mao;
Knot Spirit: Master of the Nine Radiant Ones, Yan Xia, Mao;
Joint Spirit: Master of the Vast and Empty Strategy, Yao Hao, Mao;
Blood Spirit: Master of the Central Darkness, Liang Bi, Chen;
Essence-Spirit: Master of the Primal Xu Zhu Zhu, Kun;
Qi Spirit: Master of the Primal Flourishing, Cui Cui, Hai;
Spirit-Spirit: Heaven-Born Numinous Father, Chen;
Life Spirit: Master of the Central Darkness and Hidden Field, Kun.
*Swiftly descend and attend these wandering souls,
entrusting qi to gather their forms,
restoring their spirits and reviving their natures!*

He draws the ancestral qi, blows it upon the talismans, and burns them as the text is recited.

*The Venerable One of Universal Qi and Boundless Life.*

Holding the Talisman of the Five Spirits in Conjunction, he intones the prayer:
By decree of the Supreme Emperor and command of the Primordial Lady of the Great One, we reverently summon:
the qi of the Heavenly Treasure of the Primal Vastness of Hun Dun,
the qi of the Numinous Treasure of the Crimson Vastness of Chi Hun,
the qi of the Divine Treasure of the Profound Repose and Mystic Pervasion,
the qi of the Five Directions’ Numinous Treasure, spontaneously perfected and utterly true,
the qi of the Heavenly Emperor’s Jade Perfection, the Boundless Realm of Brahma-Conduct,
the qi of the Three Origins, Nine Perfected, Four Brahma, and Four Poles,
the qi of the Divine Efflorescence of the Verdant Florescence of Tai Yuan,
the qi of the Brain Spirit, Essence-Root of the Muddy Pellet,
the qi of the Eye Spirit, Radiant Upper Effulgence of Xuan,
the qi of the Ear Spirit, Void Tranquility of the Hidden Field,
the qi of the Nose Spirit, Jade Clarity of Ling Jian,
the qi of the Mouth Spirit, Jade Pool of Supreme Harmony,
the qi of the Teeth Spirit, Blade-Edge of Luo Qian,
the qi of the Tongue Spirit, Pervading Life and Upright Order,
the qi of the Twelve True Lords of the Double Towers,
the qi of the Heart Spirit, Cinnabar Origin and Guardian of the Numinous,
the qi of the Spleen Spirit, Dragon Mist Embracing Brightness,
the qi of the Gallbladder Spirit, Dragon Radiance of Majestic Brilliance,
the qi of the Lung Spirit, Luminous Effulgence of Empty Accomplishment,
the qi of the Spleen Spirit, Ever-Present and Soul-Abiding,
the qi of the Kidney Spirit, Profound Obscurity Nurturing the Infant,
the qi of the Left Azure Dragon of Jia Yi,
the qi of the Right White Tiger of Geng Xin,
the qi of the Front Vermilion Bird of Bing Ding,
the qi of the Rear Dark Warrior of Ren Gui—
Hasten, hasten to descend! True and life-generating qi,
flow into the body of the refined wandering soul.

He draws the ancestral qi, blows it upon the talisman, and burns it.

*The Venerable One of Boundless Wondrous Transformation.*

Then he intones the invocation:

By decree of the Supreme Emperor and command of the Primordial Lady of Grand Unity, I reverently summon the Six Ding Metal Lads, the Six Ding Jade Maidens, the Six Jia Metal Lads, the Six Jia Jade Maidens; the Spirit of Essence-Hidden, the Spirit of Water-Hidden; the spirits of eighty-four thousand pore-orifices; the spirits of thirty-six thousand ingress and egress; the spirits of twenty-four thousand breaths of qi; the spirits of twelve thousand radiant essences; the spirits of one thousand two hundred bodily forms; the spirits of three hundred sixty joints; the Jade Lad Lord, the Jade Maiden Lord, the White Prime Lord, the Cinnabar Field Lord, the Thirty-Six Lion Lords, the Master Father Lord, the Master Mother Lord, the Peach Prosperity Lord, the Union Longevity Lord; the Upper Harmony Lord, the Middle Harmony Lord, the Lower Harmony Lord; the Upper Prime Lord, the Middle Prime Lord, the Lower Prime Lord—hasten, hasten to descend! True and authentic spirits, each guard within the form of the refined wandering soul.

He draws the qi of the Five Directions and blows it into the wandering soul.

*The Venerable One of Aeonic Transformation of Form.*

Next he intones:

By decree of the Supreme Emperor and command of the Primordial Lady of Grand Unity, I reverently summon the Three Hun: Spirit Terrace Radiance, Luminous Soul, and Obscure Essence; I reverently summon the Seven Po: Corpse Dog, Crouching Arrow, Dark Yin, Swallowing Thief, Non-Poison, Removing Filth, and Foul Lung—each guard your proper station. Do not dare to transgress, and naturally attain long life.

He forms the Seal of the Three Paths and Five Sufferings, draws the qi of the Three Paths and Five Sufferings, swiftly imprints and blows it into the wandering soul to be delivered.

*The Venerable One of Transcendent Liberation.*

The master recites the Jade Clarity Incantation for Generating the Hun and Nurturing the Po:

Seven qi perfect the true,
Six rites revolve the void.
Five numina mend the broken,
Two luminaries assist [the obscured].
The net spins through empty space,
Steps fly to the cloud palace.
The embryo has its beginning,
Dust kalpas have no end.
The golden fortress nurtures substance,
The jade grotto congeals spirit.
True qi inwardly nourishes,
To perfect the sage.
Above it enters the Six Voids,
Below it penetrates the dark springs.
Within the cloud palace’s jeweled towers,
There dwells the true hun.
It enters and leaves the land of blessings,
Circulates through the Gate of Life.
It chews numinous mushrooms,
Rinses with golden springs.
Sweet dew flows in streams,
Drizzling rain descends upon the cinnabar field.
Purple auroras dawn and shine,
Three qi condense as mist.
The jasper chamber transforms the immortal,
Seated serenely upon the golden lotus.
True countenance veils the sun,
Dust kalpas become years.
*The Venerable One of Golden Countenance Manifest in the World.*

He sprinkles water, visualizing the countless wandering souls—forms and faces refined and proper—gathered beneath the altar, awaiting deliverance.

Again he intones:

Your illusory bodies perish easily,
But the sickness of the heart is hard to cure.
The forms of earth, water, fire, and wind
Have long since scattered;
The thoughts of hunger, thirst, illness, and suffering
Have not been forgotten through endless kalpas.
Today I generate your hun and nurture your po,
Restore your nature and return your spirit.
Those whose forms are incomplete
Shall henceforth be whole;
Those whose illnesses and sufferings are not healed
Shall from this moment be cured.
Sins are erased from the ledgers,
Evil roots extinguished.
The nether courts may no longer detain you,
And in heaven and earth you shall be reborn.
Compose yourselves and await ascension.

*The Venerable One of Universal Moistening of the Numinous Source.*

Your roots of suffering are dispersed and released,
Your true nature shines clearly.
You should bathe in orchid-scented waters,
Thoroughly washing away karmic obstacles,
That body and spirit may both attain perfection,
And merge with the Dao in truth.
Compassionate assembly, proceed with guidance.

*Ritual for the Universal Deliverance Great Purificatory Bath of Wandering Souls.*

According to the method, two immaculate bathing chambers are prepared, with buckets filled with fragrant water, into which the Yang-Purifying Talisman of Luminous Cinnabar is submerged. Before the altar, the Dharma Master intones:

In my duly ordained capacity, I, [Name], humbly invoke the Five Venerable Lords, the Thirty-Two Heavenly Emperors, the Perfected Lords of the Sun, Moon, and Five Planets, and the Star Lord of the Eastern Well. I have heard that the immortals and perfected dwell in profound seclusion, untouched by dust. The supreme Dao is mysterious and empty, its Dharma unattached to things. Only the benighted among sentient beings, entangled in karmic filth, require the true teaching to awaken, and the grace of wisdom to cleanse. I now, on behalf of [Name], solemnly offer this Yellow Register Great Purificatory Rite, universally delivering the six paths, four births, and all wandering, stagnant souls. I empower the Dharma water to bathe the multitude of souls. May you bestow compassion and condescend to deliver them. Let the flow of true and authentic qi descend and infuse the fragrant waters, that they may dispel the afflictions of heat and vexation, and swiftly attain the fruit of purity.

The assembly of the pure, present before me, is invited to offer praise.

The master visualizes the sun and moon, blending the red light of the Six Harmonies Palace and the yellow essence of the Two Qi, intermingling with five-colored clouds filling the chamber. The qi of the Thirty-Two Heavens—yellow, green, blue, red, black, azure, purple, and white—and the qi of the sun, moon, and five planets interweave within the water.

The assembly chants the *Hymn to the Eastern Well*:

The Celestial River pours into the Eastern Well,
Stone radiance, water-mother essence.
Round light brushes the numinous brilliance,
Mysterious splendor gleams in lofty clarity.
The Primordial Beginning parts the heavy night,
Heavenly beings follow the moon’s birth.
Bathing upon the orchid pool,
The dragon bears the Long Geng vase.
Golden lads scatter fragrant flowers,
Jade maidens pour the five stars.
Crowns and sashes laved in jade nectar,
Refining the forms of the five immortals.
Bodies fragrant, myriad spirits descend,
Riding the light to ascend the high clarity.

The officiating Daoist performs the rite:

In former lives, deluded by the true,
You drifted upon the bitter sea;
Today, receiving deliverance,
You are bathed in the flowery pond.
Without extraordinary causes,
None transcend to the pure realm.
On your behalf, I dedicate this
To aid your rebirth in the celestial realms.

He recites the *Three Primordials Precept Bathing Incantation for Dispelling Filth*:

Heaven is limpid, qi is clear,
Five colors rise in lofty brightness.
Sun and moon emit their radiance,
Refining and purifying the body’s form.
Numinous fluids inwardly cleanse,
Fragrant waters refine the essence.
Light and brilliance flow and shine,
Illuminating the Highest Clarity.
Qi does not receive evil,
The five viscera embrace the numinous.
Sins vanish from the Three Paths,
Calamities dissolve in the Nine Darknesses.
Evil roots are severed,
Fortunate blessings arise of themselves.
Today’s great vow
Is proclaimed to all.
Universally receive deliverance,
Ascend into the imperial court.
Jade void’s limpid splendor
Has washed away the yin filth;
The golden chamber delivers life,
Again bathing in the numinous fluids.
May you forever serve the true lineage,
And constantly practice purity.

On your behalf, I dedicate this
To aid your rebirth in the celestial realms.

He recites the *Golden Chamber Life-Delivering Incantation.

The celestial spirits flourish in glory,
The nine apertures are solemnly purified.
The five palaces and six viscera,
Their divine radiance fresh and bright.
The Three Primes are firmly secured,
Myriad qi fully suffused.
The Golden Chamber delivers life,
The Green Script restores rebirth.
Thrice refined and ninefold transformed,
Ascending into the Grand Clarity,
The Three Luminaries shine as one,
Heaven and earth unite in parallel.
Soaring through the mysterious void,
Roaming and feasting in the Purple Court.
Washing with the waters of yellow blossoms,
Swiftly attaining purity and emptiness;
Chanting the verses of the Green Script,
Enabling flight and transformation.
May the roots of evil forever fade,
Preserving the Dao-qi to endure.
On your behalf, I dedicate this
To aid your rebirth in the celestial realms.
He recites the *Green Script Longevity Inner True Incantation*.

Heaven and earth together purified,
Washing away filth and sweeping away dust.
Refining and transforming the nine paths to restore the primordial true form.
The hundred joints receive the numinous,
Each node renewed.
Purity and emptiness reflect and illuminate,
Displayed within and without.
Auspicious day, propitious hour,
Life delivered, years restored.
Jade lads and jade maidens
Hold your towels for you.
Mystic clouds and purple canopies
Adorn your body.
May you attain long life,
Rooted with heaven and earth.
Washing the heart and cleansing thoughts,
Dissolving karmic debts of countless kalpas;
Gathering qi to form the body,
Shedding the abode of the five aggregates.
Thus the mortal dust no longer stains,
The true realm ever luminous.
Swiftly untangling deluded attachments,
Free from defilements and burdens.
On your behalf, I dedicate this
To aid your rebirth in the celestial realms.
He recites the *Purificatory Ascension Incantation*.

The heavens bright, the qi clear,
Your body now refined.
Dust and filth dissolved,
The nine apertures receive the numinous.
Enabling your transformation,
Restoring the form of youth.
Dark souls delivered,
All attain flight and ascension.
Driving out the turbid and raising the pure,
Attaining utmost purity;
Ascending to truth and leaving suffering,
Requires solemn adornment.
Now the Golden Chamber delivers life,
Jade maidens bring forth the numinous.
Voiding the hymns of the cavern chamber,
Completing the splendor of rainbow robes.
On your behalf, I dedicate this
To aid your rebirth in the celestial realms.
He recites the *Three Primes Precepts and Adornment Incantation*.

The five turbidities now purified,
The eight luminaries now bright.
Today you receive the Dao,
Sins extinguished, blessings arise.
Ever with the Five Emperors,
Equal in truth to the highest spirits.
Next, the transformation robes—
The Heavenly River’s ablutions and vestments.
The Celestial Worthy awaits the completion of the transformation robes,
Then ceases.
Envision the dark souls’ bodies radiant,
Their immortal robes resplendent,
All souls joyful and lovely.

You have now completed your ablutions,
Your robes and crowns fully arrayed.
All filth and turbidity purged,
Instantly attaining purity and emptiness.
Yet you must refine your soul’s demeanor,
To approach the Dharma assembly.
May you forever remove karmic defilements,
Untangling the debts of three lifetimes;
Instantly generating yang radiance,
Ascending the path to the Nine Heavens.
All should reverently prepare,
Awaiting your ascent.

Next, the Preceptor’s dedication—
All the merits of the preceding ablutions,
Boundless and immeasurable,
Are employed to cleanse
All sentient beings.
Untying the knots of root and dust,
Universally rendering them pure.
For these causes and conditions,
He recites the *Great Sage Primordial Celestial Worthy*,
*The Most High Great Dao Lord*,
*The Most High Lord Lao*,
Whose inconceivable merits are invoked.

The *Unsurpassed Yellow Register Grand Fast Established Rites*, Scroll Twenty-Nine, concludes.
The *Unsurpassed Yellow Register Grand Fast Established Rites*, Scroll Thirty.

The *Grand Fast for Universal Salvation with Empowered Offerings* from the *Rituals and Precepts* compiled by Supreme Enforcer of the Dao, Immortal Jiang Shuyu

The Preceptor leads the souls from the bathing chamber into the reed enclosure, recites the *Hymn of Radiance*, and circumambulates the enclosure once. Then, the Daoist assembly arranges itself at the offering banquet. The Preceptor offers incense with this prayer:

This single stick of incense,
Rooted in the Primordial, grounded in the Later Earth,
Its fragrance scatters the Ten Flowers, ascending to the bounds of the Forest of Spirits;
Its smoke congeals the Nine Qi, descending to the realms of darkness and silence.
Universally pervading all sentient beings,
Pervasively encompassing the Dharma-realm.

Today, on behalf of the fast’s sponsor, [Name],
and with the intention of universally benefiting the six destinies, the four modes of birth, and the wandering souls of the departed,
we establish this pure and unimpeded nocturnal fast.
We burn this precious incense,
offering it to the Boundless Dao’s Three Realms’ Imperial Teachers,
the Most Revered Scriptural Treasures,
the Sagely Beings of the Heavens,
the True Lords of the Three Realms,
and the Mighty Spirits of the Ten Directions.

We humbly pray:
May you traverse the skies, gazing down upon auspicious clouds;
May you turn your radiant chariot, riding the瑞 mist to descend.
Before you, may the assembled souls to be delivered
concentrate their spirits, purify their thoughts,
contemplate the Dao, and return to the True.
May they suddenly awaken to past causes,
severing forever the bonds of worldly dust;
May they be steeped in the Dharma’s grace,
realizing the inherent emptiness of the awakened nature.
Swiftly, may they see with their eyes and hear with their ears,
their noses open and their hearts comprehend.
The Three Paths and Five Sufferings,
shall not depart from the root of purity;
The Six Realms and Nine Hells,
shall all belong to the realm of light.
May all attachments be forever dissolved,
and all attain freedom.
We bow our heads in reverence,
taking refuge in the Boundless Dao.

*Recitation of the Universal Offering Hymn*
Universally offering to the boundless sages,
Incense smoke scatters to the ten directions.
May it form a tower of the Seven Treasures,
Shedding light upon the Five Turbid Worlds.
Conveying the hosts of heaven and humanity,
All ascend the Dharma Bridge.
Together, we gather in the realm of Non-Action,
Diligently cultivating without retreat.

The Preceptor offers incense, visualizing transformation,
following the *Lingbao* original scripture’s practices,
transmuting into the Heavenly Worthy of Salvation from Suffering,
while the altar assembly becomes the Perfected Ones of Salvation from Suffering.
The offering banquet becomes a three-tiered treasure terrace,
with red and purple qi from the offering vessel surging to the heavens.
The supervising officers, local earth gods, and guardians of the four directions
are all present according to ritual.

Next, visualize the Three Treasures’ Great Emperors,
the Supreme Compassionate Lord of the Great Ultimate,
the Ten Directions’ Perfected Ones of Salvation from Suffering,
the True Lords of the Sun, Moon, and Three Realms,
the Golden Lads and Jade Maidens,
the Divine Officials and Merit Officers,
each distinctly present.

Then, make the following petition:

Your servant, [Name], of the Dharma rank,
burns incense and respectfully petitions:
The Marvelously Non-Existent Supreme Lord, the Celestial Worthy of the Primordial,
The Supreme Dao Treasure, the Marvelously Existent Supreme Lord,
The Jade Emperor of the Void, the Great Dao Lord,
The Supreme Scriptural Treasure, the Perfectly True Great Emperor,
The Myriad-Transforming Primal Elder Lord of Chaos,
The Supreme Master Treasure, the Heavenly Worthy of Salvation from Suffering of the Eastern Ultimate,
The Heavenly Worthies of Salvation from Suffering of the Ten Directions,
The Five Ancient Emperors,
The Thirty-Two Heavenly Lords,
The Solar Lord of the Sun Palace,
The Lunar Sovereign of the Moon Palace,
The Lords of the Five Directions, Five Virtues, and Five Stars,
The Seven Lords of the Northern Dipper,
The Six Lords of the Southern Dipper,
The Perfected Lord, Master of the *Lingbao* Scriptures,
The Great Dharma Master of the Mysterious Center,
The Three Heavenly Great Sagely Master Lords,
The Perfected Lord of the Great Ultimate Immortal,
The True Lords of the Three Ministries and Five Offices,
The Fragrant Official Envoys of the Void’s Surveillance,
The Local Earth Gods of the Present Realm,
and all the responsive and efficacious mighty spirits of the Three Realms.

Your servant has heard:
The six destinies cycle endlessly,
never escaping the sea of rebirth;
The four modes of birth drift like waves,
hardly transcending the realm of liberation.

The souls of the ten myriad kinds lie in the Yellow Springs,
their spirits bound in the Nine Springs’ eternal night.
Endlessly they suffer retribution,
with no hope of transformation or release.
Craving and desire weigh heavy, breeding hunger and thirst;
spirit and wisdom grow dim, gathering sorrow and affliction.
Once sunk into the realm of suffering,
they are forever cut off from the light of the sun.
Without the true canon of the Three Caverns,
there is no path to life from the Nine Springs.
The Mysterious Perfected One, moved by compassion,
has bequeathed the teachings of the Great Dao.
Opening the gate of universal offering in the Night Feast,
delivering the consciousness adrift in the sea of suffering.
The light of wisdom shines forth,
transforming and gathering billions upon billions.
The power of the Dharma extends its blessing,
pervading the entire Dharma realm.
Your servant now, on behalf of the feast sponsor [Name],
solemnly dedicates this offering for the departed kin [Name],
and all the wandering souls present—
those of the six destinies and four modes of birth,
the lonely spirits and stagnant souls—
establishing the Supreme Yellow Register Great Feast,
to aid their deliverance and transcendence.

Tonight, with reverence,
we prepare a banquet of the Most High’s compassion,
boundless and unobstructed,
vast and impartial,
pure and abundant—
a single offering of sacred food.
First, we present it to the Ten Poles and Ten Flowers,
the Three Origins and Three Realms,
the Flying Celestial Great Saints,
and all the compassionate lords by their sacred titles;
to the sun, moon, and stars,
the rivers, seas, and mountains,
the springs, Fengdu, and earthly altars—
all the mighty spirits.
May they together deign to witness and partake,
and in unison grant their attestation and deliverance.
The Three Flowered Treasure Radiance
bestows the luminous brilliance of the Three Sceneries;
The Eightfold Assembly’s Sacred Scriptures
gather the celestial qi of the Eight Heavens.
Descending into the altar’s precinct,
they infuse the Dharma food.
May all beings of the six destinies and four modes of birth,
all lonely spirits and lost souls,
partake of this offering,
so that the six desires grow still and the hundred bodies flourish;
may they hear the Dharma and listen to the scriptures,
so that the one nature becomes complete and the myriad spirits gather.
May evil roots be extinguished,
the wheel of karmic retribution cease.
May all ascend to the heavens of self-mastery,
and forever dwell in the realm of blessed halls.
Your servant is overwhelmed with fervent supplication.

The officiating Daoist purifies the space and intones:
*Cool and sweet is the nectar feast,
its Dharma flavor beyond thought or speech.
Rare fragrances flow with the seven treasures,
what doubt remains in the unseen?
Receive this Dharma offering,
ascend to heaven and enter the Purple Tenuity.
Alas for those who suffer in the long night,
tormented in the three paths of existence.
Fire rages in their throats,
eternal hunger and thirst their lot.
A single sprinkle of sweet dew,
and the scorching heat finds cool relief.
Spirits and souls are born in the Great Canopy,
nourished and pervaded by its grace.
Naturally, they partake of heaven’s kitchen,
its Dharma flavor beyond thought or speech.
Universally aiding those in the six destinies,
all hungry ghosts and spirits yet unsaved.
May they all be steeped in the sweet dew’s savor,
and be fully sated.
In this wondrous assembly,
may all be encompassed.
Ascend to heaven and enter the Purple Tenuity,
rise to the Clear Capital’s palace.*

The celestial gate’s golden light and Dao qi,
layer upon layer, descend in unbroken streams,
infusing the officiant’s body and the vessel of Dharma food,
illuminating within and without.
The Three August Ones of the Most High,
the Azure Mystery Emperor,
and the hosts of saints in the ten directions from the void,
bear witness and form this sacred covenant.

*We invoke the Three Treasures—
each with reverent faith—*
The Dharma Master intones:
*Abstruse and unfathomable,
dwelling alone before the Lord of Images;
elusive and obscure,
originating at the dawn of the Great Beginning.
Splitting the primal qi,
unfolding the myriad perfected beings.
Only the Great Dao is exalted,
the refuge of all living things.*

Tonight, we solemnly present pure offerings,
and perform the sacred rites.
May the Treasure of the Dao extend its compassion,
that the hidden spirits may receive deliverance.
We humbly beseech your radiant witness,
and pray for your attestation.
The assembly, with devout sincerity,
invokes with focused intent.

The officiating Daoist proclaims:
*With focused intent, we invoke
the Dao Treasures of the ten directions,
to descend upon this altar.
We take refuge in the Supreme Dao,
the Most Perfect and Greatly Compassionate One.
May all beings universally
attain the fruit of non-action.*

The Dharma Master intones:
*The jade tablets of the celestial script,
existing before emptiness itself;
the golden tablets and sacred texts,
qi congealed at the dawn of the Flying Mystery.
Preserving the kalpas’ destiny,
universally nurturing the divine spirits.
Only the sacred scriptures of the Three Caverns are exalted,
the true treasures of the ten directions.*

Tonight, we solemnly present pure offerings,
and perform the sacred rites.
May the Treasure of the Scriptures extend its compassion,
that the hidden spirits may receive deliverance.
We humbly beseech your radiant witness,
and pray for your attestation.
The assembly, with devout sincerity,
invokes with focused intent.

The officiating Daoist proclaims:
*With focused intent, we invoke
the Scripture Treasures of the ten directions,
to descend upon this altar.
We take refuge in the Primordial Lord of Mystery,
the thirty-six divisions of scriptures.
May all beings universally
enter the Three Vehicles’ path.*

The Dharma Master intones:
*Manifesting in countless forms to descend and transform,
serving as the bridge between life and death;
establishing the Dharma to deliver humanity,
the ladder and steps to true immortality.
Drawing forth the four assemblies,
opening the path of the Three Vehicles.
Only the true masters of countless kalpas
are the compassionate fathers of humans and heavens.*

Tonight, we solemnly present pure offerings,
and perform the sacred rites.
May the Treasure of the Masters extend its compassion,
that the hidden spirits may receive deliverance.
We humbly beseech your radiant witness,
and pray for your attestation.
The assembly, with devout sincerity,
invokes with focused intent.

The officiating Daoist proclaims:
*With focused intent, we invoke
the Master Treasures of the ten directions,
to descend upon this altar.
We take refuge in the Lord of Mystery,
the Most Compassionate and Supreme Master.
May all beings universally
constantly hear the teachings of the Master Treasure.*

*May you take refuge in the Supreme Dao,
may you take refuge in the Supreme Scriptures,
may you take refuge in the Supreme Master.*
*Together, we dedicate the inconceivable merit.*

The Dharma Master addresses:
*With utmost sincerity, we reverently petition
the Greatly Compassionate One of the Eastern Pole’s Palace,
the Heavenly Worthy of Great Unity who responds to cries and attends to suffering,
the Most High Savior from Suffering.
Your servant has heard:
Gathering qi and amassing merit,
the Most High composed the scriptures for delivering beings;
responding to cries and attending to suffering,
the Compassionate One bears the name of Savior from Suffering.
Your majestic spirit pervades the ten directions,
your vows universally deliver all beings.
May they, by the power of the Dao,
escape the paths of delusion.*

Your servant, on behalf of the feast sponsor [Name],
solemnly dedicates this offering for the departed kin [Name],
and all the wandering souls present—
establishing the Supreme Yellow Register Great Feast.
Tonight, we prepare a universal offering,
a boundless and unobstructed,
vast and impartial,
pure and abundant night feast of Dharma food
for the six destinies, four modes of birth,
lonely spirits, and stagnant souls.
We humbly beseech your great compassion
to turn your true chariot back to us,
bestow your radiant brilliance,
and illuminate with your majestic light.
Spread auspicious clouds to open the path of life,
and dispense propitious mists to seal the gate of death.

Now we draw the qi of the supreme heavens,
to succor the souls of the Nine Dark Realms.
As the sacred name is proclaimed,
the Three Wretched Paths hear and escape suffering;
as the numinous scripture is chanted,
the Six Destinies receive deliverance and transcend.

We look up in reliance upon your utmost benevolence,
and bow in hope of your all-penetrating gaze.
Again, we rely upon the pure assembly
to join in praise and exaltation.

*Four invocations of the Most High Savior-from-Suffering Heavenly Worthy*
Recite the *Sutra of Salvation from Suffering* once.

Visualize five-colored radiance manifesting in the east,
a perfect halo like the moon’s corona,
illuminating without exception the heavens above, the earth below,
and the ten directions of the cosmos.
At its center sits the Azure Mystery Supreme Emperor,
his head crowned with a diadem of emerald jade,
robed in a flying cloak of kingfisher-green feathered silk,
his left hand holding a luminous jade-green bell,
his right hand grasping a branch of azure-green feathers.
He is enthroned upon a nine-headed lion of nine hues,
seated upon a golden-cinnabar lotus pedestal.
From each lion’s mouth flames swirl in encircling coils.
Within the radiance of the Heavenly Worthy’s body,
another nine-hued halo arcs like a rainbow.
From his neck shines a solar orb.

Attended by the eighty-one spirits of the Great One,
the Two Perfected Ones to left and right,
heavenly marshals and valiant knights,
Azure Mystery functionaries,
and jade lads and maidens of the Yellow Register,
the divine kings emit from their brows beams of wisdom-light,
their brilliance sharp as ten thousand flashing swords.
Each detail is distinct as they infuse the Dharma food.

With single-minded devotion, we invoke the thirty-two Heavenly Lords.
Your servant has heard:
when the Primal Beginning unfolded its chart,
true yang spread its transformative power.
Though it nurtures life through wondrous being,
it truly gathers qi in the Upper Prime.
From the Form Realm downward,
all are bound in the turning wheel.
When the blessings of karmic conditions are exhausted,
one generation may end and another begin.

Only the true scriptures of the Eight Assemblies,
hidden within the great Brahma of the heavens,
transcend the ten thousand ranks,
their grace universally pervading the Nine Dark Realms.

Your servant, on behalf of the feast sponsor [Name],
solemnly dedicates this offering for the departed kin [Name],
and all the wandering souls present—
establishing the Supreme Yellow Register Great Feast.
Tonight, we prepare a universal offering,
a boundless and unobstructed,
vast and impartial,
pure and abundant night feast of Dharma food
for the six destinies, four modes of birth,
lonely spirits, and stagnant souls.

We humbly beseech the celestial chariot to descend,
gazing upon the dusty world below.
May it bestow the radiance of heaven,
and send down the flow of Dharma sustenance.
In the great thousandfold world,
by the Brahma qi it gathers and transforms without end;
for the souls sunk in darkness through kalpas uncounted,
by the true vehicle they receive full and sufficient nourishment.

Thus may the transformative nurturance of primordial essence
further enhance the vast and luminous sheltering grace.
The pure assembly, with sincere intent,
joins in unison to chant and praise.

Recite the esoteric incantation once,
and form the mudra of the Three Wretched Paths and Five Sacred Peaks.
Envision the Dao assembly all transformed into perfected beings,
together with the Heavenly Lords of the thirty-two heavens,
chanting in unison.
After each direction is completed,
visualize the qi of that quarter—
nine from the east, three from the south,
seven from the west, five from the north—
flowing in their respective numbers
to infuse the Dharma food in the water vessel with a breath.

Again, recite the esoteric incantation once,
and visualize twelve streams of yellow qi
from the five directions, the sun and moon, and the five stars,
drawing the qi of the thirty-two heavens,
interweaving and interlacing,
infusing the Dharma food.

Recite the esoteric incantation three times,
and visualize red light from the four directions
enveloping the altar for a long while,
merging into a five-colored rainbow aura
that descends into the five viscera of the officiant’s body,
then coalescing into one vast orb,
expansively covering and filling the empty void,
so that the officiant’s body seems to dwell within the solar palace.

The Dharma food multiplies from one to two,
from two to three, from three to nine,
from nine to eighty-one,
gathering and transforming without end,
pervading the ten directions,
from earth to heaven,
boundless and immeasurable.

Next, immerse the talisman of transformed food into the water vessel,
and recite the *Sweet Dew Permeating the True* mantra three times.
The master lifts the water vessel,
stirring it with a cypress branch,
sprinkling the Dharma food in all directions.
Visualize the Azure Mystery Supreme Emperor,
together with the officiant’s perfected being and the lords of the ritual,
all reciting the *True Mantra of Sweet Dew*,
sprinkling its nectar,
fragrant qi richly suffusing and fulfilling all.

The merit’s golden light,
subtly opens the gates of darkness.
From the Flower Pool flows true fragrance,
lotus canopies drift upon the clouds.
A thousand spirits, replete with primordial harmony,
ever dwell in the Twelve Towers.
Swiftly proclaim the sacred decree of the Numinous Treasure,
that all may wander freely in the celestial paradise.

Next, recite the *Mantra for Breaking Open Fengdu’s Hell and Opening the Path of Karma* three times.
The Dao assembly circumambulates,
while the Dharma master, standing in position, concentrates the spirit,
visualizing the myriad suffering souls in Fengdu’s Nine Dark Hells of the northeast,
enduring every torment.
Then visualize the Jade Clarity Supreme Emperor enthroned in the mud-pill palace.
In accordance with the great ritual,
the officiant’s perfected being, along with the divine officials and marshals,
all recite the *Mantra for Breaking Open Fengdu’s Hell and Opening the Path of Karma*.
After a long while,
the Supreme Emperor emits from his mouth nine-colored auspicious clouds and purple qi,
a golden light piercing straight into the hells,
shattering the layered darkness of the iron citadel,
crushing the willow fetters,
dissolving the swords and blades,
transforming them into azure lotuses.
The cauldrons of boiling liquid become spring gardens,
the ninefold depths of darkness all turned into pure realms.
All the sinful souls emerge,
advancing to the altar’s base,
awaiting deliverance.

Vast and desolate, within Fengdu’s bounds,
layer upon layer of diamond mountains.
The boundless light of the Numinous Treasure
illuminates the scorching torments of the cauldrons.
The seven generations of ancestors and all the dark-bound souls,
their bodies borne upon fragrant cloud chariots,
ascend upon the blue lotuses of samadhi and wisdom,
to be eternally at peace in the divine realms.

All the foregoing empowerments of the Dharma food
are immeasurable meritorious causes,
used to deliver the dark-bound souls,
elevating them to blessed realms.

Your former great afflictions arose from possessing this body.
With a body, hunger and emptiness arise, and thoughts turn to food.
With a body, cold and heat bring suffering, and thoughts turn to clothing.
But where is the body now? Why cling to food?
Without a body, why cling to clothing?
With food and clothing, thoughts turn to wealth and treasure.
Yet hunger, emptiness, cold, and heat no longer concern you.
What use are wealth and treasure?
The six sense-objects are illusory and false,
all ultimately returning to emptiness.
Behold the assembled spirits before you—
their physical forms have perished,
yet attachments and desires linger unresolved.

If you can perceive emptiness and see your true nature,
cutting off delusion to return to the real,
transcending attachment to existence and non-existence,
you will naturally attain liberation.
But if the roots of sensory dust remain unsevered,
and karmic thoughts are not extinguished...

Behold those who suffer from hunger and thirst—now I offer them the unobstructed sweet dew of the Dharma as sustenance.

*The Ten Directions’ Savior from Suffering, Heavenly Worthy of Numinous Treasure, Universal Salvation Grand Purification Feast and Alms-Rite Proclamation*

The Dharma Master offers incense, takes his seat, and gazes toward the ghost-gate altar arrayed before him. He universally proclaims to the boundless worlds of the ten directions, to all assemblies of heavenly beings and humans, to all mighty spirits soaring through the void, to all suffering souls in hell, to all creatures burdened by karmic debt, and to all wandering, ownerless, and stranded spirits:

It is said that the two conditions of good and evil yield vastly different fruits of suffering and joy. The paths of life and death diverge, separated by the divide of darkness and light. You, having just shed your sheltered bodies, have sunk into the ghostly realm. You know only the torment of hunger and thirst, clinging to the remnants of withered husks. How much worse for those souls enduring the pains of retribution—obstructed by the hindrances of their residual senses, the faintest sprouting of a thought for food ignites the fires of karmic consequence.

Now, as this Dharma assembly is arrayed and banners and flowers beckon, this wondrous, pure offering is transformed to relieve the emaciated forms of your suffering. Upon hearing this summons, you gather at once, jubilant as if presented with a grand feast, consoled as though restored to life. Old and young support one another, young and old press shoulder to shoulder in order. Without clamor, you take your places, your only aim to be filled. Above, you receive the compassion of the Dao and its teachings, universally partaking in the offering; below, you embody the vow and power of this purification rite, with none left behind. Let this rare encounter stir your hearts—do not conceive of it as finite. Return to the true Dao and be delivered from this existence. With bellies full, you rejoice as if sated beyond measure; with minds awakened, you feel shame as though hearing sighs of remorse.

Today, for all you ghosts and spirits, we establish this boundless purification feast and perform the empowering Dharma rites.

The officiating Daoist intones the *Jade Clarity Lifespan Invocation of the Celestial Master*, saying:

I bow my head to the Radiant Wisdom of the Void and Supreme,
I bow my head in reverence to the Sovereign of the Profound Origin.
You fashion heaven and earth without boasting of virtue,
Yet serve as refuge and support for all beings.
With compassion, you rescue the souls turning in the five destinies’ wheel,
With mercy, you deliver those suffering in the three paths of hell.
I revere the Heavenly Worthy of the Golden Palace,
I revere the Father of Compassion who embodies the Six Perfections,
I revere the Supreme Perfected of Jade Clarity,
Who severs the bonds of life and death, granting eternal continuity.
Emerging from existence, entering the void without reliance,
You transform the withered and decayed into immortals.
A chance like this comes but once in a thousand, ten thousand kalpas—
For the multitudes, you broadly expound the causes of karmic conditions.
You reverse decay, raise the dead to everlasting life,
Ensuring their forms and spirits transcend all bounds of change.

*From the Scripture of Jade Clarity*

Next, the offering of food is made.

Within cloud-kitchens, wondrous viands—
those who partake ascend in radiance, soaring beyond the void;
From the Purple Palace, sacred scriptures—
those who heed attain perfection and grasp the Dao.

Now you have tempered your forms, cleansed your essences,
gathered qi to reconstitute yourselves as humans.
Having arrived at this Dharma feast,
each must be sated to the full.

We offer this for you,
to aid your ascent into the immortal realms above.
Recite the Jade Clarity Sweet Dew Empowered Dharma-Food Spell:

I bow my head to the Encompassing Net of Heaven,
converging radiance to draw in numinous splendor.
I restrain the hun-soul, govern the seven po,
contemplating with clarity to stabilize the center.
In movement and stillness, I venerate the Void;
in rest and repose, I repose in the Chamber of Mystery.
Hunger is sated with yellow and azure blossoms,
thirst quenched with jade-root nectar.
The divine banner commands the great demons,
uniting the body to refine true light.
Reflecting again upon the Great Nothingness,
I wander ever in the midst of emptiness.
Round and all-pervading, I ferry across the waves of dissolution,
true transformation knows no fixed term.
Boundless, without end or beginning—
practitioners must clearly understand this.
In silence, I forget doctrines and teachings,
responding to the times to expound the great principles.
The Dao descends yet does not illuminate itself—
it must first be bestowed by others.
Converging in the non-dual realm,
following the heart’s intent, it naturally unites and parts.

From the *Scripture of Jade Clarity*

Golden tones proclaim the teachings,
jade tablets transmit the precepts.
They serve as the bridge to rescue the dead,
the ladder and steps to ascend as immortals.
Relying on the power of wisdom,
you depart from the paths of delusion.
May your nature and insight attain perfect communion,
your body and mind achieve purity.

We offer this for you,
to aid your ascent into the immortal realms above.
Recite the Three Lights Dharma-Qi Spell:

Vast and crystalline, Dharma-qi arises,
billowing and congealing in the midst of heaven.
The two luminaries together shine with clarity,
the five planets intermingle in mutual resonance.
The Three Lights blaze with brilliance,
precious qi fills the Three Palaces.
In the imperial realm, the Nine Elders convene,
swallowing and imbibing, the hundred parts of the body flourish.
Golden blossoms illuminate radiance and shadow,
your body becomes one with the sun and moon.
Invoking the Dao before the Perfected Saints above,
your lifespan spans ten thousand kalpas without end.

The Three Lights blaze in splendor,
the Nine Elders gather in the imperial realm;
The five planets weave their net,
the myriad spirits nest in the true abode.
Swallowing jade nectar, chewing numinous sprouts,
the nine orifices are opened and unobstructed,
the hundred meridians are harmonized and regulated.

We offer this for you,
to aid your ascent into the immortal realms above.
Recite the Three Lights Flowing Essence Spell:

The wondrous Dao divides the One Qi,
within qi, yin and yang are separated.
Congealing and transforming into sun, moon, and stars,
brilliantly flowing as the Three Lights.
Nine blossoms contain the Nine Ways,
eight hues delight the eight directions.
Resplendent, they illumine the true body,
flowing essence returns to the Great Vastness.
Below, they descend into the Abyssal Spring Palace,
above, they array themselves in the Realm of Non-Where.
Releasing the body, traces take flight,
suddenly, all is forgotten.
Seven treasures stream with pure essence,
chaos intermingles with radiant blossoms.
Swallowing the Nine Clouds Elixir,
this joy knows no end.

The Dharma-vessel ferries and guides,
delivering from the five sufferings’ depths;
The wisdom-dew cools and refreshes,
dispelling the heat and afflictions of the three paths.
To dissolve and remove karmic filth,
you must rely on the true teachings.

We offer this for you,
to aid your ascent into the immortal realms above.
Recite the Three Lights Nurturing Infant Spell:

Within the profound and recondite Nine Qi,
the Nurturing Infant arises from the Great Nothingness.
The radiant sun blazes in the Valley of Light,
the resplendent moon shines on the celestial thoroughfare.
The five stars stream with precious light,
the Dipper and Pole pivot the celestial axis.
Flying qi billows and scatters,
swallowing and imbibing, you pause in contemplation.
Transcending traces, you ascend the celestial jade steps,
refining the magic mushroom, partaking of blossoms in bloom.
Qi spreads, the myriad spirits convene,
lifting the body to ascend into the Great Void.

The Primordial Beginning unfurls the chart,
true scriptures manifest in the world.
The Compassionate Venerable guides and receives,
exemplary models are proclaimed and disseminated.

By its power to widely nourish all beings, it is called "Sweet Dew"; by its power to shatter karmic obstructions, it is named "Dharma Speech." You have long been trapped in the wheel of suffering, cut off from the true Dao. Through the illusory union of false conditions, your original nature has grown dim and obscured. To transcend and realize the eternal truth, you must return life to the hun and po souls.

For your sake, to aid your ascent into the immortal realms, recite the Jade Clarity Yin-Sheng Brahman Chant:

The magic mushroom has no root, yet it is the source of all transformations.
Within, the seven po souls congeal; above, the three hun souls coalesce.
The twenty-four Perfected Ones enter and exit without gate.
In the profound obscurity, all is indistinct and without essence.
Through kalpas they endure or perish, born with the ebb and flow of qi.
Externally, primordial simplicity solidifies; internally, the seven meridians are nurtured.
The five spirits plant blossoms; the Three Terraces unfold their glory.
The Purple Palace and White Youth return the form to infancy.
Rising on clouds, soaring through mist, they float in the void.
Within resides the Jade Perfection, known as the Divine Lord.
To his left, he clasps Wu-Ying; to his right, Bai-Yuan stands guard.
The Dark Beast blocks the rear; the Vermilion Phoenix leads the front.
Above, a verdant canopy floats; below, golden lotuses surge.
Fragrant clouds congeal in the sky; sweet dew flows without end.
Its use is inexhaustible, its source unending.
The sacred sound resonates, the Dharma accords with the mystic scripture of the Jade Treasury.
Voices reach the ten directions; grace pervades the three realms.
Dao-qi descends with the incantation, its luminous blessing circulating in harmony.
Poured into the Dharma-food, it universally purifies.
Those who partake shall have their karmic obstructions forever dissolved,
the five viscera blossoming, the hundred meridians harmonized,
life without end, their form like the Great Void.
The merit is profound and unfathomable.
Each of you should arouse the mind of great compassion,
universally sharing with all, that all may be fully sated.
Body and mind cool and refreshed, free from heat and vexation.
Body and mind full and content, free from hunger and emptiness.
Body and mind peaceful and secure, free from sorrow and suffering.
Body and mind liberated, free from the cyclic suffering and joy of karmic retribution.
Transform this into sustenance, universally offering it to all the heavens,
and even bestowing it upon all the destitute and forsaken, that none may be hindered.
Thus shall you not fail the Ten Directions’ Heavenly Worthies in their vast deliverance of the drowned and universal salvation of those in darkness.
May both giver and receiver alike bathe in the grace of the Dao and together attain blessed fruition.

Now, the Heavenly Worthy possesses the Divine Incantation for Shattering Hell, Liberating from Suffering, and Ascending to Heaven. For your sake, recite it with single-minded devotion.
Its merit is beyond thought; practitioners gain blessed reward.
Bestow the Dharma-drink and food, and abide forever in peace and bliss.

The offering of food now complete, I shall further expound the true Dharma for your universal benefit, that you may rely upon it in cultivation and use it as a bridge to the Way.

Of old, in the emptiness of non-being, the Three Qi first arose.
The Three Qi congealed and formed the Three Heavens.
Three transformed into nine, nine again gave birth to three,
and the thirty-six heavens were thus arrayed.
Below, the nine layers of earth and water, along with the twenty-seven winds,
mutually support one another, also thirty-six in number, corresponding above to the heavens.
Beyond this lies the root of primordial qi, embracing and upholding the limitless Two Modes.
Once humanity was placed therein, they shared with heaven and earth
the governance of qi through its division.
Qi gathers and scatters; beings live and die.
From birth to death is the constant way of all things.
To not die and live forever—this is the true Dao.
The Dao divides into the Three Caverns, its teachings unfolding as the Three Vehicles.
Expounding broadly on causes and conditions, it awakens all existence.
Devas, humans, spirits, and ghosts—all may cultivate it.
According to their vows and practice, each attains their fruition.
Accumulating merit is gradual; piling virtue is the foundation.
When merit is full and virtue complete, the body transcends the Three Realms.
Within the Three Realms, the longevity and excellence of devas and humans vary,
each differing from the other.
The refinement of cultivation, too, differs in each case.
From the subtle to the manifest, one gradually accords with the true Dao.
From mortal to immortal, passing through the Perfected to become a sage—
only by transcending this realm does one enter the Three Clarities,
first attaining the ultimate fruit, which is the Dao of eternal life and imperishability.

All beings, deluded regarding the true Dao,
long habituated to inversion, their thoughts scattered and chaotic,
pursue the dusts of the world, abandoning one thing to grasp another,
never resting for even a moment.
Bewildered by what exists, they are blind to what does not.
Karmic bonds and conditions arise from this,
drawing in transgressions and defilements, accumulating through the ages.
Revolving in the Three Realms, adrift and forgetful of return,
they drift through the Five Paths, long submerged and unenlightened.
Embracing pain and poison, they cannot awaken to themselves.
The great Dao flows through forms, its kinds and categories intermingled,
its qi boundless, its numbers unfathomable.
Dying and reviving, obscured and then illuminated—
the heavens and earth revolve like the wheels of a chariot.
The pure and unified Dao-qi is fundamentally without birth or death.
Even if one were to become a deva or human with a lifespan of billions,
without understanding the root of the Dao, bound by desire,
one’s allotted time would end, and they would again fall into the Four Births, Five Paths,
Six Destinies, and Three Wretched Realms,
endlessly revolving without respite.

If, among all dharmas, you generate the mind of existence,
abandoning the impure realm to seek the bliss of the Three Clarities,
forsaking the body of sentient beings to pursue the form of the true Dao,
desiring to sever afflictions and enter the unconditioned,
seeking to leave behind all views to attain quiescent extinction—
such attitudes, I tell you, are called great perverse views.
It is like a fool who fears the great earth and wishes to flee,
yet wherever he goes, he cannot escape the earth.
So too with beings who fear the body of birth and death,
hastily abandoning the Three Realms with a mind of aversion.
The body they attain does not transcend birth and death.
Such beings have yet to perceive the Dharma.
All beings are heavily shrouded in ignorance.
The true Dao is within them, yet they cannot see it.
It is like a fool who runs east and west in search of emptiness and form,
unable to realize that form itself is emptiness.
So too is the world:
the mind races in pursuit of the true Dao,
not knowing that body and mind are the true Dao itself.
Now I proclaim this to you, that you may know.

Even the Three Clarities to come remain inseparable from afflictions.
Yet now you know the great Dao lies not in some distant realm.
Simply observe body and mind, cultivate the true Way,
and liberation arises of itself.

The mark of the true Dao is called "non-action":
no arising, no ceasing,
neither being nor non-being,
neither eternal nor annihilated,
neither great nor small,
neither form nor mind.
To take this as your model is to cultivate the true Way in right practice.

All that has been spoken above
comprises the true and authentic Dharma-words of the Three Branches,
serving as the ladder for all—devas, humans, ghosts, and spirits—to ascend in right cultivation.

Now, in accordance with the profound liturgy, we universally establish pure offerings,
widely propagating the most wondrous teachings to awaken those sunk in delusion.
We humbly pray that you, gathered in this assembly,
may arouse the mind of refuge, practice the pure conduct,
cut off the path of rebirth, and transcend the gate of liberation.
May you broadly accumulate meritorious deeds and advance toward the fruition of the Dao.

Yet we fear that you, not having purified the three karmic actions,
still remain veiled by the six senses,
unable to accord with the Dharma-words and thus difficult to transcend into the pure realm.
With compassion, we rely on the Most High,
whose boundless salvation is manifest—
who bestows the grand rites of refinement and deliverance,
and expounds the wondrous precepts of the Nine Perfected.

Imitating the non-dual nature, we gather qi and return to the true.
The soul ascends to the Nine Heavens, the spirit transcends the Three Realms.
Proceed according to the liturgical forms, proclaiming them in due order.
Now pause briefly at the numinous altar to await the opening of deliverance.

Next, rise and perform the dedication of merit:
The immeasurable roots of virtue from the offerings just made
shall aid and guide all spirits to accomplish the supreme Dao.
For this supreme cause, we invoke the inconceivable merit of
the Great Sagely Primordial Heavenly Worthy,
the Most High Great Dao Lord,
and the Most High Lord Lao.

Next, as prescribed, invite the descent of true water and true fire for the refinement and deliverance of souls.

The thirtieth fascicle of *The Complete Rites of the Supreme Yellow Register Great Fast* is concluded.

The thirty-first fascicle of *The Complete Rites of the Supreme Yellow Register Great Fast*
*Rites of the Upper Clarity Southern Palace for the Refinement and Deliverance of Suffering Souls*
Compiled by the Celestial Enforcer of the Law, Immortal Jiang Shuyu
Section on Liturgical Rites

First, place a square vessel in the northwest of the altar and erect a placard inscribed: *"Southern Palace Supreme Yin Water Refinement Pool."* Then, place a round vessel in the southeast of the altar and erect a placard inscribed: *"Southern Palace Supreme Yang Fire Refinement Pool."* Prepare in advance a vessel of yellow-flower divine water and charcoal fire of willow wood, placed beneath the altar.
